K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:273b-1: dz'a ta ka ni d'a nam/
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:273b-3: skyes pa rabs kyi gleng gzhi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:273b-4: 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:273b-5: bcom ldan 'das rgyal byed tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i tshe /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:273b-6: gnas brtan chen po don mthong bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:273b-7: phyag rgyas te bskor ba byas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:273b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:273b-11: bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyud kyi chos thos par 'tshal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:273b-17: de yang 'dir sdud par byed pa po rab tu rtog pa'i shes rab dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:273b-18: zhi ba'i dgra bcom pa rnams kyi skyes ba rabs kyi gleng gzhi'i don gyi bsngags pa brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:273b-22: gleng bzhi gsum po 'di gzigs nas bsngags pa gang zhig nyan pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:273b-23: du? kha dang po'i zhig de rnams gyi gleng gzhi yongs su bcad pa rnams rig par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:273b-24: mar me mdzad gyi zhabs gyi drung 'dir sems dpa' chen pos smon lam btab bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:273b-25: ji srid thams cad sgrol gyi lus spangs pa'i bar dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274a-1: gyi gnas su 'khrungs pa'i chos kyi gtam gyi bar gyi lam ni ring po'i gleng gzhi zhes bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274a-2: ji srid dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos nas byang chub kyi snying por thams cad mkhyen pa thob nas chos kyi gtam gyi bar ni gleng gzhi bar pa zhes bya ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274a-6: de thob pa rnams ni nye ba'i gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274a-7: de la 'dir ring bo'i gleng gzhi zhes bya ba ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274a-8: 'di nas bskal pa grangs med pa zhig dang bskal pa 'bum phrag gcig lhag pa nas mgo brtsams nas grong khyer 'jigs med ldan zhes bya ba byung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274a-9: der yang bram ze blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274a-11: ma gnyis ka'ang rigs bzang ba'i mngal du zhugs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274a-12: rigs bdun rgyud kyi bar du gzhan gyis rtsod pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274a-14: smod pa med cing rnam phar dag go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274a-15: gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa rab tu mdzes ba mchog gi kha dog dang ldan pa'i skyes bu can no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274a-16: de yang las gzhan mi byed par bram ze'i las 'ba' zhig slob bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274a-17: de yang khye'u gzhon nu'i dus su pha dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274a-18: ma gnyis ka dus las 'das so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274a-19: de nas de'i longs spyod spel ba'i blon pos nor gyi yi ge blangs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-0: mu @274b tig la sogs pas gang ba rnams sgor bton te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-1: gzhon nu 'di rnams ma'i nor yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-4: yang mes kyi nor yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-5: rigs bdun rgyud kyi bar gyi nor yin no zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-6: 'di rnams so sor bskyang ba'i phyir smras pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-7: mkhas pa blo gros bzang pos bsams pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-8: 'di'i nor rnams bzung nas bdag gi pha dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-9: mes po la sogs pas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba na gser se ba cig kyang khyer nas ma song gi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-10: bdag nyid kyis khyer nas 'gro bar rig bar bya'o zhes rgyal po la smras nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-11: grong khyer du rol mo bsgrags te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-12: skye po thams cad la sbyin par byin nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-13: dka' thub pa'i rab tu byung ba la rab tu byung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-14: 'di'i yang don gsal bar bya ba'i phyir gnas 'dir blo gros bzang pos gtam byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-15: de yang 'di tsam 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-16: sangs rgyas kyi rgyur rgyun mi 'chad bar gsungs la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-17: slar yang tshigs su bcad pas bcings te bshad kyang go dka' bas de dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-18: de'i bar bar du tshigs su bcad pa'i tshig gis gsal ba dang bcas pa bshad par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-19: bskal pa grangs med bzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:274b-20: bskal pa 'bum phrag gcig lhag pa nas mgo brtsams nas sgra bcu rgyun mi 'chad par 'jigs med ldan gyi grong khyer der byung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-1: sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-2: bskal pa grangs med bzhi dang ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-3: 'bum phrag gcig ni lhag pa na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-4: grong khyer 'jigs med ldan zhes pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-5: mthong ba yis ni dga' ba byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-6: rgyun mi 'chad pa sgra bcu bzhin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-7: bza' dang btung ba yang dag ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-8: de la sgra bcu rgyun mi 'chad pa ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-13: rol mo mri dam ga'i sgra dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-21: sgra bcu po 'di rnams ni rgyun mi 'chad pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-22: sgrad rnams phyogs gcig tu bya ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-23: glang po'i sgra dang rta'i sgra dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-24: rol mo dung dang shing rta'i sgra //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-25: za dang 'thung ba de nyid dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-26: bza' dang btung ba'i sgra dang ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-27: sangs rgyas rgyud du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-28: grong khyer yan lag nying lag ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-29: 'dod pa thams cad nye bar gnas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-30: rin chen bdun po yang dag ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-31: skye bo sna tshogs yang dag gang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-32: lha yi grong khyer phun tshogs bzhin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-33: bsod nams can ni gnas pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-34: 'jigs med ldan pa'i grong khyer du //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-35: bram ze blo bzang zhes bya bas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275a-36: longs spyod bya ba du ma bsags //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-0: nor dang 'bru ni mang @275b po yi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-1: nang gi gsang sngags 'dzin pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-2: rig byed gsum gyi pha rol son //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-3: mtshan nyid ai thi ha sa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-4: dam pa'i chos kyi pha rol son //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-5: de nas de nyid nyi ma gcig la mkhas pa blo gros bzang po de khang bzang mchog gi steng du gcig pur skyil mo krung bcas nas dben par bzhugs te bsams pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-6: mkhas pa skye ba gzhan du ma'i mngal bzung na sdug bsngal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-7: de bzhin skye ba'i gnas su lus 'jug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-8: bdag skye ba'i chos can dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-11: 'chi ba'i chos can no; ;de lta bur gyur pas bdag ni skye ba med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-14: sdug bsngal med pa'i bde ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-16: bdud rtsi lta bu'i mya ngan las 'das pa chen po tshol bar rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-17: nges par srid pa las grol ba'i mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i lam gcig po yin pa lta bu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-19: dben par gcig pur gnas nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-20: de tshe bdag gis 'di ltar bsams //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-21: srid par skye ba sdug bsngal zhing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-22: lus ni yongs su zhig pa nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-23: skye ba'i chos dang rgas pa'i chos //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-24: na ba'i chos dang de tshe bdag /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-25: skye ba med dang 'chi med bde //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-26: mya ngan 'das pa yongs su btsal //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:275b-27: gang tshe dri ngan lus 'di ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-0: sna tshogs mi gtsang gis gang @276a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-2: don med ltos pa med pa yi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-3: dor nas 'gro bar bya ba yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-4: de yi lam ni yod dam snyam //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-5: 'bad pa med par lam mi thob //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-6: de yi lam ni btsal bar bya //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-7: srid pa rnams las grol 'gyur snyam //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-8: de nas lhag par yang bsams pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-9: ji ltar 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba yod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-10: de ltar mi mthun phyogs srid pa yod na mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro snyam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-11: de ltar yang gdung ba yod na de zhi bar byed pa'i bsil ba yod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-12: de bzhin du 'dod chags la sogs pa'i me zhi bar byed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yod par 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-13: ji ltar yang sdig pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'i dge ba'i chos yod pa 'gyur snyam pa nyid do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-15: de lta bu nyid kyis sdig pa can la sogs pa'i skye ba yod na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-16: skye ba thams cad zad par byed pa'i skye ba med par grags pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'ang yod par 'gyur snyam pa nyid do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-18: ji ltar sdug bsngal yod pa na; ;bde ba zhes pa'ang yod pa yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-19: de ltar sred pa yod pa na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-20: sred ba med pa'ang yod pa yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-21: ji ltar tshe ba yod gyur na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276a-22: grang ba yang ni yod pa yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276b-0: de @276b ltar me gsum yod gyur na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276b-1: mya ngan 'das pa'ang yod pa yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276b-2: ji ltar sdig pa yod gyur na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276b-3: dge ba yang ni yod pa yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276b-4: de ltar skye ba yod gyur na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276b-5: skye ba med pa'ang yod par 'dod //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276b-7: ji ltar bshad pa'i phung por skyes bu 'gyel bar gyur pa zhig thag ring po nas kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'i padma dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276b-8: mtsho chen po mthong na lam gang nas 'gro bar byas nas mtsho der 'jug par rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276b-9: de'i lam du mi 'gro na mtsho chen po'i skyon ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276b-10: de ltar nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khrud pa na 'chi ba med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mtsho chen po yod pa na der mi 'jug na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276b-11: 'chi ba med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtsho chen po'i skyon ni ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276b-12: ji ltar yang chom rkun pas yongs su bskor ba'i skyes bu 'bros pa'i lam yod pa la myur du mi 'bros na lam gyi skyon ma yin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276b-14: de ltar nyon mongs pas yongs su bskor nas bzung ba'i skyes bu la zhi ba mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam yod par gyur pa na lam mi tshol ba na lam gyi skyon ma yin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276b-15: gang zag gi skyon yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:276b-16: ji ltar nad kyis gzir ba'i skyes bu la nad gso ba'i sman pa yod par gyur na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-0: gal te de'i gnas su nad @277a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-1: gso ba'i sman pa mi tshol na sman pa'i skyon ma yin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-3: de ltar nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis gzir ba'i skyes bu la nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa'i mchog tu mkhas pa yod par gyur na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-4: slob dpon tshol bar mi byed na de ni skyes bu'i skyon yin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-5: nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pa'i slob dpon gyi skyon ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-7: ji ltar mi gtsang gos pa'i mi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-8: gang ba'i mtsho ni mthong bzhin du //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-9: mtsho der 'jug par mi byed na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-10: de ni mtsho yi skyon min no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-11: de ltar nyon mongs dri 'khrud pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-12: bdud rtsi'i mtsho ni yod pa yi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-13: mtsho de la ni mi 'jug na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-14: bdud rtsi mtsho yi skyon min no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-15: ji ltar chom rkun gyis bskor ba //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-16: 'gro ba'i lam ni yod pa la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-17: skyes bu 'bros par mi byed na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-18: de ni lam gyi skyon ma yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-19: ji ltar nyon mongs kyis bskor na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-20: zhi ba'i lam ni yod pa la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-21: de yi lam du mi 'jug na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-22: zhi ba'i lam gyi skyon ma yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-23: ji ltar nad kyis gzir ba'i mi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-24: gso dpyad byed pa yod gyur pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-25: nad ni zhi bar mi byed na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-26: de ni sman pa'i skyon ma yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-27: de ltar nyon mongs pa yi nang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-28: gzir cing sdug bsngal gyur pa'i tshe //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-29: slob dpon tshol bar mi byed na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277a-30: slob dpon gyi ni skyon ma yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277b-1: ji ltar rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i skyes bu'i mgrin pa la mi gtsang ba bcings na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277b-2: de dor nas bde bar 'gro ba bzhin du /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277b-3: de ltar bdag kyang mi gtsang ba'i lus spangs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277b-4: ltos pa med par mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277b-6: ji ltar skyes pa dang bud med kyis bshang ba'i gnas su bshang ba dor bar byas nas snod du blugs te khur nas 'gro bar byed pa ma yin gyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277b-7: ltos pa med par skyug bro bas dor nas 'gro'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277b-8: de ltar bdag kyang mi gtsang ba'i lus la sogs pa ltos pa med par dor nas 'chi ba med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277b-10: ji ltar gru mkhan rnams ni gru rdol ba rnams la ltos pa med par dor nas 'gro ba de bzhin du bdag kyang sgo dgu'i rma 'di rnams kyi nang nas 'bab pa'i lus 'di dor nas ltos pa med par mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277b-12: ji ltar skyes bu sna tshogs pa'i rin po che blangs nas chom rkun pa dang 'grogs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:277b-13: lam du 'gro na rang gi rin po che brlag par dogs pa'i 'jigs pas de rnams dor nas lam bzang por 'jug pa bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-0: de ltar bdag kyang lus mi gtsang ba du ma can rin po che 'phrog @278a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-1: pa'i cho ma rkun bzhin du gal te sred pa 'di byed na 'phags pa'i lam gyi dge ba'i chos kyi rin po che bdag gis brlag pa'i dogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-2: de'i phyir bdag gis chom rkun lta bu'i lus 'di dor nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug bar rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-4: ji ltar mi yi dri nga ba //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-5: mgul la bcings na skyug bro ste //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-6: de dag spangs nas 'gro byed na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-7: skyug mi bro zhing bde bar 'gro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-8: de bzhin du ni dri nga lus //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-9: sna tshogs pa yis gang gyur pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-10: spangs nas 'gro bar byed pa ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-11: don med ltos pa med pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-12: ji ltar bshang ba'i gnas su ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-13: skyes pa bud med kyis bshangs nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-14: dor nas 'gro bar byed pa ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-15: don med ltos pa med pa yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-16: de ltar bdag gi lus 'di yang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-17: mi gtsang sna tshogs kyis gang ba //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-18: dor nas bdag kyang 'gro bar bya //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-19: ji ltar bshang ba'i gnas bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-20: ji ltar gru ni rdol gyur na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-22: de ni gru mkhan gyis dor nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-23: don med ltos pa med pa min //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-24: de ltar bdag gis lus 'di yang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-25: bu ga dgu yang mi rtag pas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-26: dor nas 'gro bar byed pa na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278a-27: gru mkhan gru ni dor ba bzhin //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278b-1: de bzhin du ni lus 'di ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278b-2: chom rkun chen po dang mtshungs shing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278b-4: dge ba spyod pa 'jigs med do; ;de bzhin du mkhas pa blo gros bzang pos sna tshogs pa'i dpe 'di yis phan yon gyi don la rnam par bsams shing rang gi khyim du dpag tu med pa'i longs spyod kyi phung po sngar ji ltar brjod pa bzhin du bkren pa la sogs pa rnams la sbyin pa chen po byin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278b-6: nyon mongs pa'i 'dod pa spangs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278b-7: grong khyer 'jigs med ldan gyi phyi rol tu song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278b-8: gcig pur gangs can chos kyi ri zhes bya ba la brten nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278b-9: der lo ma'i khang par 'chag par byed cing skyon lnga po ma bzlog lam spangs bzhin du de ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pa dang po dang /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278b-13: yon tan bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i shing shun gyi dum bu'i gos gyon nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278b-14: drang srong gi rab tu byung ba la rab tu byung ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:278b-15: de ltar rab tu byung nas skron brgyad dang ldan pa'i lo ma'i khang bde spangs nas yon tan bcu dang ldan pa'i shing gi drung du nye bar gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-0: 'byor pa thams cad spangs nas shing @279a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-1: gi 'bras bu mchog za zhing 'dug pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-2: gnas su 'chag par byed pa'i dka' thub byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-3: zhag bdun gyi nang de nyid du brgyad la snyoms par 'jug cing mngon shes lnga po thob par gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-4: de bzhin du des don du gnyer bas mngon par shes pa'i stobs thob par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-6: de ltar bdag gis bsams gyur pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-7: sna tshogs byed pa brgya yi nor //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-8: mgon dang mgon med rnams la sbyin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-9: gangs can la ni nye bar song //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-10: gangs can dang ni mi ring bar //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-11: chos kyi ri zhes bya ba la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-12: bdag gis de la mchog tu rten //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-13: lo ma'i khang pa legs byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-14: de ru 'chag par byed pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-15: skyon ni lnga po rnam par spangs /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-16: yon tan brgyad dang yang dag ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-17: mngon par shes pa'i stobs ldan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-18: skyon dgu dang ni ldan pa yi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-19: der ni de nyid dor gyur nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-20: shing shun dum bu'i gos gyon to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-21: yon tan bcu gnyis ldan pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-22: skyon ni brgyad dang ldan pa yi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-23: lo ma'i khang pa spangs gyur nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-24: shing gi drung du nye bar 'dug /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-25: yon tan bcu dang ldan pa yi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-26: rmos dang bskrun pa'i 'bru rnams ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-27: lhag ma med par dor byas nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-28: yon tan ma lus ldan pa yi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279a-29: shing tog mchog ni dang por zos //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279b-0: de ru @279b dka' thub byas nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279b-2: zhag bdun gyi ni nang nyid du //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279b-3: mngon par shes pa'i stobs thob bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279b-4: 'dir yang gleng gzhi ni mkhas nga blo gros bzang po brten pa'i lo ma'i khang pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279b-5: 'chag pa ni rang gi lag gis byas pa ltar brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279b-6: 'dir yang don ni sems pa chen po gangs can gyi nang nas 'ongs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279b-7: de ring chos kyi rir yongs pa mthong nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279b-8: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis las sna tshogs pa'i lha'i bu la mkhas pa blo gros bzang po 'di ni rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pas song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279b-9: 'di'i gnas rnams kyis gcig de'i tshig thos nas dga' ba'i gnas phug legs par lo ma'i khang par 'chag pa'i gnas byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis yang de'i tshe bdag gis bsams nas goms par byas pa rdzogs pa las de'i dus su de'i rgyu mtshan gyis sh'a ri'i bu der chos kyi ri der /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279b-11: gnas bzang po ni bdag gis byas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279b-12: lo ma'i khang pa bzang por ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279b-13: der ni 'chag cing gnas nas ni //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279b-16: 'chag pa'i skyon lnga po gang zhe na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279b-17: sra zhing mi snyoms pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:279b-18: nang na shing rang rod can dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280a-2: rkang pa la 'brum bu 'byung ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280a-3: sems rtse gcig tu mi gnas pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280a-4: las byed pa'i gnas mi 'grub la; sa yi steng mnyam zhing 'jam par 'chag pa ni bde zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280a-5: las byed ba'i gnas rdzogs pa de'i phyir tsha ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280a-6: mi snyoms pa'i sa'i cha ni skyon gcig tu rig par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280a-9: tha mar shing yod pa na bag med par 'ong zhing 'chag pa na dpral ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280a-10: mgo la gnod pa byed pa ni nang gi shing gi gnod pa gnyis pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280a-12: 'khri shing la sogs pa nags tshal thibs po'i 'chag sar byed pa na mun pa nag po'i dus su sbrul la sogs pa'i srog chags rkang pas brdzis na 'chi ba'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280a-13: des mche bas rmugs nas gnod pa skyel ba ni nags thibs po'i skyon gsum pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280a-14: shin tu dog pa'i 'chag sa'i mchu ru khru gcig pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280a-15: khru phyed pa'i 'chag sa byed pa na nang du gcod pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280a-17: sor mo 'chad par 'gyur ba ni shin tu dog pa'i skyon bzhi pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280a-18: shin tu yangs pa'i 'chag sar 'chag pa na sems g-yeng bar gyur pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280a-19: sems rtse gcig tu gnas pa mi thob pa ni shin tu yangs pa'i skyon lnga pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280b-0: 'chag sa'i mtho tshad kyi stugs su khru @280b phyed dang do /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280b-1: ngos gnyis su khru gcig tsam dkyus su khru drug cu pa sa'i mthil 'jam pa dang mtshungs shing yangs pa bye ma dang bcas pa'i 'chag sa ni rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280b-2: mchod rten gyi rigs mar me ltar gsal ba gnas brtan chen po dbang chen gyi 'chag sa lta bu bya bar rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280b-4: de ru 'chag sa byas la skyon lnga po spang bar bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280b-5: yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong gi bde ba brgyad dang ldan pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280b-6: dge sbyong gi bde ba brgyad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gang zhe na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280b-8: 'bru yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'dod pa med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280b-9: kha na ma tho ba med pa'i bsod snyoms las 'dod pa med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280b-11: bca' ba'i 'dod pa med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280b-12: nor gces pa'i yul mi sdug par byed pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280b-13: mgo re re'i khral la sogs ba len na rgyal po'i rigs kyis yul 'khor gyi mi sdug bsngal ba mi 'dod pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280b-14: nye bar mkho ba thams cad la 'dod pa med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280b-15: chom rkun gyis 'phrog pa'i 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280b-18: blon po chen po'i nye bar 'tshe ba med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280b-19: phyogs bzhir 'gro ba na 'tshe ba med pa ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:280b-20: de ltar der gnas na bde ba brgyad po nyams su myong bar nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281a-0: de ltar yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa 'dir gnas @281a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281a-1: bar byas nas mngon par shes pa'i stobs thob par 'gyur zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281a-3: zad par gyi las rnams byas nas mngon par shes pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281a-4: snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281a-7: lhag mthong brtsams nas gnas thob par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281a-8: lhag mthong gi stobs blangs nas ji ltar gnas na de'i stobs blang bar nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281a-9: de ltar der gnas nas de'i mngon par shes pa'i phyir lhag mthong gis stobs mthun par byas pa ni khang pa byas pa'i don yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281a-10: der skyon dgu dang ldan pa'i gos dor ba ni 'dir sngar rim pa bzhin du brjod pa de rnams de'i tshe khang mig chung ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281a-12: 'chag sa la sogs pa so sor brgyan nas me tog dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281a-14: shing ljon pa'i tshogs yid dga' ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281a-15: bsam pa chu ltar yid du 'ong ba /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281a-16: gdug pa can gyi ri dvags med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281a-17: gnod par byed pa'i bya'i tshogs med pa shin tu dben par gnas par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281a-18: 'chag sa brgyan pa'i phyogs gnyis dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281b-0: dbus su rgyab kyi rten gyi gzhi la brten nas bzhugs pa'i ched du 'chag sa'i nang du sa gzhi mnyam pa kha dog ser po rdo @281b dang bsres pa lo ma'i khang pa'i nang du ral pa'i khor yug dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281b-1: shing shun gyi dum bu'i chos gos dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281b-3: bum pa la sogs pa dka' thub pa'i yo byad dang ldan pa bsti gnas kyi nang du chu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281b-4: bum pa chen por chu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281b-9: shing la sogs pa de ltar gang dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281b-10: gang du rab tu 'byung ba la rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281b-11: de thams cad byas nas lo ma'i khang pa'i logs la gang zhig rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa na 'di'i yo byad rnams blangs nas rab tu 'byung bar gyis shig ces yi ger bris nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281b-12: las sna tshogs pa'i lha'i bu lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281b-13: mkhas pa blo gros bzang pos gangs can gyi ri'i 'gram na chu klung rjes su 'brang ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281b-14: bdag nyid kyi gnas dang mthun pa'i gnas su blta zhing chu klung bzlog pa'i las sna tshogs las sprul zhing brgya byin gyis byin pa'i gnas yid la dga' ba mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:281b-15: 'chag sa'i dkyus kyi phyogs gcig tu 'gro zhing rkang pa'i rjes mi mthong bar rab tu 'byung ba rnams kyis thag ring po'i grong nas bsod snyoms btsal bas par zhing 'ongs nas lo ma'i khang par zhugs nas gnas so snyam du bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-0: de ma thag tu ma slebs par dus ring por @282a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-1: ma slebs par so sor shes dgos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-2: shing gi khang pa'i khang mig gi sgor zhugs te nang du phyin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-4: de bltas pas rtsig pa chen po la yi ge bris pa bklags nas 'di rnams thams cad bdag gis yo byad du brtag par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-5: de rnams blangs nas rab tu byung ngo zhes bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-6: bdag nyid kyi stod gos dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-7: smad gos zung dag dor ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-10: de ltar bzhugs nas sh'a ri'i bu bdag de'i lo ma'i khang pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-11: skyon dgu dang bcas pa'i gos dor ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-12: de yang skyon dgu gsal bar mthong ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-13: dka' thub ba'i rab tu byung ba rnams la gos skyon dgu dang ldan pa ni rnyed dka' ba'i skyon dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-14: gzhan 'dod pa skye ba'i skyon dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-15: longs spyod pa na myur du dri ma dang ldan pa'i skyon dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-16: dri ma can du gyur na 'khrud pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-18: longs spyod pa na 'dral ba'i skyon dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-21: slar yang tshol ba na rnyed dka' ba'i skyon dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-22: dka' thub pa'i rab tu byung ba la mi rigs pa'i skyon dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282a-23: dgra la sogs pas 'phrog par 'gyur ba'i skyon dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-0: ji ltar yang gos ni dgra la sogs pas mi len pa de'i @282b phyir de bzhin du sbed dgos pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-1: gyon pa na rgyan du 'gyur ba'i skyon dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-2: khyer nas 'gro ba na lus kyi khur po chen por 'gro ba'i skyon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-3: shing shun gyi gos zhes pa ni de'i tshe sh'a ri'i bus bdag 'di'i skyon dgu mthong nas gos dor ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-4: shing shun la rtsva mun dza dum bu dum bur byas nas sbyor zhing sgrog pa ni shing shun la smad gos dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-5: stod gos don du gnyer ba'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-6: yon tan bcu gnyis dang ldan pa zhes pa ni phan yon bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i shing shun gyi gos kyis /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-7: phan yon bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i rin chung ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-10: 'di rnams ni phan yon gcig dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-11: rang gi lag gis bya bar nus pa ni gnyis pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-12: longs spyod pa ni dri ma can du gyur kyang myur du bkru bar nus pa ni gsum pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-13: longs spyod pa na rnyings par gyur kyang brtsem par nus pa ni bzhi pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-14: slar yang tshol ba na bde bar byed nus pa ni lnga pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-15: dka' thub pa'i rab tu 'byung ba la rigs pa ni drug pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-16: chom rkun pa la mi mkho ba ni bdun pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-17: gyon pa na dka' thub pa'i rgyan? du 'gyur ba ni brgyad pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-18: gyon pa na yang par 'gyur ba ni dgu pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:282b-19: chos gos so so la 'dod pa chung ba ni bcu pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283a-0: slong ba na chos pa la khan @283a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283a-1: ma tho ba med pa ni bcu gcig pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283a-2: shing shun gyi gos stor na'ang ltos pa med pa ni bcu gnyis pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283a-3: skyon brgyad dang ldan pa'i lo ma'i khang pa dor zhes pa ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283a-5: de'i gos mchog gnyis kyi rigs su gyur pa aa na'o dza'i me tog gi phreng ba lta bu'i gos dmar po blangs nas smad du gyon te; steng du gzhan yang kha dog ser po'i shing shun gyi gos gyon nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283a-6: phun n'a ga'i me tog gi stan dang 'dra ba'i rkang pa dang bcas pa'i gzig gi pags pa'i g-yang gzhi gyon te ral pa'i khor yug mgo bo la bcings nas gtsug phud brtan par bya ba'i phyir du mkhregs pa'i spyi khab btsugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283a-7: mu tig dra ba bzhin du 'then thag byu ru'i kha dog lta bu'i bum pa nang du bcug ste gnas gsum gyi kyog po'i shing de blangs nas khur shing de'i phyogs gcig la bum pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283a-8: phyogs gnyis la lcags kyu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283a-10: dbyug gu gsum pa la sogs pa bzung zhing khyer nas phrag pa'i khur du khyer te lag pa g-yas su 'khar ba bzung nas lo ma'i khang pa nas byung ste khru drug cu pa'i 'chags chen por phan tshun du 'chag par byed cing rang gi cha lugs la bltas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283b-0: bdag gis 'dod pa yongs su @283b rdzogs par thob bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283b-1: bdag nyid mdzes par rab tu byung nas sangs rgyas dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283b-2: rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i skyes bu dpa' bos bsngags pa dang bstod cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283b-3: rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni khyim gyi 'chib ba spangs nas bdag gis nges par byung zhing rab tu byung ba mchog bdag gis thob pas dge sbyong gi chos bdag gis byas so; ;bde ba'i 'bras bu bdag gis thob nas spro ba skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283b-4: khur dal bus sa la bzhag nas 'chag sa'i dbus su kha dog ser ba'i rdo'i steng du gser gyi gzugs brnyan lta bu bzhugs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283b-5: nyin mo'i cha song nas srod kyi dus su lo ma'i khang pa'i nang du bzhugs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283b-6: shing khri legs po'i bzhog gi steng du nyal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283b-7: lus la ser bus gos par byed cing nam gyi cha smad la langs te bdag yod pa'i don la rtog cing bdag gis khyim gyi gnas kyi skyon mthong nas bdud rtsil longs spyod pa dang grags pa mtha' yas pa spangs nas dgon par gnas te nges par 'byung ba btsal ba'i phyir rab tu byung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283b-8: de nas bzung nas bag med pa'i spyod pa'i rtog pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:283b-9: rab tu dben pa spangs nas 'gro ba log pa'i sbrang mas zabs de ni bdag gis rab tu dben pa dor bar rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284a-0: bdag gis kyang khyim pa'i gnas zang zing dang bcas pa mthong ste phyin nas @284a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284a-1: lo ma'i khang pa yid du 'ong ba 'di'ang kha dog ser pos sa gzhi la zhal ba legs par byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284a-2: dngul gyi kha dog ltar dkar ba'i rtsig pa rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284a-3: thog phug ron gyi rkang ba'i kha dog ltar dmar ba'i lo ma'i bla khab can no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284a-4: sna tshogs pa'i kha dog can gyi shing khri'i stan la nyal ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284a-5: 'dug pa na bde bar lta ba de rnams ni ches cher lhag par khyim pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang 'dra bar mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284a-6: lo ma'i khang pa'i skyon bltas pas skyon brgyad mthong ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284a-7: lo ma'i khang pa la longs spyod pan skyon brgyad po ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284a-8: shing mang po la nor mang po dgos pa dang bsdus nas khang pa byed cing tshol ba ni skyon gcig pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284a-12: yang zad pas na bcos dgos pa rgyun mi 'chad pa ni skyon gnyis pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284a-13: nyal ba'i gnas zhes bya ba na chen po la rigs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284a-14: dus ma yin par slong dgos pas sems gcig tu mi gnas pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284a-15: 'gro dgos pa ni skyon gsum pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284a-19: lus bde bar byed pa ni skyon bzhi pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284a-20: khang ba'i nang du zhugs nas sdig pa byed par nus pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284a-21: ngo tsha ba bzlog pa ni skyon lnga pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284a-22: bdag gi yin no zhes srung ba ni skyon drug pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-1: khyim pa yod ces pa gnyis par skyon bdun pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-4: khyi shig la sogs pa'i srog chags du ma gnas par 'gyur ba ni skyon brgyad pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-5: 'di rnams kyi skyon brgyad po rnams mthong nas sems dpa' chen pos lo ma'i khang pa spangs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-7: skyon brgyad dang ni ldan pa yi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-8: lo ma'i khang pa spangs zhes pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-9: shing gi drung du gnas gyur na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-10: yon tan bcu dang ldan pa yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-11: yib ba'i gnas rnams spangs pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-12: yon tan bcu dang ldan pa yi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-13: shing gi drung du gnas pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-14: zhes brjod pa ni de la yon tan bcu po 'di bsag mi dgos pa ni yon tan gcig dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-15: nyal bar gnas pa tsam gyis bsrung mi dgos par rnyed pa ni gnyis pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-16: der byi dor byed pa med par longs spyod pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-18: slong ba med pa ni gsum pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-19: ngo tsha ba ni yib pa med cing der sdig pa byed pa med la sbed pa med pa ni bzhi pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-20: bla khab med pa'i gnas bzhin du lus rtag tu sdod pa med pa ni lnga pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-21: yongs su 'dzin par mi 'dod pa ni drug pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-22: khyim gyi? 'dod pa spangs pa ni bdun pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-23: mang po dogs pa'i 'dzin pa med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-24: yongs su bsrung ba med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:284b-25: 'gro ba na 'dod pa med pa ni brgyad pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-1: na dga' ba dang bcas pa med pa ni dgu ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-2: shing drung gi gnas ni song zhing song ba na rnyed sla ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-3: ltos pa med pa ni bcu pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-4: yon tan bcu po 'di mthong ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-5: shing gi 'gram du gnas zhes brjod pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-6: 'di lta bu de rnams ni byed par bsams pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-7: sems dpa' chen po sang gi nyi ma la bsod snyoms la gshegs pas de ma thag tu grong du sleb ste mi rnams spro ba chen po skyes nas bsod snyoms byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-8: de'i gdugs tshod thon nas gnas su byon te sleb cing bzhugs nas bsams pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-9: bdag gis bsod snyoms thob pa'i phyir rab tu byung ba ni ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-10: zas zhim po zhes bya ba 'dis nga rgyal gyis rgyags pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-11: skyes bu 'dod pa'i rgyags pa 'phel ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-12: bza' ba'i gzhi la brten nas sdug bsngal mtha' med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-13: bdag gis slar yang btab pa dang bskrun pa las skyes pa'i 'bru'i bza' ba spangs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-14: 'bras bu mchog gi bza' ba la brten par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-15: des de nas de blangs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-16: de ltar byas nas lus sdug bsngal du 'bad pa byas pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-17: zhag bdun gyi nang du snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad po rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285a-18: mngon par shes pa lnga skyes te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-0: btab dang bskrun pa'i 'bru @285b rnams ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-1: lhag ma med par spangs pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-2: yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-4: der ni dka' thub kyi gnas dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-5: sdod dang 'chag pa'i gnas rnams su //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-6: zhag bdun gyi ni nang nyid du //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-7: mngon par shes pa'i stobs thob bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-8: de ltar mngon par shes pa thob nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-9: blo gros bzang lo dka' thub pas bde ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa la gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-10: de'i tshe mar me mdzad ces bya ba'i ston pa 'jig rten du byon par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-11: de mngal du zhugs nas bltams pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-13: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-14: 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu po thams cad g-yos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-18: sngon gyi mtshan mar byur pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-19: blo gros bzang po dka' thub pas snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba la gnas pas de rnams kyi sgra ma thos pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-20: de rnams kyi sngon gyi mtshan ma ma mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-22: stan gcig la ni rten nas su //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-23: bdag gis de ltar grub pa thob //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-24: rgyal ba mar me mdzad ces pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-26: mngal du zhugs nas skyes gyur pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-27: sangs rgyas nas ni chos bstan pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-28: mtshan ma bzhi po mthong ma gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:285b-29: bsam gtan bde bsam thos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286a-1: ldan pa'i mar me mdzad zag pa zad pa 'bum phrag bzhi'i 'khor dang bcas pa go rims bzhin du sems can la phan pa'i phyir 'chag cing dga' ba can zhes bya ba'i grong khyer du byon te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286a-2: blta na sdug ces bya ba'i gtsug lag khang chen por zhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286a-3: dga' ba can zhes bya ba'i grong khyer na gnas pa'i mar me mdzad dge sbyong gi dbang phyug de nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mchog thob nas mchig gi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286a-4: de ltar rim gyis sems can la phan pa'i don du 'chag cing dga' ba can gyi grong khyer du byon te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286a-5: blta na sdug gi gtsug lag khang chen por bzhugs pa de de na gnas pa rnams kyis thos nas mar gsar dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286a-6: zhun mar la sogs pas dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286a-9: mal cha la sogs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286a-10: dri'i phreng ba la sogs pa lag tu thogs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286a-14: de rnams la 'dud cing de la dga' ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286a-15: de la shin tu gus pa dang bcas pas ston pa'i drung du song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286a-16: phyag byas nas dri la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-0: phyogs gcig tu 'khod cing chos bstan pa mnyan nas sang mgron du @286b gnyer te rang gi gnas nas song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-1: de rnams byas nas sang sbyin pa chen po sta gon byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-3: stobs bcu la byon pa'i mam brgyan te chu yis sa gzhi mi mnyam pa'i gnas rnams sus blugs nas sa gzhi mnyam par byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-4: dngul gye mdog lta bu'i byems spras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-5: me tog gi phreng ba nyid dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-6: me tog gi sil ma dgram par byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-7: kha dog sna tshogs pa'i gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-8: bden la sogs pa bsgreng bar byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-10: bum pa gang ba rnams sgrigs nas bzhag par byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-11: de'i tshe blo gros bzang po dka' thub pas rang gi gnas nas steng du 'phags te mi de rnams kyi steng gi cha'i mkha' la 'gro ba de la mi rnams dga' zhing tshim pas mthing ste nam mkha' nas sa la phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa la mi rnams kyis bris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-12: bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams lam 'di rnams su zhig gis brkyen par byas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-14: yul dang phyogs kyi mthar gnas pa'i //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa mgron du gnyer //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-16: de nyid byin nas lam 'di ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-17: sems ni dga' bas lam phyogs gcig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-18: bdag ni de tshe de yi dus //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-19: rang gi gnas ni byed pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:286b-20: shing shun gos ni rlung gis g-yo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287a-2: dga' dang tshim dang bde ba yis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287a-3: skye bo lam 'phyag byed pa mthong //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287a-4: nam mkha' las ni byon nas su //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287a-5: de ma thag par mi la 'dri //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287a-6: dga' 'ang tshim la bde ba yi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287a-7: mkhas shing rig pa'i skye bo che //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287a-8: lam ni snyoms par byed lan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287a-10: mi rnams kyis smras pa; btsun pa dka' thub pa blo gros bzang po nyid kyis mi mkhyen nam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287a-11: stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mar me mdzad kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287a-13: sems can rnams la phan pa'i don du 'chag cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287a-14: bdag cag gi grong khyer du byon nas blta na sdug gi gtsug lag khang chen por bzhugs la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das de mgron du gnyer to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287a-15: de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de byon pa'i lam brgyan par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287a-16: dka' thub pa blo gros bzang pos bsams pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287a-17: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra tsam yang 'jig rten du rnyed par dka'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287a-18: de ltar sangs rgyas byon pa la bdag mi 'di rnams dang bcas pas stobs bcu pa'i lam brgyan par byed par rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287a-19: des mi rnams la gsungs pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287b-0: gal te khyod rnams kyis lam 'di rnams @287b sangs rgyas kyi ched du brgyan par gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287b-1: bdag la'ang gnas gcig sbyin bar gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287b-2: bdag gis kyang khyed rnams dang 'grogs nas lam brgyan par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287b-3: de rnams kyis legs so zhes bsams nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287b-4: dka' thub pa blo gros bzang pos rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par shes nas chu yis gnod par byas pa'i gnas phan tshun du bsams nas de la gnas brgyan par gyis shig ces byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287b-5: blo gros bzang po sangs rgyas la dga' nas bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287b-6: bdag gis gnas 'dir rdzu 'phrul gyis brgyan par nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287b-7: ji ltar brgyan par byas kyang bdag gi yid tshim par med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287b-8: bdag gis de ring lus dub par byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287b-9: sa rnams blangs nas gnas der blug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287b-10: de de yis phyogs de brgyan pa ma grub par stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mar me mdzad thub pa chen po dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287b-11: mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa zag pa zad pa 'bum phrag bzhi'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la lha rnams kyis lha'i dri bzang dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287b-12: me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pas mchod par byed cing lha'i glu dbyangs dang bcas pa sgrogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:287b-13: mi rnams kyis mi'i dri bzang dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288a-0: me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pas mchod par byed cing mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rol ba'i rim no shi la'i steng du seng ge sgra sgrogs pa @288a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288a-2: de'i lam brgyan par byas nas lam du byon /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288a-3: blo gros bzang po dka' thub pas mig gis bltas nas lam brgyan pa la stobs bcu pa byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288a-4: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288a-5: dbe byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar gsal ba /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288a-6: 'od 'dom gang gis yongs su bskor ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288a-7: nor bu'i kha dog lta bu nam mkha'i mthil la sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa glog gi 'od lta bu dus dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288a-8: dus ma yin par 'byung ba nyid zung dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288a-10: kha dog drug dang ldan pa'i tshogs sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer 'phro zhing gzugs mchog thob pa'i bdag nyid bltas nas de ring bdag gis stobs bcu pa la srog yongs su gtong bar rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288a-12: 'jim ba'i steng du 'gro bar mi rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288a-13: nor bu'i spang leb kyi ?zam pa la zhabs gnon cing gshegs pa lta bur zag pa zad pa 'bum phrag bzhi dang lhan cig bdag gi rgyab gnon cing gshegs su gsol //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288a-14: de ni bdag la yun ring por phan pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288a-15: bde bar 'gyur ro; ;skra bkrol te gzig gi pags pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288a-17: 'jim pa nag po'i steng nor bu'i spang leb kyi zam pa lta bu'i 'jim ba'i steng du nyal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-1: bdag gis de la dri lung bstan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-3: rgyal ba mar me mdzad ces pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-5: mi mnyam lam ni 'chos pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-6: de yi lam ni byi dor byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-7: sangs rgyas zhes pa bdag gis thos //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-8: de ma thag tu dga' ba skyes //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-9: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes brjod pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-10: yid bde dga' ba skyes par gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-11: tshim zhing dga' ba skyes pa'i sems //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-12: de ru 'khor te rnam par bsam //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-13: 'dir ni sa bon bskrun byas nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-14: de ma thag tu bdag la skye; ;gal te sangs rgyas ched byi dor //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-15: ma bcos gnas gcig bdag la byin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-16: bdag kyang byi dor byed pa yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-18: de tshe lam ni byi dor byar //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-19: bdag la ma bcos gnas gcig byin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-20: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bsam zhing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-22: bdag gi gnas ni ma grub par //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-23: thub pa chen po mar me mdzad //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-24: mngon shes drug po mtshungs ldan par //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-25: 'bum phrag bzhi po rnams la ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-26: dri ma med cing zag pa zad //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-27: rgyal ba lam du byon par gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-28: bsu ba byed pa po rnams ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-29: rol mo rnams ni dkrol ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-30: lha dang mi rnams yi rang byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-31: legs so zhes pa'i tshig byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:288b-32: lha yis mi rnams mthong ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-1: rnams kyis kyang lha rnams mthong //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-2: de gnyis kyi ni thal mo sbyor //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-3: de bzhin gshegs dang thabs gcig 'gro /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-4: lha dang lha yi rol mo dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-5: mi dang mi yi rol mo dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-6: gnyis ka yang ni rol mo dkrol //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-7: de bzhin gshegs dang thabs gcig 'gro /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-8: lha mi me tog man d'a ra //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-9: padma pa ri tshad tra ka /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-10: phyogs dang mtshams su me tog 'thor //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-11: lha rnams mkha' la gnas nas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-12: tsam pa kam sh'a la lam ni pam//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-13: n'a g'a punn'a g'a ke ta kam/
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-14: stong gis phyogs dang mtshams su 'thor //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-15: sa steng 'gro ba mi rnams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-16: der ni bdag gi skra bkrol nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-17: shing shun chos gos gzig lpags ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-18: 'jim ba'i steng du bting nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-19: kha bub tu ni bdag gis nyal //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-20: 'jim pa'i steng nas mi gshegs par //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-21: bdag ni gnon cing sangs rgyas rnams //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-22: slob ma 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-23: bdag la phan par 'gyur ba yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-24: de 'jim pa'i steng du nyal nas slar yang mig gis blta zhing stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mar me mdzad sangs rgyas kyi 'byor pa yang dag par bltas nas de ltar bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-25: gal te bdag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhom par 'dod pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289a-26: dge 'dun rnams kyi gzhon nur 'gyur bar bya ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-0: dga' @289b ba can gyi grong khyer du 'jug par 'dod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-1: gzhan gyi cha lugs kyis kyang nyon mongs pa 'di gzhom par byas nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-2: mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa la don med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-3: stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mar me mdzad bdag gis ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-4: mchog gi byang chub thob nas skye bo mang po 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la grur zhugs nas pha rol tu bsgral bar byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-5: phyis mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba 'di ni bdag gis rigs pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-6: de nas chos brgyad po gcig tu bsdu ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-7: sangs rgyas 'dod par smon pas sems la lta zhing nyal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-9: sa gzhi la ni nyal nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-10: bdag gis de ltar bsams pa nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-11: bdag ni de ring 'dod pa yi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-12: bdag gi nyon mongs gzhom pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-13: bdag ni cha lugs gzhan gyis kyang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-15: thams cad mkhyen pa thob gyur nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-16: lha dang bcas pa sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-17: bdag nyid gcig bu grol nas ci //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-18: skyes bu mthu ldan mthong ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-19: thams cad mkhyen pa thob gyur nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-20: lha dang mi rnams yang dag bsgral //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-21: bdag gi 'di yi gzhi yis ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-22: mthu dang ldan pa mthong ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-23: thams cad mkhyen pa thob nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-24: skye bo mang po bdag gis bsgral //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:289b-25: 'khor ba'i mdud pa bcad nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-0: @290a *// srid gsum po ni zad byas la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-1: chos kyi gru yi nang zhugs nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-2: lha dang mi rnams yang dag bsgral //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-3: gang zhig slar yang sangs rgyas don du gnyer ba'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-4: mi yi lus ni mtshan mar ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-5: ston pa'i lta ba'i rgyu dang ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-6: rab byung yon tan ldan pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-7: rigs pa dang ni 'dun pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-8: chos brgyad po ni bsdus nas su //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-10: mi yi lus la gnas shing sangs rgyas nyid don du gnyer ba phun sum tshogs pa 'grub bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-13: lha rnams kyis de don du gnyer yang mi 'grub bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-14: mi yi lus su gyur cing skyes bu'i mtshan gnas pas ni de don du gnyer ba 'grub bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-18: mtshan gnyis pas ni 'grub pa ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-19: skyes bur gyur nas des lus su 'dod pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-20: dgra bcom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir du yongs su rdzogs par 'grub bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-21: gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-22: sgyu dang ldan zhing gal te 'tsho ba dang ldan ba'i sangs rgyas kyi drung du don du gnyer na don du 'grub bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-23: sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod rten gyi drung du'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290a-24: byang chub shing gi drung du don du gnyer bas ni mi 'grub bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290b-0: sangs rgyas kyi drung du don du gnyer kyang rab tu byung @290b pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan pas 'grub kyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290b-1: khyim pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan pas ni ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290b-2: rab tu byung yang mngon par shes ba lnga dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290b-3: snyoms par 'jug par brgyad thob pas 'dod pa 'grub kyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290b-4: yon tan 'di rnams dang bral bas ni ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290b-5: yon tan dang ldan yang gang zhig 'tsho ba dang ldan pa'i lus sangs rgyas la yongs su btang na 'grub kyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290b-6: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290b-7: de yi gzhi 'dis gzhi yongs su rdzogs nas 'grub bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290b-8: gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290b-9: gzhi dang ldan yang gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi phyir du 'dun pa chen po dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290b-12: yongs su 'bad pa rnams kyis 'grub bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290b-13: gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290b-14: de la 'dir 'dun pa chen po'i dpe ni gal te 'di ltar gang zhig 'jig rten thams cad kyi khor yug gi nang chu yis gang bar gyur pa la bdag gis lag pas brkyal te pha rol tu 'gro bar nus na des sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:290b-15: yang na gang du gang zhig slar yang thams cad kyi khor yug gi nang du 'o ma mang pos bkang ste rkang pas nyen cing rdul du byed pas pha rol tu 'gro bar nus na de yis sangs rgyas thob par nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291a-0: yang na gang zhig slar yang thams cad kyi khor yug gi nang du mtshon cha rnams @291a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291a-1: kha gyen la bstan pa'i mtshon rtse mo bar med pas yongs su gang ba la rkang pas rdzi zhing pha rol tu 'gro bar nus na des sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291a-2: yang na gang zhig gis slar yang 'jig rten khor yug gi nang du sol ba 'bar bas yongs su gang bar byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291a-3: rkang pas rdzi zhing pha rol tu 'gro bar nus na de yis sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291a-4: gang zhig de rnams las gang zhig la sdug bsngal bar mi sems par bdag gi 'di rnams kyang pha rol tu bsgral ba'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291a-6: pha rol tu 'gro bar bya'o zhes shes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291a-7: de de ltar 'dun pa chen po dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291a-10: 'bad pa rnams dang yang dag par ldan na de yi don du gnyer ba 'grub bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291a-11: gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291a-12: blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa slar yang chos brgyad po 'di rnams bsdus nas sangs rgyas 'dod pa'i smon lam btab nas nyal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291a-13: bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad kyis kyang byon nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291b-0: blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa'i mgo'i gam du bzhugs te; nor bu seng ge'i khang pa'i gzeb kyi sgor bton pa bzhin du kha dog lnga pa rab tu dvangs pa dang ldan ba'i spyan gyis gzigs nas 'jim pa'i steng na nyal ba'i @291b blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa gzigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291b-1: dka' thub pa 'di sangs rgyas thob pa'i phyir du smon lam 'debs shing nyal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291b-2: 'di yi don du gnyer ba 'grub bam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291b-3: mi 'grub snyam du dgongs nas ma 'ongs pa'i ye shes kyis rtog cing spyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291b-4: 'di nas bskal pa grangs med ba bzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291b-5: 'bum phrag gcig lhag 'das nas goo ta ma? zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhes rtogs nas 'khor gyi nang du lung ston pas bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291b-6: mchog gi dka' thub kyi dka' thub pa 'di 'jim pa'i steng na nyal ba khyed rnams kyis mthong ngam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291b-11: 'dis sangs rgyas thob par bsams nas nyal to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291b-13: 'di'i don du gnyer ba 'grub par 'gyur lags sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291b-15: 'di nas bskal pa grangs med pa bzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291b-16: 'bum phrag gcig lhag 'das nas goo ta ma zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291b-17: de la slar yang 'di grong khyer ser skya'i gnas su 'khrungs par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291b-18: lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma chen mo zhes bya ba ni yum mo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291b-19: rgyal po zas gtsang ma zhes bya ba ni yab bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291b-20: nyan thos kyi mchog ni gnas brtan nye rgyal dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291b-21: nyan thos gnyis pa ni gnas brtan pang nas skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:291b-22: sangs rgyas kyi nye gnas ni kun dga' bo zhes bya ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-1: ma'i mchog ni gnas brtan ma dge ma zhes pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-2: nyan thos ma gnyis pa ni gnas brtan ma autpa la'i mdog can zhes bya bar 'gyur ro; ;ye shes yongs su smin par gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-3: nges par 'byung ba chen po byas nas dka' thub chen po rdzogs par byas te n+ya gro dha'i shing drung du 'o thug blangs nas chu klung neer dza ra'i 'gram du gsol lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-4: byang chub kyi snying por gshegs te aa shvattha'i shing drung du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-5: de'i phyir gsungs pa; mar me mdzad pa 'jig rten mkhyen //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-6: sems can phan phyir 'jig rten byung //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-7: bdag gi mgo bo'i gam 'dug ste //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-8: 'di lta bu yi tshig gsungs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-9: dka' thub pa 'di ltos shig dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-10: dka' ba mchog gi ral pa 'dzin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-13: ser skya dga' ba'i grong du 'khrungs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa nges par 'byung //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-15: dka' thub gnas su gnas na ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-16: shin tu dka' ba'i dka' thub spyad //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-17: aa tsa pa la'i shing drung du //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas su //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-19: der ni'o thug blangs nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-21: nee ra dza ra'i 'gram du ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292a-22: 'o thug rgyal bas longs spyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-0: lam @292b gyi mchog gi ched du ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-1: byang chub gzhir ni byon 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-2: bla med byang chub snying po la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-3: de nas bskor ba byas nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-4: aa shvattha yi drung du ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-5: grags chen zhes pa sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-6: 'di yi skye ba'i yum gyur pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-7: sgyu ma zhes par 'gyur ba yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-8: yab ni zas gtsang zhes bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-10: zag pa zad cing 'dod chags bral //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-11: zhi ba'i sems dang mtshungs par ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-12: pang nas skyes dang nye rgyal ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-13: nyan thos rnams kyi mchog yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-14: nye gnas kun dga' bo zhes pas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-15: rgyal ba de la zhabs tog byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-16: dge ma dang ni autpal mdog /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-17: nyan thos ma yi mchog yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-18: phrag pa med cing 'dod chags bral //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-19: zhi ba'i sems dang mtshungs par ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-20: de yi bcom ldan byang chub shing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-22: de thos nas blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa bdag gis don du gnyer ba grub par 'gyur bas yid bde ba thob par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-23: skye bo mang pos stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mar me mdzad kyi gsung thos nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-24: blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa sangs rgyas kyi sa bon gyi myu gur gyur pas dga' ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:292b-26: de lta bur gyur pa'i sems kyis /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293a-0: ji ltar skyes bu chu klung gi pha rol tu 'gro ba na mu 'gram drang po nas pha rol tu 'gro bar mi nus na 'og @293a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293a-1: gi cha'i mu gnas nas pha rol tu 'gro'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293a-2: de ltar 'di ltar bdag gis stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mar me mdzad kyi bstan pa la lam gyi 'bras bu ma thob par gyur na gang gi tshe khyod ma 'ongs pa na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293a-3: sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293a-4: de'i tshe khyod kyis mngon sum du lam 'bras bu mngon du byed pa bdag gis nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293a-5: don du gnyer bar byas nas stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mar me mdzad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bsngags pa brjod cing me tog snyim pa brgyad kyis gtor nas bskor ba byas te gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293a-6: 'bum phrag bzhi po zag pa zad pa de rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la dri bzang dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293a-7: me tog gis mchod nas bskor ba byas te gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293a-9: mi rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du mchod nas phyag btsal te song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293a-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad song ba'i dus su nyal ba'i gnas nas langs te pha rol tu phyin pa bsams pa'i phyir me tog gi phung po'i steng du skyil krung bcas nas 'dug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293a-11: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs nas 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi lha rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293b-0: 'phags pa blo gros bzang po @293b dka' thub pa sngar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang skyil krung bcas te pha rol tu sems shing sngon gyi dus na bzhugs bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi mtshan ma mthong nas de rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams kyang de ring skyes par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293b-1: the tshom med par khyod sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bdag gis de rnams shes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293b-2: gang gis 'di rnams kyi mtshan ma mthong bar gyur pas de nges par sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293b-3: de la khyod bdag nyid brtson 'grus brtan po mchog bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sna tshogs pa'i bstod pa byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293b-6: mtshungs med drang srong chen po la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293b-7: lha dang mi rnams rjes yi rang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293b-8: sangs rgyas sa bon myu gu 'di //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293b-9: sgra ni chen po sgrogs byed cing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293b-10: gsal bar bzhad par byed pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293b-11: thal mo sbyar nas phyag byed pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293b-12: stong phrag bcu yi lha dang bcas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293b-17: ji ltar chu klung pha rol mi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293b-18: 'gro ba po yi mu gnas la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293b-19: 'og gi mu nas bzung nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293b-20: chu klung chen po'i pha rol 'gro /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:293b-21: de ltar 'di ltar bdag gis ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-2: ma 'ongs pa ni mang song nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-3: 'di ni mngon sum gyur pa yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-4: mar me mdzad ni 'jig rten mkhyen //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-6: bdag gis lam rnams bsal byas nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-7: rkang pa g-yas pa bteg byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-8: gang zhig de la rgyal sras ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-9: bdag la kun gyis bskor ba byas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-10: mi dang klu dang dri za rnams //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-11: phyag byas nas ni gshegs par gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-13: bdag gis gshegs pa mthong ba na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-14: dga' zhing tshim pa'i sems kyis ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-15: de tshe bdag gis stan las langs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-16: bdag ni bde zhing bde bar 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-17: dga' zhing dga' bar gyur pa ste //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-18: dga' dang ldan par skye ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-19: de yi tshe na skyil krung bcas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-20: skyil krung la ni gnas nas su //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-21: de la bdag gis 'di ltar bsams //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-22: bdag gis bsam gtan dbang du gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-23: ye shes kyi ni pha rol phyin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-24: stong phrag gi ni 'jig rten na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-25: nga dang mtshungs pa'i drang srong med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-26: rdzu 'phrul chos ni bdag mi mtshungs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-28: bdag gis skyil krung bcas na bdag /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-29: stong phrag bcu lhag gnas nas su //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294a-30: sgra chen po ni sgrogs par byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-0: nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas @294b 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-1: gang zhig byang sems sngon ma rnams //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-2: skyil krung du ni bzhugs nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-3: mtshan ma rnams ni mthong ba ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-4: de rnams de ring mthong ba yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-5: grang ba rnams ni med par gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-6: dro ba rnams ni nye bar zhi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-7: de rnams de ring so sor mthong //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-8: nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-9: stong phrag bcu yi 'jig rten khams //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-11: de rnams de ring so sor mthong //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-12: nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-13: rlung chen po ni mi ldang zhing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-14: chu rnams rgyun las log pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-15: de rnams de ring so sor mthong //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-16: nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-17: thad skyes chu skyes me tog rnams //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-18: thams cad du ni me tog bye //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-19: de rnams de ring me tog bye //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-20: nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-21: 'khri shing yang na shing gyur pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-22: de ma thag tu 'bras bur gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-23: de rnams de kun 'bras gyur pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-24: nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-25: nam mkha' dang ni sa gzhi la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-28: nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gro /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-29: lha rnams dang ni mi rnams ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-30: de dag rol mo'i sgra sgrogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-31: de rnams de ring sgra 'byin pas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-32: khyod ni nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-33: me tog sna tshogs pa yi tshogs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:294b-34: de ma thag tu char pa 'bebs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:295a-2: nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:295a-3: rgya mtsho chen po mi g-yo zhing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:295a-4: 'jig rten stong phrag bcu po g-yo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:295a-5: de rnams de ring gyur pas na //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:295a-8: de ma thag tu bsreg dang bral //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:295a-9: de rnams de ring zhi bas na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:295a-10: nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:295a-15: char pa 'bab par ma gyur kyang //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:295b-9: nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur //
