K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-2: ji ltar na ri bo ni phyogs thams cad nas rlung gis bskyod kyang g-yo bar mi 'gyur zhing bskyod par mi 'gyur la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-3: rang gi gnas shig tu gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-4: de ltar 'di ltar khyod kyis kyang bdag nyid lhag par gnas pa rnams mi g-yo bar gyur na sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-5: brgyad pa lhag par gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brtan par byas nas gnas par gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-8: gang zhig byang chub thob 'dod chos //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-9: gzhan pa yang ni btsal bar bya //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-10: gang zhig chos 'di thob byed pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-11: de yi tshe na tshol ba mthong //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-12: brgyad pa lhag gnas pha rol phyin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-13: sngon gyi skyes bu chen po yis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-14: bsnyen dang bsten par byas pas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-15: re zhig brgyad pa 'di yis ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-16: brtan par bya ste gnas par gyis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-17: de la khyod ni g-yo med pas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-18: yang dag byang chub thob par 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-19: ji ltar ri bo'i brag chen po //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-20: g-yo ba med cing legs par gnas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-21: rlung chen pos ni g-yo ba med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:301b-22: rang gi gnas su gnas pa nyid //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302a-2: thams cad du ni mi g-yo bar //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302a-3: lhag gnas pha rol phyin gyur pas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302a-4: yang dag byang chub thob par 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302a-6: sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos 'di 'ba' zhig ma yin par blta bar bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302a-7: lhag par tshol ba na dgu pa byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong bas de lta bu'i khams su gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302a-8: mkhas pa blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa khyod kyis 'di nas bzung nas byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rdzogs par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302a-10: mi phan par gyur kyang sems gcig tu bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302a-11: ji ltar chu ni sdig pa can gyi skye bo dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302a-12: dge ba'i skye bos kyang bsil bar gyur cing gcig tu mtshungs par byas nas reg go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302a-13: de ltar na 'di ltar khyod kyis kyang sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems gcig tu gyur nas sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302a-14: dgu ba byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brtan par byas te gnas par gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302a-18: gzhan pa yang ni btsal bar bya //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302a-19: gang zhig chos 'di thob byed pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302a-20: de yi tshen tshol ba mthong //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302a-21: dgu pa byams pa'i pha rol phyin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302a-22: sngon gyi skyes bu chen po yis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302a-23: bsnyen dang bsten par byas pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-0: re zhig dgu pa 'di @302b yis ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-1: byams par byas te gnas par gyis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-2: gal te byang chub thob 'dod na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-3: byams pa mtshungs pa med par 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-4: ji ltar chu zhes bya ba la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-5: dge 'am sdig pa'i skye po ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-6: mtshungs par bsil bar gyur la reg /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-7: rdul dang drim spong bar byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-8: de ltar khyod kyis mi phan dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-9: ban la'ang mtshungs par byams par bya //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-10: byams pa'i pha rol phyin gyur nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-11: yang dag byang chub thob par 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-12: gzhan yang sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos 'di 'ba' zhig ma yin par blta bar bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-13: lhag par tshol ba na bcu la btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong nas 'di lta bu yi sems su gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-14: mkhas pa blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa khyod kyis 'di nas bzung nas btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rdzogs par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-16: sdug bsngal yang bar ma la gnas par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-17: ji ltar sa gzhi la gtsang ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-18: mi gtsang bas byugs kyang bar mar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-19: de ltar 'di ltar khyod kyis kyang bde ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-20: sdug bsngal ba la bar mar gnas par gyur na sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:302b-21: bcu pa ? snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtan par byas la gnas par gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-2: gzhan pa yang ni btsal bar gyis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-3: gang zhig chos ni thob byed pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-4: de yi tshe na tshol ba mthong //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-5: bcu pa btang snyoms pha rol phyin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-6: sngon gyi skyes bu chen po yis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-7: bsnyen dang bsten par byas pas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-8: re zhig bcu pa 'di yis ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-9: brtan par byas nas gnas par gyis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-10: srang ni gang bar 'gyur ba bzhin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-11: yang dag byang chub thob par 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-12: ji ltar sa gzhi zhes bya la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-13: gtsang dang mi gtsang byugs pa na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-14: ltos pa med cing btang snyoms pas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-15: khro ba med par spong ba yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-16: ji ltar khyod kyis kyang bde sdug /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-17: dus rnams kun tu srang bzhin du //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-18: btang snyoms pha rol phyin gyur nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-19: yang dag byang chub thob par 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-21: 'jig rten pa 'di rnams byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub rdzogs par byed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-22: sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos de rnams nyid do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-23: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dor na gzhan med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-24: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po 'di ni steng gi nam mkha' na'ang med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-25: 'og gi sa gzhi la'ang med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-26: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams na'ang med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303a-27: bdag nyid kho na'i snying gi sha'i nang na gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-0: de ltar de yi snying la so so gnas pa mthong nas thams cad brtan par @303b bya ste gnas par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-2: yang du dran par bya ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-4: lugs las zlog pa brtan par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-5: tham nas bzung ste thog ma'i bar bsam par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-6: dang po nas bzung nas tha ma'i bar bsam mo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-7: dbus nas bzung nas thog ma nas tha ma'i bar bsam par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-9: tham nas bzung nas dbus kyi bar blta bar bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-10: lus yongs su gtong ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-11: phyi'i longs spyod yongs su gtong ba ni nye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-12: srog yongs su gtong ba ni don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-13: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-14: nye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-15: don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-16: me yi steng du 'bru mar bskol ba bzhin du khor yug gi nang du rgya mtsho chen po ri bo mchog rab kyis bsgrub pa bzhin du dran par bya ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-17: de yi pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dran par byas nas chos kyi gzis 'bum phrag gnyis dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-18: stong phrag bzhi bcu lhag pa'i sa chen po 'di yi stugs la glang po che'i rkang pas gnon cing smyug ma 'chag pa bzhin du'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-19: bur shing gi 'khrul 'khor bzhin du btsir ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:303b-20: sgra chen po sgrogs pa bzhin du yang dag par sgrogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304a-2: rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304a-3: 'bru mar gyi 'khrul 'khor bzhin du yongs su bskor ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304a-6: gang zhig byang chub thob byed chos //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304a-7: 'di ni steng dang gzhan na'ang med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304a-8: brtan par bya ste sems la zhog /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304a-9: rang bzhin gyis ni g-yo med par //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304a-10: 'di yi chos ni dran par byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304a-11: chos kyi gzhi yi sa gzhi ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304a-12: 'jig rten stong phrag rab tu g-yos //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304a-13: sems med pa yis gzhi ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304a-16: de ltar sa ni rab tu g-yos //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304a-17: sa chen 'di g-yos pas dga' ba can gyi grong khyer na gnas pa'i mi rnams ldang bar ma nus te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304a-18: bskal ba'i mtha' yi rlung gis bskyod pa'i sa'i shing chen po g-yos pa bzhin brgyal ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304a-19: bag med pas 'gyel par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304a-20: bum pa la sogs pa'i snod ni 'dzad pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304a-21: phan tshun du 'phrad pa'i sgra dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304a-24: skye bo thams cad 'jigs par gyur nas ston pa'i drung du nye bar song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304b-1: bdag cag gis 'tshal bar ma gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304b-3: 'di'i skye bo chen po thams cad la nye bar 'tshe bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304b-4: ci yi rgyu 'di'i 'jig rten gyi sdig pa las gyur ram /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304b-5: yang na dge ba las gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304b-6: bdag cag la 'di rnams kyi rgyu mtshan rnams gsung du gsol zhes zhus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304b-7: ston pas de rnams kyi gtam thos nas khyed rnams 'jigs par ma byed cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304b-8: khyed rnams cung zad kyang ma sems shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304b-9: mtshan ma 'di rnams la khyed rnams la 'jigs pa med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304b-10: gang tshe bdag gis de ring mkhas pa klo gros bzang po dka' thub pa ma 'ongs pa na go tam zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304b-12: de ni 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa dran par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304b-13: des pha rol tu phyin pa dran par byed cing dpyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304b-14: de'i chos kyi gzi brjid kyis stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad skad cig tsam gyis g-yo ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304b-17: ji srid 'khor rnams yod pa la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304b-18: sangs rgyas kyis ni skyel bas na; ;de ni de du sdug bsngal sems //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304b-19: brgyal bar gyur nas sa la nyal //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304b-20: bum pa stong phrag du ma dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:304b-21: snod byed brgya phrag mang po rnams //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-0: der ni phye ma zhib mor @305a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-2: phan tshun thug cing chag bas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-3: brgyal dang skrag dang 'jigs pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-4: gnod cing gzir ba'i sems kyis 'gyel //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-5: skye bo thams cad gcig tu 'dus //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-6: mar me mdzad kyi drung du song //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-7: 'jig rten pa rnams ci phyir gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-8: dge 'am yang ni sdig gam ci //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-10: spyan ldan legs par gsung du gsol //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-11: de rnams kun la chos bstan cing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-12: thub pa chen po mar me mdzad //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-13: 'jigs par ma byed dbugs dbyung gis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-14: 'di yi sa gzhi g-yo bas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-15: gang zhig de ring bdag lung bstan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-17: de ni chos ni dran par byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-18: sngon gyi rgyal ba bsten byas shing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-19: de yi chos rnams dran byed pas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-20: sangs rgyas sa ni ma lus pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-22: lha dang bcas pa stong phrag bcu //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-23: skye bo chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos pas dga' ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-27: byug pa rnams blangs te dga' ba can gyi grong khyer nas 'thon nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-28: byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste me tog la sogs pas mchod nas phyag dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305a-30: dga' ba can gyi grong khyer nyid du gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305b-0: byang chub sems dpas @305b kyang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dran par byas nas brtson 'grus brtan par byas te lhag par gnas nas stan las langs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305b-2: sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung thos nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305b-3: de ma thag tu 'jigs med sems //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305b-4: thams cad bdag gi drung du 'ongs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305b-5: slar yang phyag ni byas nas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305b-6: sangs rgyas yon tan sems par byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305b-7: de tshe bdag gis stan las langs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305b-8: mar me mdzad la phyag byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' stan las langs pa na stong phrag bcu'i lha thams cad 'dus nas lha'i me tog dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305b-10: dri bzang gis mchod pa byas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305b-11: 'phags pa blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa de yis de ring stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mar me mdzad kyi zhabs drung du don chen po don du gnyer ba'i phyir don du gnyer to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305b-12: de yis de rnams la bar gcod med cing rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305b-13: de la 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305b-14: zhum ba med par 'gyur ro; ;sku la nad cung zad kyang mi 'byung zhing myur du pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par byas nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grub par gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305b-15: ji ltar me tog can gyi shing ngam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:305b-16: 'bras bu can gyi shing dus su me tog smin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-0: de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang de'i dus su lhag par gnas par byed pa la myur du mchog @306a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-1: rdzogs par byed pa la sogs pa'i bstod pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-3: de bzhin du bstod pa byas nas lha rnams rang rang gi gnas su song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-4: byang chub sems dpas kyang lha la sogs pa'i bstod pa thos par byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-5: bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rdzogs par byas te bskal ba grangs med pa bzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-6: 'bum phrag gcig lhag pa'i mthar sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur bas brtson 'grus brtan po lhag par gnas nas nam mkha' la 'phags te gangs can kyi gnas nyid la gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-8: lha dang mi yi me tog rnams //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-9: lha dang mi rnams gnyis ka yis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-10: stan las langs par gyur nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-11: me tog mtshungs par bsdus nas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-12: lha dang mi rnams gnyis ka yang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-13: thams cad zhi bar gyur ces bstod //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-14: khyod kyis chen po don du gnyer //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-15: ji ltar 'dod pa de thob bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-16: dus min 'chi ba ring du song //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-17: nad rnams thams cad nyams par gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-18: khyod la bar chad mi 'byung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-19: mchog gi byang chub myur du thob //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-20: ji ltar dus su sleb pa na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-21: ljon shing me tog bye bar gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-22: de bzhin khyod kyis dpa' chen pos //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-23: sangs rgyas ye shes me tog gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306a-24: gang zhig ji ltar rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-0: pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs @306b par byas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-1: de bzhin khyod kyi dpa' chen pos //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-2: pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs par gyis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-3: ji ltar gang zhig rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-4: byang chub snying po rdzogs par gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-5: de bzhin khyod kyi dpa' chen pos //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-6: rgyal ba'i byang chub rdzogs par gyis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-7: gang zhig ji ltar rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-8: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-9: de bzhin khyod kyi dang 'chen pos //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-10: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-11: ji ltar bla ba nya ba bzhin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-13: de bzhin khyod kyi bsam rdzogs pa'i //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-14: stong phrag bcu yi 'od phyung zhig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-15: nyi ma sgra gcan las grol ba //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-17: de bzhin 'jig rten grol byas nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-18: khyod kyi dpal ldan 'od zer byung //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-19: gang zhig ji ltar chu klung ni; ;rgya mtsho chen po'i rjes su 'gro /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-20: de ltar lha mi'i 'jig rten tshogs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-22: de rnams khyod la bston cing bsngags //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-23: chos bcu po la gnas byas nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-24: de yi chos rnams rdzogs? byed cing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-25: de tshe nags tshal chen por phyin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-26: mkhas ba blo gros bzang po'i gtam du bya ba rdzogs so ////
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:306b-27: dga' ba can gyi grong khyer du gnas pa rnams grong khyer du zhugs nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la sbyin pa chen bo gtong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-1: la chos bstan cing bstan nas skye bo mang po skyabs su 'gro ba la gnas par byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-2: dga' ba can gyi grong khyer nas thon te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-3: lhag par gnas pa ji srid 'tsho yi bar de srid du gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad byed cing go ri ma bzhin du lhag ma med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-4: de la cung zad brjod pas de thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rgyud la brjod pa'i rig pa de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-6: de tshe khyed rnams mchod ston byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-8: de la skyabs su 'gro ba yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-9: ston pa mar me mdzad pa la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-10: de bzhin gshegs pas nges gsungs pa'i //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-11: gang zhig skyabs su 'gro bar gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-12: gang zhig tshul khrims lnga dang ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-13: gzhan yang tshul khrims btsu po yi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-14: gang zhig la ni gzhan byin pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-15: mchog gi 'bras bu bzhi po dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-16: gang zhig la ni mtshungs med chos //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-17: so so yang dag rig pa byin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-18: phun tshogs mchog ni gang zhig la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-19: brgyan nas mi yi khyu mchog byin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-20: gang zhig la ni rig pa gsum //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-21: mngon par shes pa drug la zhugs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307a-22: de yi rig pa skye bo'i tshogs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-0: thub pa chen po'i @307b gdams pa byin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-1: de yis rgya chen por ni gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-3: khyu mchog phrag ba 'gram chen po //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-4: mar me mdzad kyi mtshan dang ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-5: skye bo mang po sgrol bar byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-6: ngan 'gro yongs su grol bar byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-7: grol pa'i phyir du skye bo mthong //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-8: stong phrag brgya yi dpag tshad du //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-9: skad cig tsam gyis nye bar song //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-10: thub pa chen po de mkhyen phyir //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-11: dang por 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-12: bye ba brgya bo rtogs bar byas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-13: mgon po 'dus pa gnyis pa ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-14: 'bum phrag gcig gis rtogs par byas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-15: gang tshe lha yi gnas su ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-16: sangs rgyas kyi ni chos bstan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-17: bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu yi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-18: 'dus pa gsum pa la ni gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-19: de rnams 'dus pa gsum du gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-20: ston pa mar me mdzad kyi'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-21: bye ba stong phrag brgya yis ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-22: dang por yi ni 'dus pa yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-23: slar yang n'a ra dha yi phur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-24: rgyal ba gcig pur zhugs pa ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-25: zag pa'i dri ma zad ba yi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-26: bye ba brgya ni zhi ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-27: dpa' bo chen po ji srid bzhugs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-28: ri yi steng na blta na sdug /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-29: stong phrag bye ba dgu bcu yis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-30: de tshe thub pa yi ni 'khor //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-31: bdag gis de yi dus su ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-32: sdom brtson dka' thub pa yi mchog /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-33: bdag ni bar snang la ni 'gro /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-34: mngon shes lnga yi pha rol son //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:307b-35: stong phrag bcu dang nyi shu ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-2: gcig dang gnyis kyi 'dus pa ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-3: bgrang du med cing grangs med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-4: rgya che ded dpon cang shes pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-5: de tshe rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing rdzogs bcom ldan 'das ni mar me mdzad //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-6: bstan pa shin tu dag cing mdzes //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-7: 'bum phrag bzhi po rnams la ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-8: mngon shes drug dang rdzu 'phrul ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-9: mar me mdzad ni 'jig rten mkhyen //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-10: rtag tu 'khor rnams yongs dag ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-11: gang zhig de yi dus su ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-12: mi rnams dngos po gtong ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-13: sems kyi lhag ma ma thob pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-14: de rnams skur pa 'debs par gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-15: me tog bzang po'i tshig rnyed pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-16: dgra bcom rnams ni de dang mtshungs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-17: dri ma med cing zag pa zad //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-18: lha dang mi rnams nye bar mdzes //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-19: grong khyer dga' ba can zhes pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-20: blo gros bzang po rgyal po'i rigs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-21: yum ni blo gros bzang mo yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-22: ston pa mar me mdzad yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-23: bkra shis bzang po nye rgyal ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-24: nyan thos rnams kyi mchog yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-25: legs 'ongs zhes pa nye gnas yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-26: ston pa mar me mdzad pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-27: dga' ba nyid dang shin tu dga'//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-28: nyan thos ma yi mchog yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-29: bcom ldan de yi byang chub shing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-30: pim pa la zhes bya ba yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-31: mtho tshad khru ni brgyad cu pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308a-32: thub pa chen po mar me mdzad //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-0: @308b shing bzhin rab tu 'bar ba yi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-1: me tog s'a la'i shing rgyas bzhin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-2: lo ni stong phrag brgya ru ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-3: drang srong chen po de yi tshe //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-4: de srid du na gnas pa ste //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-5: skye bo mang po sgrol bar byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-6: chos kyi snang bar byas nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-7: skye bo mang po yang dag sgrol //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-8: me yi phung po bzhin du gsal //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-9: de nas nyan thos dang bcas 'das //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-10: de yang rdzu 'phrul de grags pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-11: rin chen 'khor lo de zhabs la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-12: thams cad kun nas bral ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-14: mar me mdzad kyi 'og tu ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-16: gzi brjid dpag med mtha' yas grags //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-17: ring la sems pa gzhal du med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-18: slar yang bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad kyi 'og gi char bskal pa grangs med pa gcig 'das nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-19: ston pa'i 'dren pa koondi n+ya zhes bya ba byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-20: de'i yang nyan thos 'dus pa gsum du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-21: 'dus pa dang po la bye ba stong phrag brgya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-22: 'dus pa gnyis pa la bye ba stong phrag gcig go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-23: 'dus pa gsum pa la ni bye ba phrag dgu bcu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:308b-24: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-0: bye ba stong phrag brgya yi grangs kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po @309a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-1: rnams la sbyin pa chen po gtong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-2: ston pas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan par byas nas chos bstan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-3: des ston pa'i chos thos nas rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-4: des sde snod gsum po bslabs nas snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-5: mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-6: bsam gtan ma bor bar tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-7: slar yang sangs rgyas koondi n+ya de'i grong khyer dga' ba can yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-8: shin tu dga' ba'i rgyal po ni yab bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-9: rigs bzang lha mo ni yum mo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-11: legs bzang gnyis ni nyan thos rnams kyi mchog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-12: mi 'gal ba zhes bya ba ni nye gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-14: nye rgyal ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-15: byang chub kyi dge ba'i shing ni sh'a lya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-16: sku'i mtho tshad khru brgyad cu rtsa brgyad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-17: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag brgya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-18: de'i 'og gi char bskal pa grangs med pa gcig 'das nas bskal pa gcig gi nang de nyid du sangs rgyas bzhi byon par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309a-23: bcom ldan 'das bkra shis bzang po'i nyan thos kyi 'dus pa gsum du gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309b-0: @309b de'i 'dus pa dang po ni bye ba stong phrag brgya'i dge slong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309b-1: gnyis pa la bye ba stong phrag gcig go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309b-2: gsum pa la bye ba phrag dgu bcu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309b-3: ma'i spun gyi gzhon nu kun dga' bo zhes bya ba bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i 'khor dang bcas pa ni chos nyan pa'i phyir du'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309b-4: ston pa'i nye bar gnas pa rnams song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309b-5: ston pa de'i sngon gyi gtam rnams go rim bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309b-6: de 'khor dang bcas pa so so yang dag rig pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309b-8: ston pa des rigs kyi bu rnams la sngar gyi spyod pa rnams la blta zhing rdzu 'phrul las byung ba'i lhung bzed dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309b-10: phyag g-yas pa brkyang nas dge slong rnams tshur shog cig ces gsungs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309b-11: thams cad de ma thag nyid du rdzu 'phrul las byung ba'i lhung bzed dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309b-12: chos gos bzung nas gnas brtan lo drug cu lon pa bzhin du gyur to; ;cho ga phun sum tshogs par gyur nas ston pa la phyag byas te 'khor du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309b-15: sangs rgyas gzhan rnams la kun nas khru brgyad cu pa'i sku tshad nyid kyi 'od du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:309b-16: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi sku'i 'od de lta bu nyid ma yin gyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310a-0: dus rtag tu stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'phro zhing @310a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310a-5: rgya mtsho la sogs pa'i phyogs lhag ma rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310a-6: tshang bang la sogs pa gser gyis spras pa bzhin no; ;sku tshe'i tshad ni stong phrag dgu bcu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310a-7: de rnams kyi dus la zla ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310a-8: nyi ma la sogs pa la rang gi 'od kyi snang ba'i nus pa med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310a-10: nyin mo'i bye brag mi shes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310a-11: sems can rnams kyi nyin mo nyi ma shar ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis rtag tu 'gro bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310a-12: mtshan mo me tog zum pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310a-13: snga dro'i dus su bya rnams skad 'byin pa la sogs pa la brten nas 'jig rten pas nyin mtshan shes par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310a-14: yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas gzhan rnams la ci'i phyir 'di lta bu med pa yin nam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310a-15: med pa ni ma yin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310a-16: de rnams kyis kyang dgongs par gyur na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310a-17: stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gyur pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310a-18: de bas lhag par yang 'od 'phro bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310a-19: slar yang bcom ldan 'das bkra shis bzang po sngar gyi don du gnyer ba'i dbang gis te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310a-20: gzhan gyi 'od 'dom gang pa bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310a-21: sku'i 'od kyis rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid du stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par byas nas gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310b-0: de'i byang chub sems dpa'i @310b spyod pa'i dus na thams cad sgrol bzhin du bdag nyid gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310b-2: bu mor bcas pa ri bo bham ga bzhin du ri la bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310b-3: de nas mche ba gcig pa gdug pa can gyi gnod sbyin zhig gis skyes bu chen po sbyin pa gtong zhes thos nas bram ze'i gzugs kyis nye bar song ste sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bu mo slong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310b-4: sems dpa' chen pos bram ze la bu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310b-5: bu mo sbyin no zhes bsams nas dga' ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310b-6: tshim pas chu'i mthar thug pa'i sa rnams g-yos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310b-7: de nas gnod sbyin 'chag pa'i gnas kyi mthar tsog pur rgyab rten la 'dug ste sems dpa' chen po la lta zhing 'dug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310b-10: des la phug za ba bzhin du bu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310b-11: bu mo zos nas gnod sbyin gyis skyes bu chen po de la blta ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310b-12: kha gdangs nas me 'bar ba bzhin du khrag gi rgyun 'bab bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310b-13: de'i kha mthong nas kyang skra'i rtse mo tsam gyi yid mi bde ba yang ma skyes par ngas byin pa shin tu legs pa gcig go zhes sems so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310b-14: slar yang lus la mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:310b-15: de dag 'di la byin pa'i bsod nams kyi phan yon gyis ma 'ongs pa na 'di lta bu'i rim pa'i 'od zer 'phro bar don du gnyer ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311a-0: de la don du gnyer ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis sangs rgyas @311a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311a-1: su gyur nas sku'i 'od de phyi rol tu 'phro zhing de rnams la khyab par gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311a-3: 'di'i sngar gyi mdzad pa yod pas de byang chub sems dpa'i dus su sangs rgyas gcig gi sku gdung gi mchod rten mthong nas sangs rgyas 'di'i sku gdung la bdag gis 'tsho ba yongs su gtang na rigs so snyam nas shing ras kyis dkris pa bzhin du lus thams cad gos gzhan gyis dkris shing rin po che'i cod ban gyon nas 'bum phrag gcig ri ba'i gser gyi snod du mar gyis bkang ste dar ras 'de stong phrag brgya btsugs nas mar me sbar te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311a-4: mgo'i steng du bzhag cing lus thams cad kyang 'bar bar byas nas sku gdung gi mchod rten la skor bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311a-5: de ltar mtshan thog thag snga dro'i skya rengs shar gyi bar du 'bad pa byed pa nyid kyis ba spu'i khung bu tsam dro bar ma gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311a-6: padma'i tshal du bzhugs pa bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311a-7: chos zhes bya ba 'di rang nyid bsrung na chos bsrungs par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311a-9: chos bzhin bsrung na chos spyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311a-10: chos kyis bsgral na chos bzhin thob //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311a-11: legs par bsgral na chos phan yon //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311b-0: 'di'i las kyi 'bras bu @311b bcom ldan 'das de sku'i 'od kyis stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab cing gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311b-1: de'i tshe bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa' shin tu sred ba zhes bya ba'i bram zer gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311b-2: des ston pa mgron du gnyer ba'i phyir drung du song ste chos snyan pa'i bshad ba thos nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311b-4: sang bdag gi gdugs tshod la byon pa zhu zhes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311b-5: bram zer dge slong du tsam dgos zhes gsungs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311b-6: btsun ba 'khor dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun du tsam bdog ces zhus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311b-7: de'i tshe ston pa'i 'dus pa dang po nyid tsam yod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311b-8: de'i phyir bye ba stong phrag brgya yod ces gsungs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311b-9: btsun pa 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa bdag gi khang par gdugs tshod la byon par zhu zhes zhus pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste bram zes sang don du gnyer cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311b-12: bdag gis dge slong 'di rnams la thug pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311b-14: gos la sogs pa 'bul bar nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311b-15: bzhugs pa'i gnas ji lta bu zhes bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:311b-16: dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi steng na gnas pa'i lha'i rgyal po'i lva ba dmar po'i rdo leb la bzhugs pa na dro bar gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312a-0: brgya byin gang zhig bdag gi gnas 'dir 'dod ba'i sems su zhig la yod snyam pa @312a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312a-2: lha'i dbang pos lha'i mig gis bltas pas skyes bu chen po de mthong nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312a-3: 'di ltar shin tu sred pa'i bram ze sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mgron du gnyer te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312a-4: bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang bsams kyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312a-5: bdag kyang der phyin nas bsod nams kyi cha len par rigs so snyam nas shing mkhan gyi gzugs su sprul to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312a-7: dgra sta blangs te skyes bu chen po'i mdun du gnas par gyur nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312a-8: gang su zhig kho bo la gla byin te las ka byed pa yod ces smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312a-9: skyes bu chen pos gzigs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312a-10: gang zhig las ka byed nus zhes gsungs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312a-11: bdag gis mi shes ba'i bzo med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312a-13: gang zhig cung zad byed pa'i bzo de bdag gis byed kyang nus so zhes zer ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312a-14: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312a-15: de'i phyir nga la las su bya ba yod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312a-16: kho bos sang 'phags pa las bye ba phrag brgya pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun mgron du gnyer to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312a-17: de rnams bzhugs pa'i gnas byed par nus sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312a-20: bdag la gla ster nus sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312a-22: legs so zhes bya ba legs par byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312b-0: phyin nas sa phyogs gcig @312b bltas nas dpag tshad bcu gnyis sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312b-1: bcu gsum pa'i tshad kyi sa phyogs gcig tu zad bar sngon po'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du steng mnyam par byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312b-2: des 'di rnams kyi gnas tsam du rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i bsti gnas sa 'og nas phyung nas bya'o zhes bsam zhing blta'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312b-3: de ma thag par sa gzhi brtol nas bsti gnas grub bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312b-4: de ni gser las byung ba'i ka ba rnams la dngul las byung ba'i ka gzhu'i steng du gser las byung ba'i gdung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312b-5: nor bu'i ka ba la byi ru'i rang bzhin no; ;byu ru'i ka pa la nor bu'i rang bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312b-6: rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i ka ba la rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i ka gzhu nyid do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312b-7: de nas bsti gnas kyi bar bar du g-yer kha'i dra ba 'phyang ba la blta zhing de bltas tsam nyid na dra ba 'phyang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312b-8: gang la rlung gis bskyod pa de la yan lag lnga pa'i rol mo sgra snyan sgrogs te lha'i glu dbyangs sgrogs pa bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312b-9: bar bar du spos kyi phreng ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312b-10: me tog gi phreng ba 'phyang ba la sems zhing phreng ba 'phyang ba la'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312b-11: bye ba stong phrag brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi grangs kyis stan dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312b-12: rgyab rten rnams sa gzhi la brtol nas byung bar bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:312b-13: de ma thag tu sa'i steng du grub bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313a-1: rnams su re rer chu'i snod chen po grub pa bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313a-2: chu'i snod chen bo de rnams grub bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313a-3: de dag thams cad sprul nas bram ze'i drung du song nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313a-4: 'phags pa 'dir byon la bsti gnas gzigs mdzod /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313a-5: bdag la gla sbyin par rigs so zhes zhus nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313a-6: skyes bu chen po gshegs te bsti gnas gzigs nas de ma thag tu brgya byin mi snang bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313a-7: gzigs pa tsam na lus thams cad kha dog lnga dang ldan pa la dga' ba rgyun mi 'chad par 'phro bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313a-8: de nas bsti gnas gzigs nas 'di ltar yid la bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313a-9: bsti gnas 'di mir gyur pas bsgrubs pa ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313a-10: slar yang bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313a-11: bdag gi yon tan rtogs pas nges par brgya byin gyi stan dro bar gyur nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos bsti gnas 'di byas par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313a-12: de nas slar yang 'di lta bu'i tshul gyi bsti gnas su nyi ma gcig nyid la sbyin pa gtong ba ni bdag gi rigs pa ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313a-13: nyi ma bdun du bdag gis ster bar bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313a-14: phyi rol gyi sbyin pas ji tsam gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgyes par mi nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313b-0: rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i @313b mgo bo bcad ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313b-1: dri ma med pa'i mig gtong ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313b-3: bcad nas byin pa'i dus su byang chub sems dpa' btang ba'i dgyes par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313b-4: bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang sha si bi'i skyes rabs las nyi ma re rer dong tse khal lnga lnga ri ba'i rin gyis nyos nas sgo bzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313b-5: grong khyer gyi dbus su sbyin pa gtong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313b-6: de'i sbyin pa de gtong bas yongs su tshim pa med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313b-7: slar yang gang gi tshe brgya byin lha yi rgyal po bram ze'i gzugs kyis 'ongs nas mig slangs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313b-8: de'i tshe de'i mig bton nas ster ba nyid kyis dgyes par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313b-9: skra'i rtse mo tsam yang sems la sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313b-10: de bzhin du sbyin pa'i rgyus byang chub sems dpa' la tshim pa med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313b-11: de'i phyir skyes bu chen po de yang zhag bdun bdag gis bye ba stong phrag brgya'i grangs kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la sbyin pa gtong bar rigs so zhes bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313b-12: de'i bsti gnas su bzhugs nas zhag bdun du dga' ba p'a na zhes bya ba'i sbyin pa byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:313b-13: dga' ba can zhes pa ni ches che ba'i snod shin tu che ba 'o mas bkang nas tshad dbang chen po'i steng du bzhag nas mes 'o ma shin tu bska bar bskol te 'bras cung zad btab nas btsos te sbrang dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314a-1: gsar pa rnams btsos pa'i bza' ba'i 'o thug ni dga' ba b'a na zhes brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314a-2: mi rnams kyis 'dren par ma nus na lha rnams kyis kyang bar bar du 'dren no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314a-4: bcu gsum pa'i tshad kyi gnas su dge slong rnams ma shong na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314a-5: slar yang dge slong de rnams rang rang gi mthus bzhugs so; ;zhag bdun gyi mthar dge slong thams cad kyi lhung bzed bkrus nas sman gyi phyir du mar gsar pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314a-8: bu ram bskol ba'i chu rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas chos gos gsum dang bcas pa phul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314a-9: dge 'dun gzhon nu rnams kyis dge slong gis thob pa'i chos gos kyi rgyu'i ras 'bum phrag gcig ri ba thob par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314a-10: ston pas rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314a-11: skyes bu 'dis 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis sbyin pa chen po byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314a-12: gang gi don du 'gyur zhes rtog par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314a-13: ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa 'bum phrag gcig lhag pa'i grangs med pa gnyis 'das pa na goo ta ma zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhes gzigs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314a-14: skyes bu chen po bos nas khyod kyi dus 'di rnams 'das nas goo ta ma zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314b-0: skyes bu chen pos lung bstan pa thos @314b nas bdag ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur bas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314b-1: bdag khyim na gnas pa la don med kyi rab tu 'byung ngo snyam du bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314b-2: de de lta bu'i tshul dang ldan pas mchil ma dor ba bzhin du khyim spangs nas ston pa'i drung du rab tu byung zhing byung nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab bslabs nas mngon par shes pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314b-4: tshe'i mthar tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314b-6: bcom ldan 'das bkra shis bzang po'i grong khyer mchog ces bya bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314b-7: yab ni mchog gi rgyal po'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314b-8: yum ni mchog ma zhes bya ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314b-10: chos kyi sde gnyis ni nyan thos kyi mchog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314b-11: bskyang ba zhes bya ba ni nye gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314b-13: mya ngan med gnyis ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314b-14: byang chub shing ni klu shing ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314b-15: sku'i mtho tshad du khru brgyad cu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314b-16: stong phrag dgu bcu'i lo ni sku tshe'i tshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314b-17: stong phrag dgu bcu bzhugs nas mya ngan las 'das so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314b-18: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas slar yang de ma thag par stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi phyogs kun mun par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314b-19: khor yug thams cad kyi mi rnams cho nges chen po 'debs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:314b-22: 'jig rten nang gi mun bsal nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315a-2: de bzhin du stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mun nag tu byas nas mya ngan las 'das so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315a-3: bcom ldan 'das de'i 'og gi char yid bzang zhes bya ba'i ston pa byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315a-4: de yi yang nyan thos kyi 'dus pa gsum ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315a-5: 'dus pa dang po la bye ba stong phrag brgya'i dge slong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315a-6: 'dus ba gnyis pa la gser gyi ri la bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315a-7: gsum pa la bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315a-8: de'i tshe sems dpa' chen po klu'i rgyal po mnyam med ces bya bar gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315a-9: rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang ldan zhing des sangs rgyas byon pa thos nas gnyen gyi grogs rnams 'khor du byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315a-11: bye ba stong phrag brgya'i dge slong gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das la lha'i rol mos nye bar mchod nas sbyin pa chen po phul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315a-12: so so la lha'i gos gnyis gnyis phul pas skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshul khrims la gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315a-13: de yang ston pa des ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar lung bstan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315a-14: bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer dge ba can zhes bya bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315a-15: legs byin zhes bya ba'i rgyal po ni yab bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315a-16: dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba ni yum mo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315b-0: goms byed ni @315b nyan thos kyi mchog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315b-3: nye bar nyan pa gnyis ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315b-4: byang chub kyi shing ni klu shing ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315b-5: sku'i mtho tshad du khru drug cu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315b-6: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag dgu bcu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315b-7: bkra shis bzang po'i 'og tu ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315b-8: 'dren pa thugs bzang zhes bya ba //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315b-9: chos rnams kun la mtshungs med pa; ;sems can kun gyi mchog yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315b-10: de'i yang 'og gi char nam gru can gyi ston pa zhes bya ba byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315b-11: de'i 'dus pa gsum du gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315b-12: 'dus pa dang po la bgrang du med pa zhes bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315b-13: gnyis pa la bye ba stong phrag brgya'i dge slong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:315b-14: de bzhin du gsum pa yang ngo //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317a-0: bcom ldan 'das thugs ldan mthong gi grong khyer ni lva ba can zhes bya bar 'gyur @317a *//

K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317a-4: yid ldan ni nyan thos kyi mchog go /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317a-10: 'bum phrag gcig gi lo ni sku tshe'i tshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317a-11: mdzes byed kyi ni 'og tu ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317a-12: rkang gnyis mchog gi rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317a-13: thugs bzang mthong dang 'chi med grags //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317a-14: gzi brjid ldan zhing ring mthong ngo //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317a-16: de'i yang 'dus pa gsum du gyur te /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317a-18: gnyis pa la 'bum phrag gsum mo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317a-19: gsum pa la grong med pa'i dgon par nags tshal chen po na dge slong 'bum phrag gnyis gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317a-20: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yang de'i nags tshal chen por bzhugs pa'i tshe /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317a-21: byang chub sems dpa' seng ger skyes par gyur to //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317a-23: bzhugs pa mthong nas sems rab tu dang bas phyag byas nas bskor ba byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317a-26: lan gsum du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317b-0: zhag bdun @317b du sangs rgyas kyi phyir du dga' ba ma spangs pas dga' ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317b-1: bde ba nyid kyi spyod yul du ma phyin par srog yongs su btang ngo snyam ste blta zhing 'dug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317b-2: ston pa zhag bdun nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas seng ge la blta zhing dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams kyis kyang sems dang bar byas nas dge 'dun la phyag byed do zhes /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317b-4: dge slong gi dge 'dun sheg ces bsams te dge slong rnams de ma thag tu byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317b-5: seng ge dge 'dun la sems rab tu dang bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317b-6: ston pas de'i sems la ba rtags te ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:317b-7: slar yang bcom ldan 'das padma'i snying ni tsam pa ka zhes bya bar gyur to //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:319a-2: sku'i 'od kun nas 'khor ba la dpag tshad bcu gnyis so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:319a-3: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum phrag gcig go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:319a-4: mi sbyin gyi ni 'og nyid du //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:319a-6: rgyal ba padma mchog ces pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:319a-8: de'i 'og gi char bskal pa stong phrag gsum 'das nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:319a-10: legs skyes zhes bya ba ni bskal pa gcig nang du sangs rgyas gnyis su gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:319a-11: blo gros bzang po'i yang nyan thos kyi 'dus pa gsum du 'gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:319a-12: 'dus pa dang po la grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba ni bye ba brgya'i zag pa zad pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:319a-13: 'dus pa gnyis pa la yang bye ba dgu bcur 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:319a-14: 'dus pa gsum pa la ni bye ba brgyad cu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:319a-15: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus mchog ces bya ba bram ze'i khye'ur gyur to //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:319b-19: gsum pa la stong phrag bzhi bcu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:319b-20: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te sangs rgyas byon zhes thos nas nye bar stong ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:319b-21: chos thos nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge 'dun la rin po che sna bdun dang bcas pa'i gling chen po bzhi'i rgyal srid sbyin par btang nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:319b-22: ston pa'i drung du rab tu byung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:319b-23: yul thams cad na gnas pa'i yul du skyes pa'i nor blangs nas gtsug lag khang rnams rdzogs par bya ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:320a-1: sogs pa'i dge slong rnams la sbyin pa chen po phul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:320a-2: de yang ma 'ongs pa na ston pas sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:320a-3: bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer ni bkra shis bzang po zhes bya bar gyur to //

K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:320a-7: lha gnyis ni nyan thos kyi mchog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:320a-8: mi sbyin ni nye gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:320a-10: glu ma'i phreng ba dang bcas pa ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go /

K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:324b-13: 'dus pa dang po la 'bum phrag brgyad cu'i dge slong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:324b-14: gnyis pa la 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa bdun no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:324b-15: gsum pa la 'bum phrag drug cu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:324b-16: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' blta na sdug ces bya ba'i rgyal por gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:324b-17: sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge 'dun la chos gos dang bcas pa'i sbyin pa chen po phul nas de'i drung du rab tu byung ste; spyod pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:324b-18: yon tan dang ldan pas sangs rgyas dkon mchog la ri mor byas te dga' bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:324b-19: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di nas bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig nas sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:324b-21: bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer ni yid ldan zhes bya bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-2: yum ni grags ldan ma zhes bya ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-4: mchog ni nyan thos kyi mchog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-5: nye bar zhi ba ni nye gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-7: phreng ba dang bcas pa ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-8: byang chub kyi shing ni s'a la'i shing ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-9: sku'i mtho tshad ni khru drug cur 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-10: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag drug cu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-11: snying po'i bskal pa de nyid la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-12: gang zag zla med mtshungs pa med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-13: mtshan ni thams cad skyob ces pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-14: rgyal ba de ni 'jig rten bskyed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-15: de'i yang 'og gi char bskal pa 'di la sangs rgyas bzhi byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-19: bdag cag gi bcom ldan 'das so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-21: bcom ldan 'das log pa dad sel gyi nyan thos kyi 'dus pa ni gcig go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-22: de la stong phrag bzhi bcu'i dge slong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-23: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dge ba zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-24: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge 'dun la lhung bzed chos gos dang bcas pa'i sbyin pa nyid dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-25: mig sman dang sman la sogs pa phul nas ston pa'i chos bstan pa thos nas rab tu byung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325a-26: de yang ston pas lung bstan to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-0: bcom ldan 'das log pa dad sel de'i grong khyer @325b dge ba zhes bya bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-1: yab ni me sbyin bram ze zhes bya ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-2: yum ni bram ze mo grogs ma'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-4: yang dag 'tsho ni nyan thos kyi mchog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-5: bram ze blo gros ni nye gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-7: tsam pa ka ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-8: byang chub kyi shing ni shing shi ri sha chen po'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-9: sku'i mtho tshad la khru bzhi bcur gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-10: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag bzhi bcu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-11: thams cad skyob kyi 'og tu ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-12: rkang gnyis mchog gi rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-13: mtshan ni log pa dad sel zhes //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-14: gzhal med ring la sems pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-15: de'i 'og gi char ston pa gser thub ces bya ba byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-16: de'i yang nyan thos kyi 'dus pa gcig ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-17: de la stong phrag sum cu'i dge slong du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-18: de la byang chub sems dpa' ri zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-19: blon po'i tshogs mang po 'khor dang bcas pa chos bstan pa thos nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams mgron du gnyer nas sbyin pa chen po phul te ston pa'i drung du song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-22: grong khyer gsal ldan gyi yul gyi ras dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-25: dar gos gser ma rnams phul te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-26: ston pa'i drung du rab tu byung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:325b-27: de yang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar lung bstan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-1: grong khyer ni mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-2: yab ni gnod sbyin zhes bya ba'i bram ze'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-3: yum ni mchog ma zhes bya ba'i bram ze ma'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-5: mchog ni nyan thos kyi mchog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-6: bkra shis zhes bya ba ni nye gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-8: mchog ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-9: byang chub kyi shing ni au du ma ba ra'i shing ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-10: sku'i mtho tshad la khru nyi shu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-11: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag sum cu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-12: log par dad sel 'og tu ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-13: rkang gnyis mchog gi rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-14: mtshan ni rgyal ba gser thub bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-15: mi yi khyu mchog 'jig rten gtso //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-16: de'i 'og gi char 'od srung zhes bya ba'i ston pa byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-18: de la dge slong stong phrag nyi shu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-19: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'od bskyor zhes bya ba'i bram ze'i khye'ur gyur nas rig byed gsum gyi pha rol tu son te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-20: sa dang bar snang thams cad la grags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-21: bum pa byed pa'i rdza mkhan gyi grogs por gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326a-22: byang chub sems dpa' rdza mkhan dang 'grogs te ston pa'i drung du nye bar song ste; chos kyi gtam thos nas rab tu byung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-0: brtson 'grus cher bskyed nas sde snod gsum bslabs te spyod pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa mdzes par @326b byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-1: de yang ston pas lung bstan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-2: bcom ldan 'das de'i bltams pa'i grong khyer ni w'a ra n'a si zhes bya ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-3: yab ni tshangs byin zhes bya ba'i bram ze'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-4: yum ni 'byor ldan ma zhes bya ba'i bram ze mo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-6: bh'a radha dza ni nyan thos kyi mchog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-7: thams cad bshes gnyen ni nye gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-9: stong rgyas ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-10: byang chub kyi shing ni n+ya gro ta'i shing ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-11: sku'i mtho tshad du khru nyi shu bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-12: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag nyi shu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-13: gser thub kyi ni 'og tu ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-14: rkang gnyis mchog gi rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-15: mtshan ni rgyal ba 'od srung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-16: chos kyi rgyal ba 'od mdzad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-18: bskal pa gang la stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mar me mdzad pa de la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-20: sangs rgyas gsum byon par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-21: de rnams kyi drung du byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-22: de'i phyir 'dir yang lung ma bstan te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-24: don gyi gtam 'dis 'di'i bskal pa nas bzung nas sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i don du 'dir bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-25: sred mdzad dang ni blo gros mdzad //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-26: de nas skyabs ni mdzad pa yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-27: mar me mdzad ni rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-28: rkang gnyis mchog ni koo di n+ya //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:326b-29: bkra shis dang ni thugs bzang dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327a-2: thugs ldan mthong dang padma dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327a-3: mi sbyin dang ni padma'i mchog /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327a-4: blo gros bzang dang legs skyes dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327a-5: grags chen blta na sdug pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327a-6: don mthong dang ni chos mthong dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327a-8: rdzogs sangs rgyas ni dkar rgyal gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327a-9: rnam gzigs gtsug tor thams cad skyob //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327a-10: log dad sel dang gser thub dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327a-12: yang dag rdzogs sangs de rnams ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327a-13: mnyam par bzhag cing 'dod chags bcom //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327a-15: mun pa chen po rnam par 'joms //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327a-16: me yi phung po bzhin du 'bar //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327a-17: nyan thos dang bcas mya ngan 'das //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327a-18: de la bdag cag gi byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i drung du smon lam btab nas bskal pa grangs med pa bzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327a-19: 'bum phrag gcig lhag pas nas byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327a-21: bcom ldan 'das 'od srung de'i 'og gi char gnas te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di las sangs rgyas gzhan med do zhes mar me mdzad la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i drung du lung bstan pa thob bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327a-23: byang chub sems dpa' gang des /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-0: mi yi @327b bdag nyid rtags dang ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-1: sgyu dang ston pa'i blta ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-2: rab tu byung zhing yon tan ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-3: gzhi rnams dang ni 'dun pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-4: chos brgyad po ni tshogs pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-5: smon lam rnams ni yang dag rdzogs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-6: chos brgyad po 'di rnams tshogs par byas nas mar me mdzad kyi zhabs drung du smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos 'di rnams gang dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-7: gang du tshol ba'i spro ba skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-8: btsal ba de rnams mthong bas na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-9: dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-10: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pas sangs rgyas thob par byed pa'i chos rdzogs par byed pa nyid thams cad sgrol gyi bdag nyid byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-11: byon nas gang de rnams byas pa'i smon lam byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis phan yon bsngags par mdzad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-12: de bzhin yan lag thams cad ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-13: mi yi byang chub nges pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-14: 'khor ba yun ring gzhi med pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-15: bskal pa bye ba brgya nyid dam //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-16: mnar med du ni mi skye'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-17: de bzhin du ni 'jig rten par //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-18: bkres skom sed dang 'bar ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-20: srog chags phra mor mi 'gyur zhing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-22: mi ru skyes par gyur pa na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:327b-23: de ni dmus long mi 'gyur zhing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-2: bud med du ni skye mi 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-3: za ma ma ning mtshan gnyis dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-5: mi yi byang chub nges pa yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-6: mtshams med pa las grol ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-7: dag ba'i spyod yul thams cad du //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-8: log ba'i lta ba mi sten no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-9: las kyi bya ba mthong ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-10: mtho ris la ni gnas nas su; ;'du shes med par skye mi 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-11: gtsang ma ris kyi lha rnams su //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-12: sgyu dang ming ni skye ba med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-13: skyes bu dam ba nges 'byung sems //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-14: dngos dang dngos med ldan pa med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-16: pha rol phyin kun rdzogs par byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-17: phan yon de rnams lhag par thob pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-18: des pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par byed do; ;grags pa dang ldan par bram ze'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-19: dung gi bram ze'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-20: nor rgyal gyi rgyal po'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-21: bltan sdug chen po'i rgyal bo'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-22: khyab 'jug chen po'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-23: rgyu mtshan gyi rgyal po chen po'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-24: zla ba gzhon nu'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-25: yul gyi mchog gi dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-26: shi bi pa'i rgyal po'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328a-27: thams cad sgrol gyi dus su ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-0: yang byang chub @328b sems dpa' mkhas pa ri bong gi skyes rabs las /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-1: nyer 'ongs slong ba mthong ba na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-2: rang gi lus ni yongs su btang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-3: bdag gi sbyin la mnyam pa med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-4: 'di rnams sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-5: de ltar lus yongs su gtong bar byed pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-6: de bzhin du tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i klu'i rgyal po'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-7: tsam po spyi'i klu'i rgyal po'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-8: sa sbyin klu'i rgyal po'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-9: mche ba drug ba'i glang po'i rgyal po'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-10: rgyal ba dang mtshungs pa'i rgyal po'i bu zhum pa med pa'i dgra gzhon nu'i dus su ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par skyes pa la tshad med do; ;mtha' gcig tu gzhan yang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-11: de yi dung skyong skyes rabs las //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-12: gsal shing gis ni phug nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-13: mtshon cha blangs nas dge pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-14: grong dpon bu la khro mi byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-15: tshul khrims phar phyin bdag gi 'di //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-16: de bzhin du lus yongs su gtong bar byed pa ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-17: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-18: don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-19: de bzhin du yid bzang gzhon nu'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-20: glang chen nor skyong gzhon nu'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:328b-21: lcags khyim mkhas pa'i dus su ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-1: srid chen po spangs nas nges par 'byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag nyid la skyes ba ni tshad med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-3: mtha' gcig tu de'i bu zhi ba chung ngu'i skyes rabs las /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-4: rgyal po chen po lag tu thob //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-5: mchil ma'i sbu ba bzhin du spangs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-6: rgyal srid spangs kyang zhen pa med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-8: de bzhin du nges par bdag gi rgyal srid spangs nas nges par 'byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-9: don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-10: de bzhin du mkhas pa bi dhu ra'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-11: mkhas pa khyab 'jug chen po'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-12: mkhas pa tog rtse ba'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-13: mkhas pa aa ra'i dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-14: kun tu rgyu byang chub kyi dus su dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-15: mkhas pa sman chen po'i dus su ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par bdag skye skyes pa la tshad med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-17: mtha' gcig tu de'i sde snod kyi skyes rabs las /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-18: mkhas pa sde can gyi dus su //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-19: bdag gi shes rab tshol ba na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-20: bram ze'i sdug bsngal grol ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-21: bdag gi shes rab mtshungs pa med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-22: bdag gi shes rab phar phyin 'di //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-23: pha tshi'i nang gi sbrul bdag gis blta ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329a-24: don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-0: @329b de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par bdag la skyes ba tshad med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-1: gzhan yang mtha' gcig tu de'i skye bo chen po can gyi skyes rabs las /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-2: ngogs ma mthong ba'i rgya mtsho'i dbus //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-3: mi rnams thams cad shi bar gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-4: sdug bsngal med pa'i sems kyis ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-6: rgya mtsho chen po las sgrol bar byed pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-7: bzod par smra ba'i skyes rabs las /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-8: sems med pa la gcod pa bzhin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-9: bdag la rno ba'i dgra sta yis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-10: gsal ldan rgyal po la mi khro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-11: bdag gi bzod pa'i phar phyin 'di //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-12: de ltar sems med pa'i dngos po bzhin du bdag sdug bsngal chen po la lhag par gnas pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-13: don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-14: bu zhi ba chen po'i skyes rabs las /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-15: bden pa'i tshig ni rjes su bsrung //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-16: bdag gi srog ni spangs nas su //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-17: rgyal rigs brgya phrag grol bar byas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-18: bdag gi bden pa'i phar phyin 'di //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-19: de ltar srog spangs nas bden pa rjes su bsrung ba de ni bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:329b-20: don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-0: gzhogs phyed na ba'i tshul gyi skyes @330a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-2: pha ma bdag la mi dgos shing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-3: nor dang grags pa'ang dgos pa med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-4: bdag ni thams cad mkhyen la dga'//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-5: de phyir brtul zhugs gnas pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-6: de ltar srog gi 'dod pa yongs su btang nas brtul zhugs la lhag par gnas pa ni lhag par gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-7: don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba zhes bya ba skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-8: rgyal po gcig gis skyes rabs las /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-9: gang zhig bdag la skrag phyed med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-10: bdag gis gang la'ang 'jigs ma byas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-11: byams pa'i stobs kyi steng gnas shing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-12: de tshe stong pa nyid la dga'//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-13: de ltar srog yongs su gtong ba la mi lta zhing byams par byed pa de'i byams pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-14: don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-15: dang pa'i spu'i skyes rabs las /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-16: dur khrod du ni gnas par sems //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-17: rus gong la ni brten byas nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-18: bdag gi gnas su nye bar 'ongs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-19: gzugs la blta ba nyung ba med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-20: de ltar grong gi khye'u la rdo la sogs pa blangs nas rdung ba nyid dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-22: spos kyis nye bar spyod pa la sogs pas bde ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330a-23: sdug bsngal bskyed kyang btang snyoms su 'dor ba de ni btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330b-0: don dam pa'i pha @330b rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330b-2: rgya chen yang slar 'di'i don spyod pa'i sde snod las blang bar bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330b-3: de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs nas thams cad sgrol gyi bdag nyid du gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330b-4: sems med pa yi sa gzhi yi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330b-5: bde dang sdug bsngal mi shes kyang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330b-6: bdag gi sbyin ba'i stobs de yis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330b-7: lan bdun du ni rab tu g-yos //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330b-8: de ltar sa gzhi chen po g-yo ba la sogs pa bsod nams chen po byed cing tshe'i mthar shi 'phos te dga' ldan du skyes so zhes pa mar me mdzad kyi zhabs drung nas bzung ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330b-9: ji srid dga' ldan du skyes pa de rnams kyi bar ni ring po'i gzhi zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330b-11: byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan du bzhugs pa nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi sgra cher sgrogs ba zhes bya ba skyes pa na 'jig rten 'dir sgra cher sgrogs pa gsum byung ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330b-12: bskal pa'i sgra cher sgrogs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330b-13: sangs rgyas kyi sgra cher sgrogs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330b-14: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sgra cher sgrogs pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:330b-15: de la lo 'bum phrag gcig gi mthar bskal pa 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes pa 'jig rten gyi ming du brjod pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha mgo g-yogs kyis ma bsgribs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331a-0: du ba'i kha can lag pas mig gi mchi ma 'phyi ba gos dmar po gyon @331a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331a-1: pa; lhag par gzugs mi sdug pa'i cha byad 'dzin par gyur ba'i mi rnams lam la 'gro zhing 'di ltar brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331a-2: 'jig rten pa 'dis lo 'bum phrag gcig 'das nas bskal ba 'jig bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331a-4: rgya mtsho chen po'ang bskams par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331a-6: ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang thal bar gyur cing 'jig go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331a-7: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'jig par 'gyur zhes brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331a-8: 'jig rten pa rnams byams pa sgoms shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331a-12: ma la rim gro gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331a-13: pha la rim gro gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331a-14: rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro gyis shig ces pa 'di ni bskal pa'i sgra cher sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331a-15: lo stong phrag gcig 'das nas slar yang sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa 'jig rten du byon no zhes brjod pa 'di 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams 'di nas 'jig rten pa rnams lo stong phrag gcig 'das nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331a-17: sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byon no zhes brjod cing sgra cher sgrogs pas rgyu ba 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sgra cher sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331b-0: lo brgya 'das nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po byon no zhes brjod pa @331b ni lha nyid de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331b-1: 'jig rten ba rnams lo brgya 'das nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byon zhes sgra cher brjod cing rgyu ba 'di ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sgra cher sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331b-2: gsum po 'di ni sgra cher sgrogs pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331b-3: de rnams las sangs rgyas kyi sgra cher sgrags pa thos nas stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi lha thams cad gnas gcig tu 'dus te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331b-4: che ge mo zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar rtogs nas zhu ba'i phyir nye bar song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331b-5: zhus nas kyang sngar gyi mtshan ma skyes pa la zhus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331b-6: de'i tshe slar yang thams cad kyi re re'i khor yug gi rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331b-12: tshangs pa chen po dang bcas pa'i lha dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331b-13: khor yug gi lha rnams 'dus ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331b-14: dga' ldan gyi gnas su byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331b-15: drang srong chen po khyod kyis pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rdzogs pa ni brgya byin gyi phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir ma yin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331b-17: tshangs pa'i phyir don du gnyer ba rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ma yin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:331b-18: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir don du gnyer ba rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-1: mkhyen pa don du gnyer ba'i phyir rdzogs par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-2: de rnams ni da lta'i dus nas drang srong chen po sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i dus ni drang srong chen po sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhes zhus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-3: sems dpa' chen po lha la gnang ba ma byin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-10: tshe'i bye brag lhag ma las med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-11: chen po lnga po zhes bya ba legs par gzigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-13: dus ma yin pa zhes bya ba ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-14: dang po dus la gzigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-15: de la lo 'bum phrag gcig gi thog ma nas 'phel ba ni tshe'i dus dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-17: gang gi phyir de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi skye ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-21: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ston pa ni mtshan nyid lnga spangs nas gzhan pa ni med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-22: de rnams ni mi rtag pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-24: bdag med pa ston cing 'di rnams ci'i phyir 'chad pa nyid mi nyan pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-27: de ni dus ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-28: de'i phyir mi sems pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-29: ma nges pa'i bstan pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-30: de'i phyir de ni dus ma yin pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-31: lo brgya ba dman pas tshe'i dus kyang de'i dus ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332a-33: sems can nyon mongs pa shin tu che ba yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332b-0: nyon mongs pa shin tu che bas gdams pa @332b byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332b-1: gdams pa la mi gnas na chu la dbyug pa rgyab pa'i ri mo bzhin myur du 'gag go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332b-2: de'i phyir de yang dus ma yin pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332b-3: lo 'bum phrag gcig nas gzung ba'i 'og tu lo brgya pa'i mgor tshe'i dus te dus zhes bya ba yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332b-4: de'i tshe yang lo brgya pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332b-5: de nas sems dpa' chen po skye bar rigs so zhes dus la gzigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332b-6: de nas gling la gzigs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332b-7: gling bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa la gzigs nas gling gsum po rnams su sangs rgyas mi byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332b-10: de nas 'dzam bu gling zhes bya ba dpag tshad stong phrag bcu'i tshad kyis che ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332b-11: yul gyi phyogs gang zhig tu sangs rgyas byon par 'gyur zhes yangs shing grol ba'i gnas blta zhing yul dbus la gzigs te yul dbus zhes bya ba ni shar gyi phyogs na ka dzam ga la zhes bya ba'i grong rdal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332b-12: de'i pha rol na shing s'a la chen po'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332b-13: de nas gzhan yang bas mtha'i ljongs nye ba'i nang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332b-14: shar lho'i mtshams su s'a la can zhes bya ba'i chu klung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332b-15: de nas gzhan yang bas mtha'i ljongs dang nye ba'i nang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332b-16: lho phyogs su soo ta karni ka zhes bya ba'i grong rdal lo //
