K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332b-17: de nas gzhan yang bas mtha'i ljongs dang nye ba'i nang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:332b-18: nub phyogs ka ba zhes bya ba bram ze'i grong rdal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-0: de nas gzhan yang bas mtha'i ljongs dang nye @333a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-2: byang gi phyogs su au shi ri'i ri'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-3: de nas gzhan yang bas mtha'i ljongs dang nye ba'i nang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-4: 'di ltar 'dul bar bshad cing bstan no; ;dkyus su dpag tshad sum brgya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-5: zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang sum brgya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-6: mtha' bskor la dpag tshad dgu brgya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-7: yul phyogs de rnams su ni sangs rgyas dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-10: nyan thos chen po brgyad cu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-11: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-13: skyes bu chen por grags pa'i rigs dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-15: shing s'a la chen po'i lta bu'i khyim bdag rnams 'khrungs pa'i gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-16: de rnams las grong khyer ser skya zhes bya ba 'di'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-17: der bdag 'khrungs par rigs so zhes thugs kyis nges par byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-18: de nas rigs la gzigs pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba rje'u rigs sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-19: gdol ba'i rigs la mi 'khrung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-20: slar yang 'jig rten pa mos pa'i rgyal rigs sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-21: bram ze'i rigs gnyis la 'khrung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-22: da lta ni rgyal rigs la 'jig rten pa sems so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-24: bdag gi yab ni zas gtsang ma zhes bya ba'i rgyal po yin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333a-26: de nas yum la gzigs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333b-1: chang la dga' ba ni sangs rgyas kyi yum zhes bya ba ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333b-3: bskal pa 'bum phrag gcig la pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par byas nas 'khrung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333b-4: nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims lnga po nyid len no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333b-5: lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya ba 'di de dang 'dra ba bdag gi yum yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333b-6: gzhan yang gang de tsam gyi tshe'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333b-7: zla ba bcu'i mgo nas zhag bdun du gzigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333b-8: 'di ni chen po lnga la gzigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333b-10: drang srong chen po bdag gi dus de sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i lha rnams kyi tshig gis gnang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333b-11: khyod rnams gshegs par zhu zhes lha de rnams btang nas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis yongs su bskor te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333b-12: dga' ldan gyi dga' ba'i tshal du zhugs so; ;'jig rten gyi lha thams cad dga' ba'i tshal na yod pa nyid do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333b-13: de la 'di yi lha 'di nas shi 'phos nas bde ba'i 'gro bar skyes te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333b-14: 'di nas shi 'phos nas bde ba'i 'gro bar skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333b-15: sngar byas pa'i dge ba'i las byas pa rjes su dran zhing rgyu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333b-16: de de ltar lha rnams kyis dge ba rjes su dran pa rnams 'khor du byas shing der rgyu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333b-17: shi 'phos nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma chen mo'i mngal du zhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:333b-18: de la legs par brjod pa'i phyir 'di go rim bzhin du sngon gyi gtam brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334a-0: de'i tshe grong khyer ser skyar dbyar @334a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334a-1: zla 'bring po'i rgyu skar du brjod par skye bo thams cad rgyu skar la rtse zhing lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo yang nya'i sdun du zhag bdun nas me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334a-2: spos kyi 'byor pa dang ldan pas rgyu skar la rtse zhing longs spyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334a-3: zhag bdun gyi mthar snga dro langs nas dri bzang gi chus khrus byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334a-4: 'bum phrag bzhi'i longs spyod spel te sbyin pa chen po btang nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334a-5: kha zas bzang po zos te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334a-6: gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334a-7: rgyan du byed pa la rigs pa'i dpal gyi khang pa'i nang du zhugs nas dpal gyi mal cha la nyal te gnyid du song nas 'di lta bu'i rmi lam mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334a-8: rgyal po chen po bzhi pos mal stan dang bcas pa nyid blangs nas gangs can gyi nang du song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334a-9: dpag tshad drug cu pa'i ma ni sha la'i steng du dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334a-10: dpag tshad bdun pa'i shing s'a la chen po'i 'og tu bzhag nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334a-11: de nas de'i lha mo 'ongs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334a-12: lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma chen mo mtshom dros par khrid do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334a-13: mi'i dri ma bsal ba'i phyir khrus byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334a-14: lha'i gos gyon nas dri bzang pos byug cing lha'i me tog 'dogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334a-15: de nas mi ring bar dngul gyi ri de'i nang na gser gyi gzhal med khang 'dug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334b-0: der shar du mgo @334b bstan pa'i lha'i mal cha la der nyol zhes zer nas nyal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' glang po che dkar po gcig tu gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334b-2: de nas mi ring bar gser gyi ri gcig la der 'dzeg cing de nas mar babs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334b-5: dngul gyi phreng ba dang mtshungs pa'i glang po che'i gnas padma dkar po 'dzin cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334b-6: glang po che'i sgra sgrogs pas gser gyi gzhal yas khang du zhugs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334b-7: rang gi mal cha la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas glo g-yas pa phug nas ltor zhugs pa bzhin du gyur to /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334b-8: de ltar bre'i skar ma mchog la lhums su zhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334b-9: nyi ma gnyis pa la de'i snga dro sad de lha mos rgyal po la rmi lam rnams smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334b-10: rgyal pos bram ze drug cu rtsa bzhi bos nas me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334b-12: bsti stang byed cing sa lam la stan chen po bshams te de la zhugs pa'i bram ze rnams la mar gsar dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334b-14: ka ra rnams dang bsres pa'i 'o thug rnams gser dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334b-15: dngul las byas pa'i sder ma bkang ste gser dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334b-16: dngul gyi sder mas so sor bkab nas bram ze rnams la phul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334b-18: rgyal po gyon pa dang mtshungs pa'i gos dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:334b-19: gser rgya ma la sogs pa byin nas de rnams tshim par byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-1: 'dod pa thams cad kyis tshim par gyur nas rmi lam bshad de ci 'dra bar 'gyur zhes dris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-2: bram ze rnams kyis smras pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-3: rgyal po chen po; 'jigs par ma byed cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-4: khyod kyi lha mo'i lto'i nang du sems can zhugs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-5: de yang nang gi de skyes bu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-6: mngal gyi nang gi de bu mo ni ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-7: de khyed kyi sras por 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-8: de gal te khyim na gnas na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-9: gal te khyim spangs nas rab tu byung na sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-10: 'jig rten du zlog nas slar khyim na gnas nas skye ba med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-12: byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi mngal du zhugs pa de ma thag tu thun gcig nyid la stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yang dag par g-yos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-13: yang dag par rab tu g-yos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-14: yang dag par sgra sgrogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-15: mtshan ma sum cu rtsa gnyis sngon gyi mtshan par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-16: stong phrag bcu'i khor yug rnams su snang ba tshad med par khyab cing gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-17: de yang de'i dpal blta ba 'di lta bu ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-18: long ba rnams kyis mig thob bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-19: 'on pa rnams kyis rna bas sgra thos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-20: lkugs pa rnams kyis smra shes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335a-21: sgur bo rnams drang por gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-0: gong po rnams kyis 'gro shes @335b par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-1: bcings pa'i sems can thams cad ni rjes su bcings pa las grol bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-2: dmyal ba thams cad kyi me zhi bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-3: yi dvags kyi yul ba rnams bkres pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-4: skom la zhi bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-5: dud 'gro rnams phan tshun 'jigs pa med par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-6: sems can thams cad kyi nad zhi bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-7: sems can thams cad dga' bzhin du smra bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-8: rta rnams skad snyan pa'i rnam par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-9: glang po rnams ni sgra sgrags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-10: rol mo rnams rang byung gi sgra sgrogs so; ;mi rnams kyi rkang pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-12: rang ma reg pas so sor 'byin to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-13: phyogs thams cad rab tu dvangs par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-14: sems can rnams bde ba bskyed pa'i phyir rlung 'jam po ldang bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-15: dus ma yin par sprin la char 'bab bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-16: sa la chu byung nas phyogs thams cad chur gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-17: bya rnams nam mkha' la 'gro ba spong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-18: chu klung rnams 'gro ba med par gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-19: rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni mngar bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-20: gnas thams cad nyid du kha dog lnga pa'i padmas sa'i steng thams cad khyab par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-22: chu las skyes pa'i me tog rnams kha bye bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:335b-23: ljon shing rnams kyi sdong po la sdong po'i padma'i me tog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336a-2: 'khri shing rnams la 'khri shing gi padma'i me tog kha bye'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336a-4: rdo'i steng du brtol nas steng nas steng du bdun bdun du gyur nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336a-5: dandra padma zhes bya ba phyung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336a-6: nam mkha' nas thur du padma 'phyang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336a-7: thams cad du me tog gi char 'bab bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336a-8: nam mkha' la lha'i rol mo'i sgra sgrogs so; ;stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad me tog dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336a-10: dri chab mchog tu skal pa bzang bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336a-11: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' mngal du zhugs pa nyid nas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyi nye bar 'tshe ba bzlog pa'i phyir ral gri lag tu thogs pa'i lha'i bu bzhis srung bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i yum ni skyes pa la 'dod chags mi skye zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336a-15: grags pa thob par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336a-16: skyid pa sku la dub ba med par byang chub sems dpa' de'ang rum du zhugs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336a-17: nor bu rin po che rab tu dvangs pa srad bu dmar po la brgyus pa bzhin du mthong ngo; ;gang gi phyir yang byang chub sems dpa' zhugs pa'i rum zhes bya ba ni mchod rten gyi nang bzhin du sems can gzhan gyis reg pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336b-0: longs spyod @336b par mi nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336b-1: de'i phyir byang chub sems pa'i yum byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs nas zhag bdun nas dus las 'das nas dga' ldan du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336b-2: ji ltar yang bud med gzhan zla ba bcu las dman pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i yum ni de lta bu ma yin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336b-7: de'ang byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur rum du bsrungs nas 'greng ba la skye'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336b-8: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yum thams cad kyi chos nyid do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336b-9: lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma chen mo 'ang snod kyi nang gi 'bru mar bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur rum du 'tsho zhing rum yongs su rdzogs nas gnyen gyi grong du 'gro'o zhes rgyal po chen po zas gtsang gi drung du smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336b-10: lha rigs kyi rgyud kyi grong khyer chen po lha bstan du bdag 'gro bar 'dong do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336b-11: rgyal pos legs so zhes brjod nas gnang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336b-12: ser skya'i gzhi dang; grong khyer lha bstan gnyis kyi bar gyi lam mtshungs par byas nas chu shing dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336b-15: ba dan la sogs pa'i rgyan 'dzugs su bcug nas lha mo gser gyi bo li la bzhugs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336b-16: blon po stong phrag gcig gis bteg ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:336b-17: 'khor mang po dang bcas pa btang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337a-0: grong khyer gnyis kyi bar du'ang gnyis ka'i @337a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337a-1: grong khyer pa gnas pa'i lumbi n'i'i tshal zhes bya ba la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337a-2: bkra shis pa'i shing s'a la'i shing yod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337a-3: de'i dus su rtsa ba nas rtse mo'i yal ga'i? thams cad du bar ma chad par me tog kha bye bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337a-5: me tog gi bar kha dog sna lnga pa'i bung ba mang po lding ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337a-6: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya mang po'i tshogs ni snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs sgrogs shing spyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337a-7: lumbi n'a'i tshal thams cad ni shing rta sna tshogs pa'i tshal bzhin du mthu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337a-8: dbang phyug ni rgyal po'i mdzes par byas pa'i mdun sa lta bu de lha mos gzigs nas shing s'a la'i tshal du rtse bar bsam pa skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337a-9: blon po rnams kyis lha mo bteg nas shing s'a la'i tshal du bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337a-10: de bkra shis pa'i shing s'a la'i rtsa bar gshegs te des shing s'a la'i yal ga bzung bar sems par gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337a-11: des shing s'a la'i yal ga shin tu legs pa me la sros nas bkug pa bzhin du mdud pa la lha mo'i lag par nye bar 'phyang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337a-12: de'i lag pa brkyang nas yal ga'i rtse mo bzung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337a-13: de ma thag tu las kyi rlung gis bskyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337a-14: de nas de'i phyogs kun tu yol ba byas nas skye bo thams cad phyir ring du gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337b-0: shing s'a la'i yal ga bzung nas 'dug pa nyid la de ltar de'i mngal nas @337b bltams par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337b-1: de ma thag rnam par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i tshangs pa bzhi bos gser gyi dra ba blangs nas slob bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337b-2: de rnams kyis der gser gyi dra bas byang chub sems dpa' blangs te yum gyi mdun na 'dug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337b-4: sems sdug bsngal bar ma byed cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337b-5: khyed kyi sras dbang phyug dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337b-6: grags pa dang bcas pa bltams so zhes smras so; ;de ltar yang sems can gzhan rnams ma'i rum nas 'thon pa na mi gtsang bas gos shing skyug bro ba can 'thon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337b-7: byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta bu ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337b-9: chos kyi khri nas chos 'chad pa 'bab pa bzhin dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337b-10: skas la 'bab pa'i skyes bu bzhin du lag pa gnyis dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337b-11: rkang pa gnyis brkyang nas 'dug pa nyid bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337b-12: ma'i rum nas mi gtsang ba cung zad kyis kyang ma gos par dag cing 'jigs pa med pa bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337b-13: yul ka shi ka'i ras kyi nang du nor bu rin po che bcug pa bzhin du 'od 'gyed cing yum gyi? rum nas 'thon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337b-14: de ltar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i yum de dag par bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' nas chu'i rgyun gnyis babs pas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337b-16: yum gyi sku dag par byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:337b-17: de'ang gser gyi dra bas blangs nas tshangs pa 'dug pa'i lag nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis bkra shis pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338a-0: bde ba la reg par gnas par @338a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338a-1: bya ba'i phyir gzig gi pags pas sngar gyi bzhin du blangs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338a-2: de rnams kyi lag nas mi rnams kyis du gu la'i ras kyi steng du blangs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338a-3: mi rnams kyi lag tu btang nas sa la gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338a-5: stong phrag du ma'i khor yug rnams phan tshun du mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338a-7: mi rnams kyis me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338a-8: spos la sogs pas mchod cing skyes bu chen po khyod lta bu 'di na med /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338a-9: khyod kyi gong na gzhan du 'ang med do zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338a-10: de bzhin du phyogs bzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338a-14: phyogs bcu po thams cad legs par gzigs nas bdag dang mtshungs pa med par mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338a-15: de nas byang gi phyogs su gom pa bdun bgrod do; ;tshangs pa chen po gdugs dkar po 'dzin cing 'thab bral bas rnga yab g-yob pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338a-16: lha gzhan rnams kyis rgyal po la nye bar mkho ba'i dngos po ma lus pa lag tu thogs nas rjes su 'gro'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338a-17: de nas gom pa bdun pa la gnas pa na 'jig rten pa rnams las bdag mchog go zhes pa la sogs pa'i shis pa brjod pa'i gtam brjod cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338a-19: byang chub sems dpas kyang skye ba gsum du yum gyi rum nas 'thon tsam nas gtam du brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338a-20: sman chen por skyes pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338b-0: thams cad @338b sgrol du skyes pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338b-2: sman chen po skyes pa na yum gyi rum nas 'thon ma thag nyid du brgya byin lha'i rgyal po 'ongs te tsandan gyi snying po lag tu thogs nas song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338b-3: de de rnams kyi khu tshur du bcug nas 'thon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338b-4: de nas yang yum gyis dris pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338b-9: 'dis sman khyer nas 'ongs pa'i phyir sman gyi khye'u zhes bya bar ming btags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338b-10: des sman blangs nas chu'i snod kyi nang du bcug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338b-12: 'on ba la sogs pa de rnams de nyid kyi nad thams cad nye bar zhi bas na sman par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338b-13: de nas sman chen po sman chen po zhes brjod cing skyes pa'i tshig gi rgyus sman chen po nyid de'i ming du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338b-15: thams cad sgrol du skyes pa na ma'i rum nas skyes tsam na lag pa g-yas pa brkyang nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338b-17: bdag cag gi khyim na spyin pa gtang rgyu 'dra bdog gam zhes brjod cing 'thon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338b-20: 'byor pa dang ldan pa'i rigs su khyod skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338b-21: bu'i lag pa rang gi lag ba'i steng du gzhag ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338b-22: nor bu rin po che stong phrag gcig gi snod bzhag go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338b-24: 'di skyes pa na 'dis sengge'i sgra sgrogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338b-25: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gsum du ma'i rum nas skyes tsam nas gtam brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:338b-26: ji ltar yang rum du zhugs tsam dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339a-0: bltams tsam na sum cu rtsa gnyis sngon gyi @339a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339a-1: mtshan ma bzhin du skyes par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339a-3: gang gi tshe bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' lumbi ni'i tshal du bltams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339a-4: de ma thag tu lha mo sgra gcan 'dzin gyi ma dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339a-6: blon po nag po 'char ka dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339a-7: rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339a-9: gter bzhi'i bum pa skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339a-10: de la gcig la rgyang grags bzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339a-11: gcig la rgyang grags brgyad dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339a-12: gcig la rgyang grags bcu gnyis dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339a-13: gcig la rgyang grags bcu drug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339a-14: bdun po 'di lhan cig tu skyis pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339a-15: grong khyer gnyis na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' khrid nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi kho nar phyin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339a-16: nyi ma de nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi la rgyal po chen po zas gtsang gi sras por bltams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339a-17: gzhon nu 'di byang chub shing gi drung du bzhugs nas sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes pa la sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas kyi lha rnams kyis dga' ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339a-18: tshim pas lag pa gyen du bskyod nas rtse zhing bstod pa byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339a-19: de'i tshe rgyal po chen po zas gtsang gis mchod gnas snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad thob pa'i dka' thub pa nag po lha len zhes bya ba kha zas bzang po la longs spyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339b-0: nyin mo nyi ma la mi gnas pa'i phyir sum cu rtsa gsum @339b gyi gnas su 'gro zhing der bde bar 'dug nas lha de rnams blta'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339b-1: khyed rnams ci'i phyir 'di ltar dga' ba'i sems kyis rtse /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339b-2: bdag kyang 'di rnams kyi ched du bya ba kho bo la ston cig ces dris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339b-5: rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras bltams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339b-6: des byang chub shing gi drung du bzhugs nas sangs rgyas su gyur nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339b-7: de nas mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rol mo blta ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339b-8: chos thams cad thob bo snyam pa 'di rnams kyi rgyu mtshan gyis dga' bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339b-9: dka' thub pas de'i tshig thos nas myur du lha'i yul nas babs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339b-13: rgyal po chen po'i sras su gyur pa de bdag gis blta'o zhes smras so; ;rgyal pos rgyan dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu blangs nas dka' thub pa la phyag bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs kyis bskor nas dka' thub pa'i ral pa'i steng na 'dug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339b-14: byang chub sems dpas kyang de rnams kyis lus kyis phyag byed par rig pa gzhan med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339b-15: gal te mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa'i dbu la dka' thub pa'i rkang pa bzhag na de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:339b-16: dka' thub pas bdag nyams pa'i phyir du rigs pa ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-0: stan las langs nas byang chub sems dpa' la thal mo sbyar @340a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-1: ro; ;rgyal pos ya mtshan che ba gzigs nas rang gi sras la phyag byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-2: dka' thub bas 'das pa'i bskal ba bzhi bcu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-3: ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa bzhi bcu ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-4: bskal ba brgyad cu rjes su dran no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas sangs rgyas par 'gyur ram /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-6: mi 'gyur zhes brtags pas the tshom med pas sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar rtogs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-7: 'di ya mtshan che ba'i skyes bu yin no zhes bsams nas bgad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-8: de nas 'di nas sangs rgyas nas bdag gis mthong ngam; mi mthong zhes brtags pas mi mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-9: bar du dus las 'das nas sangs rgyas brgya'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-10: sangs rgyas stong gshegs nas brtag par mi nus pa'i gzugs med ba'i gnas su skye bar nges par mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-11: 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis ya mtshan che ba'i skyes bu mthong bar mi nus so snyam ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-12: bdag gi sems shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur nas ngus so; ;de mi rnams kyis mthong ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-13: bdag cag gi 'phags bar 'ga' ni dgod /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-14: re 'ga' ni du ba'i rgyu mtshan ci lags /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-15: bdag cag gi sras 'phags pa la bar du gcod pa 'ong ngam zhes dris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-16: 'di la bar du gcod pa mi 'byung zhing the tshom med par sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340a-17: 'o na gang gi phyir du zhes dris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340b-0: 'di lta bu'i @340b tshul gyi skyes bu sangs rgya bar 'gyur ba bdag gis mthong bar mi 'gyur bas bdag shin tu nges bar sdug bsngal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340b-1: de'i phyir rang gi ched du mya ngan gyis ngu'o zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340b-2: de na ci'i phyir rang gi nye du rnams las 'ga' zhig gis 'di sangs rgyas su gyur nas mthong bar 'gyur ram /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340b-4: zhes brtags pas tsha bo n'a la ka'i gzhon nus mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340b-5: de srid mo'i khang bar song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340b-6: n'a la ka gzhon nu de gang na yod /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340b-10: de rang gi gnas su 'ongs nas n'a la ka la smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340b-12: rgyal po chen po zas gtsang gi rigs kyi bu 'khrungs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340b-13: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi myu gu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340b-14: lo sum cu rtsa lnga 'das nas sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340b-15: khyod kyis 'di mthong bar 'gyur bas da ltar nyid du rab tu byung ba gyis shig ces smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340b-16: bye ba brgyad cu rtsa bdun gyi nor gyi rigs la skyes pa'i gzhon nus /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340b-17: zhang po 'dis bdag la don med cing dgos pa med do zhes brjod par bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340b-18: de ma thag tu rang gi tshong gnas su dur smrig gi gos nyid dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:340b-19: sa'i lhung bzed blangs nas skra dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341a-0: dur smrig gi gos gyon na gang zhig 'jig rten ba'i gang zag gi mchog gi mchog la bsams shing bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bsams te byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs su thal mo sbyar nas yan lag lnga'i phyag @341a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341a-1: byed do; ;lhung bzed snod du bcug nas phrag pa la gzar te gangs can du gshegs nas dge sbyong gi chos byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341a-2: des mchog tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du nye bar song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341a-3: n'a la ka'i so so'i rtogs ba'i gtam thos nas slar yang gangs can du gshegs te dgra bcom pa thob /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341a-4: mchog tu rtogs dka' ba rtogs nas zla ba bdun nyid kyi nang du tshe 'das te gser gyi ri gcig la brten nas 'dug ste lhag ma med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341a-5: byang chub sems dpa' yang zhag lnga nas dbu 'khru bar byed cing ming 'dogs par rigs so zhes bsams nas rgyal po'i pho brang la dri bzhi'i rigs kyis byug par byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341a-6: rin po che lnga'i me tog gcal du bkram nas chu med pa'i 'o ma btsos pa'i 'o thug 'tshod cing rig byed gsum gyi pha rol tu son pa'i bram ze brgya rtsa brgyad mgron du gnyer te rgyal po'i pho brang du bzhugs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341a-7: kha zas bzang po la longs spyod cing bkur sti chen po byas nas mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhes dris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341a-8: de rnams las dga' byed dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341b-0: de rnams de'i @341b tshe bram ze brgyad yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341b-1: yan lag drug gi sngags brda sprad nas bram ze brgyad po 'di lta bu nyid kyi mtshan nyid so sor brjod nas dga' ldan gnas nas ma'i mngal du zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid 'di rnams kyis bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341b-2: de rnams las bram ze bdun gyis mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs te don gnyis lung bstan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341b-3: mtshan nyid 'di dang ldan pas khyim na gnas na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341b-4: rab tu byung na sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341b-5: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad bshad pa rdzogs nas; gzhan de rnams kyi nang nas thams cad kyi gzhon shos kyi rigs ni ko ndi n+ya bram ze'i khye'u 'o zhes bya ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341b-6: byang chub sems dpa' de'i ma'i mtshan mchog rnams rdzogs par btags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341b-7: 'di ni khyim na gnas pa'i rgyu med pas mtha' gcig nyid du khyim na mi gnas par sangs rgya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341b-8: mdzub mo gcig bsgrengs te 'di ltar lung bstan no; ;'di ni sngar gyi gzhi byas pas phyis mir gyur pa na shes rab dang ldan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341b-9: bram ze bdun las lhag par gyur nas 'di'i mtshan nyid rigs par ldan nas khyim du gnas pa'i ming yang med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341b-10: the tshom med par sangs rgya bar 'gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:341b-11: 'gro ba gcig las gzhan ma mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342a-0: de'i phyir mdzub mo gcig bsgrengs te 'di ltar lung @342a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342a-2: de nas bram ze de rnams rang gi khyim du 'gro zhing bu rnams bos te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342a-4: bdag cag rnams rgan por gyur pas rgyal po chen po zas gtsang gi sras thams cad mkhyen pa thob par gyur pa na bdag cag dang mjal bar 'gyur ram /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342a-6: khyod de'i sras kyis thams cad mkhyen pa thob par gyur nas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung zhig ces smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342a-7: bram ze bdun po rnams kyis kyang ji srid tshe gnas kyi bar ji ltar byas pa'i las rtogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342a-8: bram ze'i khye'u ko ndi n+ya nyid nad med par gyur nas gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342a-9: de'i sems dpa' chen po blo dang ldan pa nges par 'byung ba chen pos mngon par byung nas go rim bzhin du lteng rgyas su song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342a-10: sa phyogs 'di ni nyams dga' bas rigs kyi bu sa phyogs 'di dka' ba spyod pa'i gnas su rigs par sems skyes pas der gnas te skyes bu chen po rab tu byung ngo zhes thos nas bram ze'i bu'i gnas su nye bar song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342a-12: gzhon nu don grub rab tu byung nas the tshom med par de sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342a-13: gal te khyed rnams kyi pha nad med par gnas na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342a-14: de ring phyin nas rab tu byung ba byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342a-15: gal te khyod kyang 'dod na 'dir 'ongs nas bdag gis skyes bu de'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342b-0: de thams cad 'dun pa gcig par ma nus @342b par skye bo bzhi po las ko ndi n+ya gtso bo byas nas skye bo lnga po rab tu byung ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342b-1: de rnams kyi skye bo lnga po ni gnas brtan lnga sde zhes bya ba'i rigs su gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342b-3: de'i tshe rgyal po 'di skad du gang mthong nas bdag gi bu rab tu 'byung zhes 'dri'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342b-4: sngon gyi mtshan ma bzhi mthong bas de gang dang rgas zhing 'khogs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342b-8: rgyal pos 'di rnams bzung nas 'di lta bu'i tshul bdag gi bu dang nye bar 'ong du ma 'jug cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342b-9: bdag gi sras kyis sangs rgyas thob kyang don med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342b-10: bdag gi sras stong phrag gnyis kyi gling 'khor dang bcas pa'i gling chen po bzhi po rnams kyi dbang phyug gi bdag po'i rgyal po byed cing dpag tshad sum cu rtsa drug gi 'khor yug gi 'khor nam mkha'i dbyings su gshegs pa la blta bar 'dod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342b-11: slar yang 'di ltar brjod cing 'di lta bu'i rnam pa bzhi'i skyes bu gzhon nu'i mig lam du 'ong ba bsrung zhing phyogs bzhir rgyang grags bzhi bzhir bsrung ba bzhag go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342b-12: de'i nyi ma la'ang bkra shis pa'i gnas su 'dus pa'i rigs kyi nye du stong phrag brgyad cu po re re'i bu brgya yongs su ster bar bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342b-15: bdag gi bu re re ster ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:342b-16: gal te sangs rgyas bar gyur na rgyal rigs kyi dge sbyong nyid kyis mdun rgyab thams cad du bskong nas 'gro ba yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343a-0: @343a *// gal te rgyal por gyur na rgyal rigs kyi gzhon nu nyid kyis mdun rgyab kun nas bskor nas 'gro'o zhes smra zhing 'bul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343a-1: rgyal pos kyang byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs ma chog dang ldan pa skyon thams cad spangs pa'i nu ma snun pa nyid gnas pa byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343a-2: byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mtha' yas pa dpal dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343a-3: skal ba 'phel ba dang ldan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343a-4: de nas nyi ma gcig la rgyal po'i 'bras 'debs pa la bkra shis byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343a-5: de'i nyi ma la grong khyer thams cad du lha gshegs pa bzhin du brgyan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343a-7: las byed pa la sogs pas gos legs po gyon nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343a-9: me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan par byas nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi nang du 'dus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343a-10: rgyal po'i gzhis rnams la zhing rmo ba stong phrag gcig rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343a-11: slar yang de'i nyi ma la gcig gi dman pa'i zhing rmo ba brgyad brgya dang bcas pa'i glang gi gnya' shing gi thag pa dngul las byas pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343a-12: rgyal po 'dzin pa'i zhing rmo ba'i thong pa slar yang gser la byas par gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343a-13: glang gi rva gnyis la gser gyis bskus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343a-14: kha dang ske'i thag pa ni gser la'ang byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343a-15: rgyal po'i 'khor chen po dang bcas pa byon nas sras blangs te gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343b-0: gzhis ka'i gnas na shing 'dzam bu gcig la lo ma mang pos grib ma stug por gyur pa zhig yod @343b pa'i 'og tu gzhon nu'i mal stan chen po byas nas steng du bla res gser gyi skar ma dang mtshungs pa bres te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343b-1: lcags ri ltar yol bas phyogs kun nas bskor te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343b-2: rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par byas nas blon po 'khor dang bcas pa zhing rmo ba'i gnas su gshegs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343b-3: der rgyal pos gser gyi thong ba bzung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343b-4: gcig gis dman pa'i brgyad brgya'i dngul gyi thong pa blon pos bzung ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343b-5: so nams byed pa'i skye bo rnams kyis thong pa lhag ma rnams bslangs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343b-6: de rnams kyi thong pa bzung nas de dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343b-8: rgyal pos slar yang 'di nas phar 'gro zhing pha rol nas tshur 'ongs /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343b-9: de'i gnas phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro zhes bsams nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343b-10: byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'i nu ma snun pa rnams rgyal po'i phun sum tshogs par blta'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343b-11: yol ba'i nang nas phyir 'thon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343b-12: byang chub sems dpa' de dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343b-13: der gzigs pas gcig kyang mi snang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343b-14: myur bar langs nas skyil krung bcas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343b-16: rdub cing bzung bas bsam gtan dang po skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343b-17: nu ma snun pa rnams kha zas za ba'i phyir phan tshun da 'gro zhing de ma thag cung zad thogs par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:343b-18: shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma mi ldog cing gzhan yang shing de'i grib ma rnams kun nas gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344a-1: kyis sras 'phags pa zhes gcig tu brjod cing myur du yol ba steng du brdzes te nang du zhugs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344a-2: byang chub sems dpa' mal stan la skyil krung gis bzhugs pa de'i cho 'phrul mthong nas song ste rgyal po la zhus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344a-4: gzhon nu 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344a-5: 'di ltar shing gzhan rnams grib ma mi bzlog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344a-6: shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni kun nas gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344a-7: rgyal po myur du byon nas cho 'phrul blta ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344a-8: sras 'di la phyag gnyis pa ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344a-9: zhes brjod nas sras la phyag btsal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344a-10: de nas go rim bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' lo bcu drug pa'i na tshod du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344a-11: rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' la dus gsum du rjes su rigs par khang bzang gsum byas nas gcig dgu thog /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344a-14: stong phrag bzhi bcu'i gar byed pa'i bud med rnams nye bar gnas par byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344a-15: byang chub sems dpa' ni lha bzhin du lha dang 'dra ba'i bud med rnams 'khor du byas nas rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i bud med du ma dang bcas pa skyes pa med pa'i rol mo sgrogs pa 'khor du bya ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344a-16: phun sum tshogs pa chen po rjes su myong bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344a-18: dus kyi res pa de dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344a-19: de'i khang bzang du bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344b-0: sgra gcan @344b 'dzin gyi ma de nyid btsun mo rnams kyi gtso mor gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344b-1: de'i de bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa chen po rjes su myong bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344b-2: nyi ma gcig la nye du'i nang du 'di lta bu'i gtam byung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344b-3: don grub rtsed mos brjed nas gshegs shing bzo cung zad kyang mi slob bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344b-4: g-yul so so nas nye bar gyur na ci byed /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344b-5: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bos nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344b-7: khyod kyi nye du rnams don grub bzo cung zad kyang mi slob cing rtsed mos gshegs nas 'gro'o zhes zer ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344b-8: 'dir g-yul byung na ji ltar byed ces bsams /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344b-10: ngas bzo bslabs pa la dgos pa med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344b-11: grong khyer gyi mi rnams bdag gi bzo blta ba'i sems yod na dril sgrogs shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344b-12: 'di nas zhag bdun pa la nye du rnams la bzo bstan par bgyi'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344b-13: rgyal pos de bzhin du byas so; ;byang chub sems dpas sgra la 'phen pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344b-15: gzhu thogs pa 'dus bar byas nas skye bo mang po'i nang du gzhan gzhu thogs pa dang thun mong ma yin pa nye du rnams la bzo bcu gnyis bstan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344b-16: de rnams mnga' 'joms pa'i skyes rabs las 'byung ba'i tshul bzhin du rig par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344b-17: de'i nye du rnams kyi the tshom sel lo; ;gzhan yang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344b-18: byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal du gshegs par bsams nas kha lo sgyur ba pos te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:344b-19: shing rta chas su chug cig ces smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345a-1: so zhes brjod cing tshig thos nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345a-2: shing rta chen po'i 'khor lo'i mchog la ji ltar rigs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345a-3: ku mu ta'i 'dab ma'i mdog dang 'dra ba'i bkra shis pa'i rta bzhis shing rta khrid nas byang chub sems dpa' gshegs so zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345a-4: byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gzhal med khang bzhin du shing rta la zhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs su gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345a-5: lha rnams kyis gzhon nu don grub kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ba'i dus ni nye bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345a-6: sngar gyi mtshan ma rnams blta bar rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345a-7: lha'i bu gcig gis rgas pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345a-12: rgyab grum pa'i lus can lag tu 'khar ba thogs pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345a-13: skad 'dzer bar byed pa bstan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345a-14: de byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur bas mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345a-15: de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la dris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345a-17: skra yang gzhan dang mi 'dra ba ji lta bu /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345a-18: gtso bo chen po'i mdo nas byung ba bzhin 'dri bar bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345a-19: de'i tshig thos nas skye ba mi rtag cing skyes par gyur pa thams cad rgas par 'gyur ro zhes sems sdug bsngal zhing de nyid du bzlog nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345a-20: rang gi khang bzang nyid du gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345a-21: rgyal pos rgyu mtshan ci'i phyir bdag gi sras po myur du ldog pa ci'i phyir dris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345b-0: lha rgas shing @345b 'khogs pa'i mi gcig mthong bas rab tu 'byung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345b-1: myur du bu la gar byed pa rnams sta gon gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345b-2: phun sum tshogs pa nyams su myong bar byas pas rab tu 'byung ba rjes su dran par mi 'gyur ro zhes smras nas srung bar byed pa spel to /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345b-3: phyogs thams cad du rgyang grags brgyad brgyad du bzhag go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345b-5: nyi ma gcig la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du skyed mos tshal du gshegs ba na lhas sprul pa'i nad pa zhig mthong nas sngar bzhin du dris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345b-6: sems sdug bsngal bar gyur te slar yang bzlog nas rang gi khang bzang du gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345b-8: sngar de bzhin du byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345b-9: sngar yang spel te thams cad du rgyang grags bcu gnyis kyi sa'i char srung bar byed pa bzhag go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345b-10: yang nyi ma gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du skyed mos tshal du gshegs pa na lhas sprul ba'i dus la 'das pa zhig mthong nas sngar bzhin du dris te sems sdug bsngal bar gyur nas slar yang bzlog te khang bzang du gshegs nas rgyal pos dris pa slar bzhin du byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345b-11: slar yang srung ba spel te kun nas bskor bar dpag tshad gcig gi tshad la bsrung ba bzhag go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345b-12: slar yang nyi ma gzhan la skyed mos tshal du gshegs pa na de bzhin du lhas sprul ba'i gos bzang po legs pa gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba gcig gzigs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:345b-13: 'di'i ming ci zhes kha lo ba la dris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346a-1: du yang sangs rgyas byon par ma gyur cing rab tu byung ba'i yon tan mi shes /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346a-4: rab tu byung ba yin zhes brjod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346a-5: rab tu byung ba'i yon tan la bsngags pa brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346a-6: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'byung ba la 'dun pa skyes nas de'i nyin mo skyed mos tshal du gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346a-7: slob dpon kha cig 'di skad zer te; sdun gyi mtshan ma bzhi pa nyi ma gcig nyid la mthong ngo zhes zer ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346a-9: de la nyin mo'i char rtse zhing bkra shis pa'i rdzing bur khrus byas nyi ma nub pa na bkra shis pa'i rdo leb kyi stan la bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346a-10: rang la rgyan gyis brgyan par sems so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346a-11: de nas rjes su 'brang ba'i skyes bu rnams la kha dog sna tshogs pa'i gos dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346a-12: rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgyan /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346a-13: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346a-15: byug pa la sogs pa blangs nas phyogs kun tu bskor nas 'dug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346a-16: de ma thag par brgya byin sdod pa'i gdan dro bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346a-17: gang zhig bdag gi gnas 'dor ba'i sems su zhig la skyes par gyur zhes brtags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan byed pa'i dus mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346a-19: las thams cad pa bos so; ;las thams cad pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346a-20: gzhon nu don grub de rang gi mtshan phyed kyi dus su nges par 'byung ba chen pos 'thon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346a-21: 'di de'i phyi ma'i rgyan yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346b-0: skyed mos tshal du song la skyes @346b bu chen po lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan par gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346b-1: des de thos nas legs so zhes brjod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346b-2: lha'i mthus de ma thag par nye bar song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346b-3: de'i rim gro ba dang mtshungs bar gyur nas rim gro pa'i lag tu ras blangs nas byang chub sems dpa'i dbu la bcings so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346b-4: byang chub sems dpa' mgo la lag pas reg pa na 'di mi ma yin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346b-5: lha'i bu yin par shes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346b-6: bcings pa tsam na bcings pa'i dbu'i cod pan nor bu rin po che'i rnam pa la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346b-7: stong phrag gcig gi du ku la'i ras kyis bcings so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346b-8: slar yang 'ching ba na du ku la'i ras stong phrag gcig gis lan bcu dkris nas stong phrag bcus du ku la'i ras bcings so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346b-9: dbu ni chung zhing du ku la'i ras ni mang bas ji ltar bcings zhes mi bsam mo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346b-10: de rnams thams cad la 'khri zhing s'a la'i me tog gi tshad tsam che ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346b-11: yang na ku ba'i me tog gi tshad tsam du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i dbu ki dza la ka'i me tog ltar mtshungs pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346b-13: yang na ku spya ka'i me tog ltar gyur pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346b-14: de nas thams cad kyis so sor brgyan nas rol mo thams cad rang rang gi sgra 'byin zhing bram ze rnams rgyal bar gyur cing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346b-15: dga' bar gyur cig ces rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bkra shis kyis bstod pa'i dbyangs byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:346b-16: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas mchog gi shing rta la chibs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347a-2: rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas bdag gi bu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir pho nya ba btang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347a-3: byang chub sems dpas de thos nas sgrag? can 'dzin skyes pas 'ching ba skyes so zhes gsungs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347a-4: rgyal po bdag gi bu la ci'i phyir 'dri /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347a-5: de'i tshig thos te 'di nas bzung ste bdag gi tsha bo gzhon nu sgra gcan 'dzin nyid ming du gyur to zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347a-6: byang chub sems dpas kyang grags pa chen pos shin tu dga' ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347a-8: skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa'i grong khyer du gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347a-9: de'i tshe goo ta mi skem mo zhes bya ba rgyal rigs kyi bu mo khang bzang gi steng du 'dug pas grong khyer la skor ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang ldan pa'i gzugs mthong nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347a-11: yid bde ba skyes te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347a-12: de yi ma ni zhi bar 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347a-13: de yi pha ni nges bar zhi //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347a-14: de yi bud med nges zhir gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347a-15: de yi yang ni de bdag mtshungs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347a-16: byang chub sems dpas de thos nas bsams pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347a-18: 'di lta bu'i tshul gyi bdag nyid kyi lus mthong bas ma'i sems zhi bar gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347a-20: skye dgu dang skye dgu'i bdag mo'i sems zhi bar gyur zhes smre'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347a-21: ci'i phyir sems zhi ba zhes bya ba'i don gang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347b-0: de nas nyon mongs pa'i chags pa med pa'i @347b sems la de skad brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347b-1: 'dod chags kyi me zhi bar gyur pa ni zhi ba'i ming du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347b-3: gti mug gi me zhi bar gyur pa ni zhi ba'i ming du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347b-5: lta ba la sogs pa'i nyon mongs ba kun skyes pa thams cad zhi ba ni zhi ba'i ming du brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347b-6: 'di bdag la tshig snyan ba brjod cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347b-7: bdag ni mya ngan las 'das pa tshol du 'gro zhing tshol lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347b-8: de ring nyid nas bdag khyim na gnas pa spangs nas nges par 'byung bas rab tu byung nas mya ngan las 'das pa tshol bar rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347b-9: 'di ni bdag gi slob dpon bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347b-10: goo ta mi skem mo la 'bum phrag gcig ri ba'i mu tig gi dra ba mgrin pa nas bkrol te bskur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347b-11: des don grub gzhon nu bdag la chags shing zhen bar gyur pas sems rten bskur ba yin pas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347b-12: des sems bde bskyes par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347b-13: byang chub sems dpa' ni dpal dang ldan ba skal pa bzang po dang ldan pa'i rang gi khang bzang du gshegs nas dpal gyi mal stan la gzims so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347b-14: de ma thag tu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i glu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347b-15: gar rnams legs par bslabs pa'i lha'i bu mo dang 'dra ba'i gzugs mchog dang ldan pa'i bud med rnams kyis rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rol mo bzung nas de la yongs su bskor nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347b-16: mngon par dga' bar byed cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:347b-19: rol mo la sogs pa byed par rtsom mo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348a-1: sems dpa' nyon mongs pa la mi dga' ba'i sems kyis gar la sogs pa la mngon par dga' ba med pas yud tsam gyis mnal du bzhud do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348a-2: bud med de rnams kyang gang gi don du nged rnams kyis gar la sogs byed pa la de mnal du gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348a-3: da ni ci'i phyir bdag cag ngal bar byed /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348a-5: gang bslabs pa'i rol mo rnams la bzhag nas nyal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348a-6: dri bzang dang ldan pa'i 'bru mar gyi mar me dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rab tu sad nas mal gyi steng du skyil krung gis bzhugs nas gzigs pas bud med rnams rol mo bzhag nas gnyid du song ba gzigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348a-7: kha cig mchil ma lug pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348a-8: kha cig ni lus la mchil mas gos pa'i dri ma can du gyur pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348a-9: kha cig ni so 'cha' ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348a-10: kha cig ni ngar ngar 'byin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348a-11: kha cig ni rnya ma rmi 'chad pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348a-12: kha cig ni kha gdangs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348a-13: kha cig ni gos zhus pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348a-14: 'ga' zhig gi ni mtshan ma snang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348a-15: byang chub sems dpas de rnams kyis rnam 'gyur gzigs nas thugs 'jigs pas 'dod pa la mi dga' bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348a-16: de'i rgyan du byas pa ni nye bar ldan pa brgya byin gyi pho brang dang mtshungs pa'i khang bzang chen po yangs shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dri nga bas gang ba'i ro dang ldan pa'i dur khrod dang mtshungs par bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348b-0: srid pa gsum po me 'bar ba'i @348b khyim dang mtshungs par bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348b-1: bdag la gnod par byed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348b-2: 'tshe bar byed pa'o zhes ched du brjod pa 'chad cing shin tu rab tu byung bar 'dod par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348b-3: de bdag gi di ring nyid nas nges par 'byung ba chen pos 'thon par bsams te mal nas bzhengs nas sgo dang nye bar gshegs te 'di na su yod ces dris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348b-4: blon po 'dun pa them pa la sngas byas nas nyal lo /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348b-6: bu bdag blon po 'dun pa yin no zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348b-7: da ni nges par 'byung ba chen pos 'thon par 'dod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348b-8: bdag gi rta gcig la sga gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348b-9: des lha legs so zhes brjod nas rta'i sga khyer te rta rar song nas dri bzang po dang ldan pa'i 'bru mar gyi mar me spar ba su ma na'i me tog can gyi dar gyi bla res kyi 'og na shin tu dga' ba'i sa phyogs la sdod pa'i rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348b-10: da ni bdag gis 'di nyid kyi sga bya bar rig nas bsngags ldan la sga sgron no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:348b-11: des sga sgron bar shes nas 'di sga sgron pa na glo bsdams so; ;nyi ma gzhan la skyed mos tshal du rtsed mo la 'gro ba'i dus su sgra 'di ltar ma byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349a-0: da ni nges par 'byung ba chen pos 'thon par 'dod par gyur to snyam nas sems dga' bas rta skad tsher tsher 'don pa de'i sgra grong khyer thams cad du grags par byed pa slar yang lha rnams kyis de'i sgra bkag nas sus kyang mi thos par byas @349a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349a-1: so; ;byang chub sems dpas kyang blon po 'dun pa rta'i gnas su btang nas re zhig bu la blta bar bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349a-2: grags 'dzin ma'i gnas su gshegs te sgo phye nas de ma thag par nyal sa'i nang du dri bzang po dang ldan pa'i 'bru mar gyi mar me spar /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349a-3: grags 'dzin ma su ma na'i me tog dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349a-4: ma la li ka'i me tog la sogs pa'i me tog mal gyi steng du khal gcig tsam bkram pa'i steng du lag pa bzhag nas gnyid du song ba la byang chub sems dpas sgo'i them pa'i steng du zhabs ya cig bzhag ste 'khod pas gzigs so; ;gal te bdag gi lha mo'i lag pa nas 'then nas rang gi bu blang bar bsams te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349a-5: lha mo gnyid sad na bdag nyid 'gro ba'i bar gcod du 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas su gyur nas bu blta'o sems te khang bzang nas babs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349a-6: slar yang slob dpon kha cig 'di ltar smra ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349a-7: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gshegs pa'i sngon rol gyi nyi ma bdun gyi gong du skyes so zhes zer ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349a-8: de 'dra gzhan du ma bshad pas de'i phyir 'di kho na gzung bar bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349a-9: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' khang bzang nas babs nas rta'i ra ba nyid du gshegs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349a-11: bu bsngags ldan khyod kyis da ni nub gcig bsgral bar gyis zhig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349b-0: bdag khyod kyi drin gyis sangs rgyas su gyur nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad @349b bsgral bar bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349b-1: de nas bsngags ldan gyi rgyab tu chibs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349b-2: bsngags ldan gyi ske nas bzung nas mchu ru khru bco brgyad pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349b-3: de dang mthun pa'i mtho tshad dang ldan zhing mthu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349b-4: mgyogs pa dang ldan la dung phyis pa'i kha dog ltar thams cad dkar ba dang mtshungs pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349b-5: gal te tsher tsher sgrogs pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349b-6: rmig pa'i sgra sgrogs pa'i sgras grong khyer thams cad grags par 'gyur ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349b-7: de'i phyir lha rang gi mthus de sus kyang mi thos par de 'di ltar sgra sgrogs pa bkag go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349b-8: khra khrab 'gro ba'i rkang lag gi rmig pa re re lha'i lag pa'i mthil du nye bar bzhag go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349b-9: byang chub sems dpas rta'i rgyab kyi dngus su bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349b-10: blon po 'dun ba rta'i mjug ma nas zungs shig ces mtshan phyed kyi dus su sgo chen po dang nye bar phyin to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349b-11: de'i tshe slar yang 'di ltar rgyal po chen pos 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang gi dus su yang grong khyer chen po'i sgo phye nas phyi rol tu 'gro bar mi nus par phyed sgo ma'i sgo glegs re re la mi stong phrag re res dbye dgos par bskos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349b-12: byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang ldan pas glang po che'i grangs bye ba stong phrag bcu'i glang po che'i stobs 'dzin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349b-13: mi'i grangs kyis mi bye ba 'bum phrag gcig gi mi'i stobs 'dzin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:349b-14: byang chub sems dpas bsams pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350a-0: da ni bsngags ldan gyi rgyab tu bzhugs pa nyid ni blon po 'dun pas rngam @350a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350a-1: nas bzung ba dang lhan cig nyid du bsngags ldan brlab cir nas khru bco brgyad pa'i lcags ri'i mtho tshad la mchongs te 'da' bar bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350a-3: gal te sgo ma phyed na bdag gi 'phags pa sras dpung pa la khyer nas lag pa g-yas pas bsngags ldan gyi gsus pa mchan khung du bcug nas lcags ri la mchongs te 'da' bar bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350a-5: gal te sgo ma phyed na bdag gis rang gi bdag po ji ltar rgyab tu bzhugs pa de bzhin nyid du blon po 'dun pas rnga ma nas bzung nas lhan cig tu gnas pa nyid du khur nas lcags ri la mchongs te 'da' bar bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350a-6: gal te sgo ma phyed par gyur na ji ltar bsams pa de bzhin du gsum po'i nang nas gang yang rung gcig nges par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350a-7: slar yang sgo srung ba'i lha rnams kyis sgo phye'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350a-8: de ma thag nyid du bdud kyis byang chub sems dpa' bzlog par bsams nas 'ongs te nam mkha' la 'dug nas smras ba /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350a-11: 'di nas nyi ma bdun pa la khyod kyis rin po che'i 'khor lo thob par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350a-12: gling phran stong phrag gnyis kyis yongs su bskor ba'i gling chen po bzhi'i rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350a-15: khyod su zhig yin zhes dris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350b-0: @350b bdag ni 'jig rten gyi dbang po yin zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350b-1: bdud rin po che'i 'khor lo bdag la yod par bdag gis shes te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350b-2: bdag la rgyal po'i dgos pa med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350b-3: stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sgra sgrogs shing sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350b-6: 'di nas bzung nas 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350b-7: gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350b-8: rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa sems la bsams pa'i dus su /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350b-10: bdag gis shes so zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350b-11: grogs dang ma bral bar grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brel bar 'gro'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350b-12: byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid lag tu thogs kyang mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du ltos pa med par dor nas bkur sti chen pos grong khyer nas phyir 'thon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350b-13: dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya la mchog gi skar ma bre'i dus su phyir 'thon nas slar yang grong khyer la bzlog nas blta bar brjod par bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350b-14: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i thugs la 'khrungs tsam nyid na'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350b-15: skyes bu chen po khyod kyis log nas blta ba'i las kyi bsod nams khyod kyis byas pa med dam zhes brjod pa bzhin du sa gzhi chen po rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bzhin du phug nas bzlog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:350b-16: byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer la sngon du phyogs shing 'khod nas grong khyer la gzigs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351a-0: de'i sa phyogs zhig tu bsngags ldan ldog pa'i mchod rten gyi gnas gcig @351a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351a-2: bsngags ldan 'gro ba'i lam la mngon du phyogs bar byas nas byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351a-5: bskal pa bzang po dang ldan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351a-6: de'i tshe lha rnams kyis de'i mdun du stong phrag drug cu'i mar me chen po spar ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351a-7: rgyab kyi phyogs su yang mar me chen po stong phrag drug cu spar ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351a-8: g-yas kyi phyogs su yang mar me chen po stong phrag drug cu spar ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351a-9: g-yon gyi phyogs su yang mar me chen po stong phrag drug cu spar ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351a-10: lha gzhan rnams kyis kyang 'khor yug gi ri'i steng du grangs med pa'i mar me stong phrag mang po spar ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351a-13: 'dab bzang la sogs pas lha'i spos dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351a-14: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351a-16: bdug pa la sogs pas mchod cing 'gro'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351a-17: p'a ri tstsha tra'i me tog nyid dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351a-18: man d'a ra'i me tog sbrin ltar mthug pa rgyun du 'bab pa bzhin du nam mkha' la rgyun mi 'chad par me tog gi char babs par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351a-19: lha'i glu dbyangs sgrogs bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351a-20: kun nas bskor bar stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi rol mo'i sgra sgrogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351a-21: rgya mtsho'i dbus su 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351a-22: ri bo gnya' shing 'dzin gyi 'gram du rgya mtsho'i sgra sgrogs pa'i dus bzhin du 'jug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-0: skal pa bzang po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig la rgyal srid gsum spangs nas @351b dpag tshad sum cu'i mthar yid ldan zhes bya ba'i chu klung gi 'gram du bzhud do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-1: ci'i phyir yang rta 'di'i pha rol tu yang 'gro bar mi nus sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-2: mi nus pa ma yin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-3: de ni khor yug gcig gi nang du snga dro gcig la song nas bskor te de ma thag tu snga dro nyid du 'ongs zhing rang gi mdun du kha zas byin pa za bar nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-4: de'i tshe slar yang lha dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-6: 'dab bzang la sogs pa nam mkha' la 'khod nas spos dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-7: me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa babs te ji srid rta'i brla'i bar du lus nub pas 'thon par mi nus pa spos dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-8: me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa ni; ral pa ltar gdon par mi nus par shin tu thogs par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-9: de'i phyir dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis su song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu klung gi 'gram du 'khod nas blon po 'dun pa la dris pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-13: yid ldan zhes bgyi ba lags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-14: bdag kyang rab tu 'byung ba la yid dang ldan pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-15: zhabs kyis brgyab ste rta bskul pa byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-16: rta yis mchongs nas glang brgyad kyi skad tsam gyis chu klung gi zheng 'gram gyi pha rol tu 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-17: byang chub sems dpa' rta'i rgyab nas babs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-18: dngul dang mtshungs par bye ma'i phung po'i steng du 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-19: 'dun pa bos nas khyod kyis bdag gi rgyan rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:351b-20: bsngags ldan khrid la song zhig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352a-0: @352a *// lta; bdag kyang rab tu 'byung du gsol /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352a-1: byang chub sems dpas khyod kyis rab tu 'byung ba mi thob pas song zhig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352a-2: lan gsum du zhus kyang ma gnang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352a-4: bsngags ldan lag pas gtad de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352a-6: bdag gi skra 'di dge sbyong dang mi mthun no snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis kyang skra breg bar rung ba gzhan med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352a-7: de nas bdag nyid kyis ral gris bregs bar bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352a-8: phyag g-yas pas ral gri bzung nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352a-9: phyag g-yon pas cod pa na dang bcas pa'i nor bu bzung ste bcad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352a-10: dbu skra ni sor gnyis par gyur cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352a-11: g-yas phyogs nas 'khyil bas dbu la gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352a-12: de rnams ji srid 'tsho'i bar de nyid kyi tshad du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352a-13: kha spu yang med par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352a-15: kha spu bzhar mi dgos par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352a-16: byang chub sems dpas cod pa na dang bcas pa'i nor bu bzung nas gal te bdag sangs rgyas par 'gyur na nam mkha' la 'khod cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352a-17: ma yin na sa la lhung bar gyur cig ces nam mkha' la dor ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352a-18: de'i gtsug gi nor bu bcings pa dpag tshad gcig gi tshad tsam du song nas nam mkha' la 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-0: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi lha'i mig gis bltas pas dpag tshad gcig gi tshad tsam gyi rin po che'i zam tog gi nang du bcug nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi pho brang du gtsug gi nor bu bzhugs @352b pa'i mchod rten bzhengs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-1: mchog gi dri yis bsgos pa'i gtsug phud bcad //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-2: gang zag mchog gis nam mkha' la ni dor //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-3: mig stong pa yis dbu skra mgo steng bzung //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-4: gser gyi zam tog tu lha gnas khyer //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-5: slar yang byang chub sems dpas bsams pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-6: yul ka shi ka'i ras 'di dge sbyong bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-7: de nas sangs rgyas 'od srung gi dus su sngon gyi grogs po rdza mkhan tshangs pa chen por gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-8: sangs rgyas gcig gi bar du grogs po dang ma phrad do zhes bsams te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-9: de ni bdag gi grogs po nges par 'byung ba chen pos 'thon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-10: dge sbyong gi yo byad 'di bzung nas 'gro'o zhes bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-11: chos gos gsum dang lhung bzed dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-12: spu gri khab dang ska rags dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-13: chu tshags dang bcas brgyad yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-14: dge sbyong rnams la rigs shing mkho //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-15: dge sbyod gi mkho ba'i yo byad brgyad po 'di bslangs nas phul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-16: byang chub sems dpas mchod par 'os pa'i rgyal mtshan gyon nas rab tu 'byung ba mchog gi cha byad bslangs te 'dun pa la bdag gi tshig gis ma dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-17: yab la bdag la nad med par 'gyur ro zhes smros shig ces pas btang ngo; ;'dun pas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas bskor ba byas nas song //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:352b-18: slar yang bsngags ldan gyis 'dun pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353a-0: byang chub sems dpa' gsung gleng byed cing 'dug pa @353a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353a-2: bdag ni jo bo dang da 'phrad par mi 'gyur zhes bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353a-3: mig lam du spangs nas mya ngan la shin tu gnas pa bsran par ma nus te snying gas nas dus las 'das te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353a-4: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su bsngags ldan zhes bya ba'i lha'i bur skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353a-5: 'dun pa la dang bo'i mya ngan du gyur pa gcig go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353a-6: slar yang bsngags ldan dus las 'das pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis mya ngan gnyis pas gzir to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353a-7: du zhing smre sngags 'don zhing grong khyer du song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353a-8: byang chub sems dpa' de'i phyogs nyid du rjes su dga' ba zhes bya ba'i aa mra'i tshal yod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353a-9: der nyi ma bdun nas rab tu 'byung ba'i bde bas gnas shing nyin mtshan 'da'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353a-10: nyi ma gcig nyid la dpag tshad sum cu'i lam du zhabs kyis gshegs nas rgyal po'i khab tu byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353a-11: byon nas sgo mthar chags su bsod snyoms la gshegs te grong khyer ba thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sku mthong nas glang po che nor skyong zhugs pa'i rgyal po'i khab bzhin dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353a-12: lha ma yin gyi dbang po zhugs pa'i lha'i grong khyer bzhin du kun tu 'khrugs par gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353a-15: 'di lta bu'i gzugs kyi sems can gcig grong khyer na bsod snyoms byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353b-0: 'di gang yin bdag cag gis ma @353b shes so zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353b-1: rgyal po khang bzang gi steng du 'khod nas skyes bu chen po mthong ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353b-4: mi gcig bos nas song la rtogs shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353b-5: gal te mi ma yin par gyur na grong khyer nas phyi rol tu song ste mi snang bar 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353b-6: gal te lha yin par gyur na nam mkha' la 'gro'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353b-7: gal te klu yin na sa'i 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353b-8: gal te mi yin na ji ltar thob pa'i kha zas za'o zhes bsgo'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353b-9: skyes bu chen pos kyang kha zas 'dres pa rnams bsdus nas bdag la 'di tsam gyis chog par rtogs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353b-10: zhugs pa'i sgo nyid nas grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu 'thon te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353b-11: ri skya'o yi grib ma la shar du sdun du phyogs pas bzhugs nas kha zas la longs spyod par brtsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353b-12: de nas gang gi sgyu ma phyin ci log ste kha nas 'thon pa'i rnam par bsams par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353b-13: de nas de'i bdag nyid kyis lus kyis 'di lta bu'i tshul gyi kha zas mig gis mthong ba yang dkon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353b-14: de'i phyir rigs so so'i kha zas la mi dga' bar sems nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353b-15: 'di ltar rang la rang gis gdams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353b-17: khyod rnyed sla ba'i bza' ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353b-18: btung ba'i rigs lo gsum pa'i 'bras dri zhim po'i bza' ba sna tshogs pa'i ro dang bcas pa'i bza' ba'i gnas su skyes bar gyur nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:353b-19: phyag dang khrod pa gcig mthong ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354a-0: nam du'ang bdag ni 'di lta bu'i tshul du gyur nas bsod snyoms la 'gro zhing @354a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354a-2: de'i dus su bdag la de ltar 'gyur ro zhes bsams nas 'thon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354a-3: da ni 'di ci byed pa yin zhes 'di ltar rang la rang gis gdams nas rtogs pa med par kha zas la longs spyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354a-4: rgyal po'i mis 'di'i 'jug pa mthong nas song ste rgyal po la smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354a-5: rgyal pos pho nya ba'i gtam thos nas myur bar grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu thon nas byang chub sems dpa' dang nye bar song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354a-6: spyod lam la dad par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354a-7: byang chub sems dpa' la dbang phyug thams cad rdzogs par phul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354a-8: byang chub sems dpas rgyal po chen po /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354a-10: nyon mongs pa'i 'dod pa'i don med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354a-11: bdag ni mchog gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa don du gnyer bas 'ongs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354a-12: rgyal pos rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sbyin pa byin yang de'i thugs la mi 'phrod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354a-13: nges par khyod sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354a-14: sangs rgyas su gyur nas slar yang dang por bdag gi grong khyer du byon par zhu zhes dam bca' bzung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354a-16: rgyas par ni slar yang 'di rab tu 'byung ba'i don dang bcas pa don dang gtam 'di ni blta zhing rig par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354b-0: byang chub sems dpas kyang rgyal po la dam bca' byin nas go rim bzhin du spyod pa la gshegs shing kun nas @354b tshon dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354b-3: dga' byed bu'i gnas su nye bar gshegs nas snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354b-4: sangs rgyas thob pa'i lam ni 'di ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354b-5: de la snyoms par 'jug pa skyes kyang dgyes par ma gyur nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa'i rang gi stobs dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354b-6: brtson 'grus rnams la legs par blta bar 'dod par dka' ba chen po spyod pa'i bsams pas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354b-7: lteng rgyas su byon te sa phyogs 'di ni shin tu dga' ba yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354b-8: snyam nas de nyid du nye bar gnas par byas te dka' ba chen po sbyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354b-9: de yang koo ndi n+ya la sogs pa rab tu byung ba lnga grong dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354b-11: rgyal po'i pho brang rnams su bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing byang chub sems dpa'i gnas der 'ongs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354b-12: de nas lo drug tu dka' ba chen po spyad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354b-13: da ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354b-14: da ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bzhugs pa'i gnas la byi dor la sogs pa byed cing sku la rim gro byed par gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354b-15: nye bar gnas par gyur to; ;byang chub sems dpa' yang phyi ma'i mthar thug par dka' ba spyad par bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354b-17: 'bras kyi nyag ma gcig la sogs pa'i nyi ma 'da' zhing thams cad du yang kha zas thams cad spangs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354b-18: lha rnams kyis kyang ba spu'i bu ga re re nas mdangs ston to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:354b-19: de nas de'i kha zas med par sku ring par gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355a-0: gser gyi kha dog can gyi @355a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355a-1: sku yang nag por gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355a-2: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang mi snang bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355a-3: nyi ma gzhan la yang rlung dal bus bsam gtan byed cing sku la zug gzer chen po skyes nas 'du shes med par gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355a-5: de nas lha gcig gis dge sbyong goo ta ma dus las 'das so zhes brjod do; ;gcig gis 'gyel ba na dgra bcom pa thob po zhes brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355a-6: der gang zhig gis dus las 'das so zhes brjod nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355a-7: de song ste rgyal po chen po zas gtsang la smras pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355a-8: khyed kyi sras dus las 'das so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355a-9: bdag gi sras sangs rgyas ma thob par dus las 'das sam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355a-10: thob nas dus las 'das zhes dris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355a-11: sangs rgyas thob par ma nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355a-12: dka' ba spyod pa'i gnas su 'gyel nas dus las 'das so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355a-13: 'di thos nas rgyal po yid ma ches par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355a-14: bdag gi sras sangs rgyas ma thob par dus las 'da' ba med do zhes bkag go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355a-15: gang gi phyir slar yang rgyal po yi dam ches nas dka' thub pa nag po lha len gyis phyag byed ba'i dus dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355a-16: 'dzam bu'i shing gi drung nyid du cho 'phrul mthong ba'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyis so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355a-17: slar yang byang chub sems dpas 'du shes thob nas bzhengs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355b-0: lha de song nas rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras po de nad med par gyur to zhes @355b smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355b-1: rgyal pos sras po min par bdag gis shes so zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355b-2: sems dpa' chen po lo drug tu dka' bar byed cing 'di lta bu'i sems su gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355b-3: 'di lta bu'i dka' thub spyod pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin no zhes bsams nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355b-4: kha zas cung zad la longs spyod par byed cing grong dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355b-5: grong rdal rnams su bsod snyoms la rgyu bas bsod snyoms spyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355b-6: de nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gsal bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355b-7: sku gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355b-8: dge slong lnga sde na re /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355b-9: 'di'i lo drug cu dka' ba spyad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par ma gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355b-10: da ni grong la sogs par bsod snyoms spyod cing kha zas bslangs nas za ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355b-11: rol chags par gyur na ci nus /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355b-13: lus la khrus byed par 'dod pas lus kyi ba spu re re'i sgor chu zhugs nas 'dod pa'i thig ler gyur pa dang mtshungs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355b-14: bdag cag de'i 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa yod pa'i gnas su 'dug pas ci zhig bya /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355b-15: skyes bu chen po spangs shing rang rang gi chos gos dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:355b-16: lhung bzed thogs nas dpag tshad bco brgyad kyi lam du song ste; drang srong lhung ba'i tshal du gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356a-0: de'i tshe de'i dus su ltar rgyas na sde can gyi grong rdal ba zhing ba'i khyim du skyes pa'i legs skyes ma zhes bya ba'i bu mo na tshod ldan par @356a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356a-2: n+ya gro dha'i shing gcig don du gnyer to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356a-3: gal te bdag dang mnyam bar skyes pa'i rigs kyi khyim du song nas dang por mngal chags te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356a-4: bu rnyed na de la lo so sor 'bum phrag gcig ri ba'i gtor ma'i las bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356a-5: de'i don du gnyer ba 'grub bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356a-6: des sems dpa' chen po lo drug gi mthar dka' ba spyod pa rdzogs par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356a-7: dpyid zla tha chung gi nya la gtor ma'i las byed par sems so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356a-8: de'i sdun nyid du stong phrag gcig gi ba bzhon ma shing dngar gyi nags su shing dngar za ba de rnams kyi 'o ma bzhos nas gzhon ma'i ba lnga brgya la byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356a-9: de rnams kyi 'o ma bzhos nas ba bzhon ma phyed dang sum brgya la byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356a-10: de bzhin ba bzhon ma bcu drug gi 'o ma bzhos nas ba bzhon ma brgyad la byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356a-11: de srid kyi 'o ma bska mo dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356a-14: mdog dang ldan pa don du gnyer ba 'dod cing 'o ma skol lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356a-15: des dpyid zla tha chung gi nya'i nyin mo'i snga dro gtor ma'i las byed par sems shing mtshan mo'i nam langs kha'i dus su ba 'jo mkhan langs nas ba bzhon ma brgyad po 'jo ru song ba; be'u ba'i nu ma la nye bar ma gyur par yang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356b-0: ba'i nu ma'i gam du snod gsar pa nye bar gnas pa byas pa tsam na rang gi chos nyid kyis 'o ma'i rgyun gyis snod gang bar gyur @356b to; ;legs skyes mas ya mtshan che ba mthong ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356b-1: 'o ma rang gi lag pas khyar nas snod gsar par blugs pa la rang ga lag gis me btang ste 'tshod par brtsams nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356b-2: der 'o thug skol pas lbu ba chen po 'thon nas g-yas phyogs su 'khor zhing thur ma gcig tsam yangs la ma lhung la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356b-3: thab na du ba cung zad kyang med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356b-4: de'i tshe 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po 'ongs nas tha ba srun par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356b-5: tshangs pa chen pos ni gdugs 'dzin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356b-6: brgya byin gyis ni ji ltar rigs pa'i me gtong bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356b-7: stong phrag gnyis kyis yongs su bskor ba'i gling chen po bzhi'i lha dang mi rnams kyis ji ltar rigs pa'i mdangs rnams /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356b-8: lha rang rang gi mthus bsdus nas bcug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356b-9: mi rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du byas nas dus gzhan la lha rnams zan gyis gong bu re res mdangs 'jug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356b-10: slar yang byang chub ba'i nyin mo dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356b-11: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i nyin mo snod nyid du 'jug par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356b-12: legs skyes mas nyi ma gcig nyid la der rang nyid gsal bar gyur nas ya mtshan che ba du ma mthong ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356b-13: bran mo rdzogs ma zhes bya ba bos nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356b-15: de ring bdag cag gi lha shin tu dgyes bar gyur te /
