K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:356b-16: bdag gis de rnams khyi dus su 'di lta ba'i tshul gyi ya mtshan che ga ma mthong bas myur du song la lha'i gnas su byi dor legs bar gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357a-2: 'phags ma de'i tshig bzung ste myur ba myur bar shing gi drung du phyin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357a-3: byang chub sems dpas kyang de'i mtshan mo'i cha la rmi lam chen po lnga gzigs pa yongs su rtog cing the tshom med par bdag de ring sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur bar bya'o snyam du thugs brtan por mdzad nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357a-4: de'i nub mo 'das te sku'i byi dor mdzad nas bsod snyoms la gshegs pa'i dus kyi snga dro byon te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357a-5: shing n+ya gro dha'i drung du bzhugs nas rang gi 'od kyis shing thams cad snang bar mdzad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357a-6: de nas yang rdzogs ma de 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' shing gi drung na shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams la gzigs shing gzigs pa mthong la sku la 'od zer 'thon pa'i 'od kyis shing thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357a-8: de ring bdag cag gi lha shing la babs nas rang gi lag nyid kyis gtor ma len cing bzhugs so zhes bsams pas sems tshim pa thob nas myur du song ste legs skyes ma la don de rnams smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357a-9: legs skyes mas de'i tshig thos nas sems tshim par gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357a-10: de ring nas bzung nas bdag gi bu mo chen mo gnas su sdod cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357a-11: ces bu mo la ji ltar rigs pa'i rgyan thams cad byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357b-0: slar yang gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi yongs su @357b rdzogs par thob pa'i nyin mo 'bum phrag gcig gi grangs kyang gser gyi sder ma chen po thob par rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357b-1: de'i phyir gser gyi sder ma chen po'i nang du 'o thug ldugs pa'i sems skyes nas 'bum phrag gcig ri ba'i gser gyi sder ma chen po bslangs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357b-2: 'o thug btsos pa'i nang du kha spub nas blug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357b-3: 'o thug thams cad padma'i 'dab ma'i nang gi chu bzhin du chu'i thigs pa gcig tu gyur nas gser gyi sder du byung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357b-4: gser gyi sder ma gcig gang ba'i tshad tsam du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357b-5: des gser gyi snod de la gser gyi snod gzhan gyis bkab nas gos kyis dril to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357b-6: legs skyes ma rgyan gyis lus thams cad brgyan nas gser gyi sder ma de rang gi mgor bzhag ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357b-7: mthu chen pos shing n+ya gro dha'i drung du phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357b-8: byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas shin tu yid bde bskyes par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357b-9: shing gi lha yin nam zhes bsams nas blta ba'i gnas su dud cing dud cing song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357b-10: mgo'i steng gi gser gyi sngar ma phab nas kha phye ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357b-11: gser gyi ril ba spyi blugs kyis dri bzang pos bsgos pa'i chu bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' dang nye bar song ste 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:357b-12: grogs po rdza mkhan tshangs pa chen por gyur pas phul ba'i sa'i lhung bzed ni de rnams kyi dus su byang chub sems dpas ma spangs kyang de de ma thag tu mi snang bar gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358a-0: byang chub sems dpas lhung bzed @358a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358a-2: phyag g-yas pa brkyang nas chu bslang ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358a-3: legs skyes mas snod dang bcas pa nyid kyis 'o thug skyes bu chen po'i phyag cu phul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358a-4: skyes bu chen pos legs skyes ma la brtags pa na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358a-7: bdag gis yid la yongs su phul gyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358a-8: bzhes la ji ltar bzhed pa bzhin gshegs par zhu zhes phyag byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358a-9: ji ltar bdag gi 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358a-10: 'di ltar nyid kyis kyang bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces smras so; ;'bum phrag gcig ri ba'i gser gyi sder ma chen po gcig shing gi lo ma rnying pa bzhin du ltos pa med par song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358a-11: byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pa las bzhengs nas shing la bskor ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358a-12: gser gyi sder ma blangs nas chu klung ne ra dza na'i 'gram du gshegs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358a-13: byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa 'bum brag mang po rnams gyis mngon par byang chub pa'i nyin mo babs nas khrus byed pa'i gnas su legs par rab tu gnas pa'i mu gnas zhes bya ba yod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358a-14: de'i 'gram du sder ma bzhag ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358a-16: 'bum phrag du ma'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi na bza' dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358a-17: mchod bar 'os pa gyon nas shar phyogs su sngon du phyogs pas bzhugs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358b-0: ta la'i @358b shing tog gi nang gi rus pa cig gi tshad tsam dang mnyam pa gcig gis dman pa'i lnga bcu'i gong bu byas nas chu med cing dngar ba'i 'o thug thams cad gsol lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358b-1: de 'di ltar gang gis sangs rgyas su gyur nas zhag bzhi bcu zhe dgu ru byang chub kyi snying por bzhugs te zhag bzhi bcu zhe dgu'i kha zas su gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358b-2: de rnams kyi dus su kha zas gzhan med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358b-3: khrus byed pa med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358b-4: zhal shol ba med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358b-5: sku lus kyi bya ba byed pa med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358b-6: bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358b-8: 'bra bu'i bde ba nyid kyis nyin mtshan 'da'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358b-10: de'i 'o thug gsol nas gser gyi snger ma phyag tu bzhes te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358b-11: gal te bdag ni de ring sangs rgyas su 'gyur nus? na sder ma 'di chu'i steng du gyen du 'gro bar gyur cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358b-12: ma yin na thur la 'gro bar gyur cig ces chu la dor ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358b-13: des chu'i rgyun gyi rlabs chu klung gi dbus su song nas dbus kyi gnas nyid du rta ma gyogs por 'gro ba bzhin du /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358b-14: khru brgyad cu'i tshad tsam gyi steng du song zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:358b-15: chu lan gcig 'khyil bas bying nas klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas su song ngo /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359a-0: de nas sangs rgyas gsum po rnams kyis bshos gsol ba'i gser gyi sder mchen po sil sil zhes sgra sgrogs par byed cing phyogs gcig tu de rnams thams cad kyi 'og? @359a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359a-2: klu'i rgyal po nag pos de'i sgra thos nas kha sang sangs rgyas gcig thob bar gyur cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359a-3: slar yang de ring sangs rgyas nyid thob par gyur nas mang pos bstod pa byed par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359a-4: byang chub sems dpas ni chu klung gi 'gram shing s'a la'i tshal du nyin mo bzhugs nas srod kyi dus su me tog ku mud kha 'bye ba'i dus la lha rnams kyis brgyan par byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359a-5: zheng la glang gi skad brgyad kyis thos pa'i tshad du lam byed pa la seng ge bzhin du sgra bsgrags nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359a-6: byang chub kyi shing la mngon par phyogs pas bzhud do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359a-9: 'dab bzang la sogs pa rnams kyis lha'i spos dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359a-10: me tog la sogs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359a-11: klu'i glu dbyangs la sogs pas mchod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359a-12: stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams dri bzang por gyur cing me tog gi phreng bar gyur nas thams cad legs so zhes brjod par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359a-13: de'i tshe rtsva 'tshod bkra shis zhes bya bas rtsva blangs nas lam gyi sngon du 'ongs te skyes bu chen po'i rnam 'gyur rtogs nas rtsva sbar mo brgyad phul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359a-14: byang chub sems dpas rtsva blangs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359a-15: byang chub kyi snying po dang nye bar gshegs te lho phyogs kyi char zhal byang du mngon par phyogs pas 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359b-0: de ma thag par lho phyogs kyi khor yug gi sa bying nas 'gro ba ni 'og @359b mnar med ba'i bar du gyur pa bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359b-1: byang phyogs kyi khor yug steng du langs nas 'gro ba ni srid ba'i rtse mor gyur pa bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359b-2: byang chub sems dpas 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i gnas ma yin no zhes dgongs zhing bskor nas nub kyi phyogs kyi char gshegs te shar phyogs su mngon du phyogs pas 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359b-3: de nas nub phyogs kyi khor yug 'og tu bying nas 'gro ba ni mnar med pa'i bar du gyur pa bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359b-4: shar phyogs kyi khor yug steng du langs nas 'gro ba ni srid pa'i rtse mor gyur pa bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359b-5: byang chub sems dpa' 'khod cing 'khod pa'i gnas ni mu khyud kyi mthar thug par mnan zhing so sor gnas pa'i shing rta'i 'khor lo chen po lta bur sa gzhi chen po la bying zhing bying nas 'gro bar gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359b-6: byang chub sems dpas 'di ni byang chub thob pa'i gnas ma yin no zhes bskor nas byang phyogs kyi char gshegs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359b-7: lho phyogs su sdun du phyogs pas 'khod do; ;de nas byang gi khor yug sa la bying nas mnar med kyi bar du gyur pa bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359b-8: lho'i khor yug gyen du langs nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du gyur pa bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359b-9: byang chub sems dpas 'di ni byang chub thob pa'i gnas ma yin no zhes bsams te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:359b-10: bskor nas shar phyogs kyi char gshegs nas nub phyogs su sdun du phyogs pas 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360a-1: shar phyogs kyi chang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis skyil krung? bcas ba'i gnas de g-yo bar mi 'gyur zhing mi ldeg go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360a-2: sems dpa' chen pos 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma spangs shing mi g-yo ba'i gnas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360a-3: nyon mongs pa'i dra ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gnas su rtogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360a-4: de'i rtsva rnams rtse mo nas bzung ste bkra ma nas de ma thag tu khru bcu bzhi pa'i tshad tsam gyi gdan du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360a-5: de yang de lta bu'i tshul gyis ji ltar bzhag pa de bzhin du mi gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360a-6: ji ltar gzugs la mkhas pa'i ri mo byed pa rnams kyis ri mo bris pa bzhin du byang chub sems dpas byang chub shing gi sdong po la sku rgyab rten par byas nas zhal shar du sdun du phyogs par mdzad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360a-7: brtan pa'i sems su gyur nas bdag gi pags pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360a-11: sha rnams skam par gyur kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma thob par du ni stan 'di las lus bskyod par mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360a-12: thog brgya phrag babs kyang mi phyed cing pha rol gyis mi tshugs par stan la skyil krung gis bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360a-13: de'i tshe lha'i bu'i bdud kyis gzhon nu don grub bdag gi dbang du byed par 'dod pas da ni bdag las 'da' bar byed du mi ster ro zhes bsams nas bdud kyi dmag dang nye bar song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360b-0: don 'di smras @360b shing bdud kyi sgra zhes pas sgra bsgrags nas bdud kyi dmag khrid de 'thon nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360b-1: bdud kyi sde bdud kyi mdun du dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi sar 'gro'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360b-3: g-yon phyogs rnams su dpag tshad bcu gnyis 'gro'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360b-4: rgyab phyogs su ji srid khor yug gi gnas mthar thug bar byas nas gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360b-6: 'khor thams cad kyi gtam byed pa'i sgra dpag tshad stong phrag gcig gi bar du sa gzhi 'bugs pa tsam gyi sgra thos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360b-7: de nas lha'i bu'i bdud dpag tshad phyed dang nyis brgya'i ri'i 'og pag zhes bya ba'i glang po che'i rgyab tu zhon nas lag pa stong phrag gcig sprul nas mtshon cha sna tshogs pa blangs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360b-9: bdud kyi 'khor gyi grogs gnyis gcig dang mtshungs par mtshon cha'i rigs gnyis mi len no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360b-10: kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360b-11: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gdong can sems dpa' chen po gzhom par bya ba'i phyir 'ongs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360b-12: stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi lha rnams slar yang sems dpa' chen po la bstod pa byed cing gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360b-13: brgya byin lha'i rgyal pos rnam par rgyal ba bla na med pa'i dung 'bud cing 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360b-14: slar yang dung de khru brgya nyi shur gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:360b-15: gal te legs bar bus na zla ba bzhi'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad cing de nas rgyun chad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361a-0: klu'i rgyal po nag po chen pos brgya phrag du ma'i bstod pa byed @361a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361a-2: tshangs pa chen po gdugs dkar po bzung nas gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361a-3: slar yang bdud kyi dmag byang chub kyi snying por 'ongs shing 'ongs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361a-4: lha de rnams gcig tu 'khod par ma nus pas rang gi gnas su bros nas song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361a-5: klu'i rgyal po nag pos la bying nas dpag tshad lnga brgya'i snye ma can gyi klu'i pho brang du song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361a-6: lag pa gnyis kha la bkab nas nyal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361a-7: brgya byin gyi rnam par rgyal ba bla na med pa'i dung rgyab tu bkal te khor yug gi steng du 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361a-8: tshangs pa chen pos gdugs dkar po khor yug gi steng du btsugs nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361a-9: lha gcig gis kyang 'khod par ma nus te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361a-10: skyes bu chen po nyid gcig pu bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361a-11: bdud kyis rang gi 'khor la smras pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361a-13: zas gtsang gi bu don grub dang 'dra ba'i skyes bu gzhan med pas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361a-14: bdag gis de'i mdun du g-yul 'gyed par mi nus kyi rgyab kyi phyogs su g-yul bgyi'o zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361a-15: skyes bu chen pos kyang phyogs gsum la gzigs pas lha thams cad bros pa'i phyir gnas thams cad stong par mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361a-16: gzhan yang byang phyogs su gzigs pas bdud kyi dmag rnams bdag gzhom pa'i phyir 'ongs pa gzigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361b-0: 'di rnams kyi dmag gi tshogs bdag gcig pu'i phyir rtsol ba chen pos pha rol gnon par @361b byed cing gnas 'dir 'ongs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361b-4: su yang rung bas gnyen las gzhan med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361b-6: gang gi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po nyid bdag gis dus yun ring por gnyen la dga' ba bzhin goms pa de'i phyir bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyis phub byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361b-7: pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyis mtshon thogs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361b-8: 'di'i dmag gi tshogs rnam par gzhom par rigs so snyam nas pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po thugs la bsams nas bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361b-9: de nas lha'i bu'i bdud kyis don grub de ma thag tu 'bros par byed par rigs so zhes smras nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor nye bar gnas nas 'ongs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361b-10: de ma thag kho nar shar phyogs la sogs pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams langs nas 'ongs te dpag tshad phyed dang yang gnyis la sogs pa'i tshad kyi ri'i phung po blangs nas nags thibs po dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361b-11: shing la sogs pa sa la bton zhing thams cad du grong dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361b-13: rnam par phye mar byed pa'i nus pa ni skyes bu chen po'i bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis mthus gyes te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs nas bla gos kyi grva tsam yang bsgul par mi nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361b-15: de nas chu yis gzhom pa'i phyir 'ongs nas gsod par bsams pa na char pa chen po 'bab cing gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:361b-16: de'i mthus steng nas steng du brgya phrag du ma brtsegs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362a-1: ma brtsegs pa'i sprin chen po 'dus nas char 'bebs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362a-2: char pa'i rgyun gyi shugs kyis sa gzhi 'bugs par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362a-4: shing la sogs pa'i steng gi char sprin chen po 'ongs nas sems dpa' chen po chu thigs gcig tsam gyis kyang spang bar ma nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362a-5: de nas rdo yi char pa bkug nas ches che ba'i ri'i phung po du bar byed cing 'bar bar byas nas nam mkha' nas 'ongs te byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362a-6: lha'i me tog gi chun bu'i gzugs 'bab bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362a-7: de nas mtshon cha'i char thams cad bkug nas mtshon so gcig pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362a-11: spu gri la sogs pa'i mtshon cha rnams du bar byed cing 'bar bar byas nas nam mkha' la 'ongs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs nas lha'i me tog tu gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362a-13: de nas sol ba'i char bkug nas rgya skyegs kyi me tog gi kha dog can gyi sol ba nam mkha' nas 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs drung du lha'i me tog tu gyur nas 'bab bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362a-14: de nas thal ba'i char pa rnams bkug nas shin tu dro ba me'i kha dog can gyi thal ba nam mkha' nas 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs drung du tsandan gyi phye ma ltar gyur pa'i char 'bab bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362b-0: de nas bye ma'i char bkug @362b nas shin tu phra ba'i bye ma rnams du bar byed cing 'bar bar byas nas nam mkha' nas 'ongs te byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs drung du lha'i phye ma ltar gyur nas char 'bab bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362b-1: de nas 'jim pa'i char pa rnams bkug nas 'jim pa rnams du bar byed cing 'bar bar byas nas nam mkha' nas 'ongs te byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs drung du lha'i byug par gyur nas 'bab bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362b-2: de nas 'di bzhin du 'jigs par byed pas don grub 'bros par bya ba'i phyir mun pa nye bar gnas par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362b-3: de ni yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i mun nag chen por gyur nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i drung du sleb nas nyi ma'i 'od kyis mun pa bcom pa bzhin du mi snang bar gyur nas 'di ltar bdud dgu po 'di rlung dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362b-13: de rnams char du 'babs nas byang chub sems dpa' 'bros par byed par ma nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362b-14: cis brjod cing ci'i phyir sdod /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362b-19: ces 'khor rnams bos nas rang gis kyang ri'i 'og pag glang po che'i rgyab tu zhon nas 'khor lo'i mtshon cha bslangs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362b-20: byang chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar 'ongs nas don grub stan las longs shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:362b-21: 'di khyod la rigs pa ma yin gyi nged la rigs pa yin no zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363a-1: de'i tshig thos nas 'di ltar smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363a-2: bdud khyod kyis pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ma rdzogs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363a-3: nye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma rdzogs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363a-4: don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma rdzogs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363a-5: chen po lnga yongs su gtong ba med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363a-6: gnyen gyi don du spyod pa med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363a-7: 'jig rten gyi don gyi spyod pa med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363a-8: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yongs su ma rdzogs pas stan 'di khyod la rigs pa ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363a-9: stan 'di bdag kho na la rigs pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363a-10: bdud khros par gyur nas khros ba'i shugs bsran par ma nus te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363a-11: skyes bu chen po la mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'phangs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363a-12: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu sems par byed cing bzhugs pa na steng gi char me tog gi phreng ba'i bla res bres pa bzhin du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363a-13: de'i 'khor lo'i mtshon cha gzhan yang de shin tu khros pas 'phangs te rdo ba mthug po'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363a-14: rdo ba mthug po'i ka ba 'bugs shing 'gro ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363a-15: slar yang de ni de'i me tog gi bla res su gyur nas gnas pa na bdud kyi 'khor lhag ma rnams de nas stan las langs te 'gro bar bsams nas ches che ba'i ri'i phung po 'phangs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363a-16: de rnams kyang skyes bu chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la sems zhing bzhugs pa na me tog gi chun por gyur nas sa la lhung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363b-0: lha rnams khor yug gi mthar 'khod pa rnams ske @363b bteg nas blta zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363b-1: mgo bo bteg cing bteg nas don grub gzhon nu mchog gi sku'i bdag nyid nyams sam snyam nas ci byed na zhes bsams zhing blta'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363b-2: de nas skyes bu chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i nyin mo thob pa'i stan bdag la rigs pa yin no zhes bshad nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363b-5: khyod kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i dbang po su yod zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363b-6: bdud 'di rnams thams cad bdag gi dbang po yin no zhes bdud kyi dmag rnams la lag pa brkyang ngo; ;de ma thag par bdud kyi 'khor rnams nga yang dbang po yin zhes brjod pa'i sgras sa gzhi yang ral ba bzhin du brjod pa'i sgrar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363b-7: de nas bdud kyis skyes bu chen po la smras pa; don grub /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363b-8: khyod kyis sbyin pa gtang ba'i dngos po la dbang po su yod ces smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:363b-9: skyes bu chen po khyod kyis re zhig sbyin pa byin pa'i dngos po la sems dang bcas pa rnams dpang po yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364a-0: slar yang bdag la gnas 'di na sems dang bcas pa'i dbang po su yang med pas bdag nyid kyis skye ba'i mthar sbyin pa gtang ba de srid gnas pa thams cad sgrol gyi lus kyi bdag nyid la gnas nas sbyin pa chen po bdun brgya pa bdun byin pa'i dngos po la sems med pa'i sa gzhi chen po mthug po 'di dpang po yin no zhes chos gos kyi nang @364a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364a-1: nas phyag g-yas pa bton te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364a-2: thams cad sgrol gyi bdag nyid kyi lus su gnas nas bdag gis sbyin pa bdun brgya pa bdun byin pa'i dngos po de la khyod kyis dpang po yin nam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364a-3: ma yin pa smros shig ces sa chen po la mngon du phyogs pas phyag brkyang ba na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364a-4: sa chen pos bdag ni de'i tshe dpang po yin no zhes sgra sgrogs par gyur nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364a-5: sgra chen po sgrogs pa brgya dang stong phrag gcig dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364a-6: sgra chen po 'bum phrag gcig po rnams kyis bdud kyi dmag gi sgra rnams zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364a-7: de nas skyes bu chen po don grub kyi sbyin pa chen po byin ba ni mchog gi sbyin pa'o zhes thams cad sgrol gyi sbyin pa dran par byed cing dpag tshad phyed dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364a-8: nyis brgya'i ri'i 'og pag gi glang po che pus mo sa la btsugs nas 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364a-10: mtshams rnams su bros nas gnyis lam gcig la 'gro ba med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364a-11: mgo yi rgyan nyid dang gyon pa'i gos dang por dor nas rang gi phyogs phyogs nyid du 'bros so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364a-12: de nas lha'i tshogs rnams kyis bdud bros nas 'gro ba mthong ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364a-13: bdud rnams pham pas don grub gzhon nu rgyal bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364a-14: zhes rgyal ba'i mchod pa byed par sems so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364a-15: klu ni klu rnams la bskul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-0: @364b tshangs pas ni tshangs pa rnams la bskul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-2: me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa lag tu thogs nas byang chub shing gi drung du skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i skyes bu chen po dang nye bar 'ongs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-3: de ltar bdud rnams bros nas song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-4: dpal ldan sangs rgyas rgyal bar gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-5: sdig can bdud ni pham par gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-6: rab dga' byang chub snying por sgrogs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-7: de tshe drang srong klu tshogs rgyal //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-8: dpal ldan sangs rgyas rgyal bar gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-9: sdig can bdud ni pham par gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-10: rab dga' byang chub snying po sgrogs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-11: 'dab bzang tshogs kyi drang srong rgyal //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-12: dpal ldan sangs rgyas rgyal bar 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-13: sdig can bdud ni pham par gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-14: rab dga' byang chub snying por sgrogs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-15: sna tshogs de tshe drang srong rgyal //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-16: dpal ldan sangs rgyas rgyal bar gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-17: sdig can bdud ni pham par gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-18: rab dga' byang chub snying por sgrogs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-19: tshangs tshogs de tshe rgyal bar sgrogs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-20: mthar stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi lha rnams kyis me tog dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-22: byug pa rnams kyis mchod par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-23: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bstod pa byed cing 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:364b-24: 'di ltar skyes bu chen po nyi ma nub pa'i tshe bdud rnam par bcom nas chos gos kyi steng du byang chub kyi shing gi 'dab ma myu gu lta bu lhung zhing byu ru dmar pos mchod par byed pa lta bu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365a-1: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa ye shes kyi rtogs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365a-2: thun bar pa la lha'i spyan rnam par dag pas ye shes thob pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365a-3: thun tha ma la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ye shes thob bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365a-4: de nas rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi rkyen gyis rnam par 'jug pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365a-5: mi 'jug pa'i lugs las byung ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365a-6: lugs las bzlog pa dran par byed cing dran par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365a-7: stong phrag bcus 'jig rten gyi khams chu'i mthar thug par byas nas lan bcu gnyis su yang dag par g-yos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365a-8: slar yang skyes bu chen pos stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sgra chen po sgrogs shing skya rengs shar ba'i dus su thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so sor myong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365a-9: stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad brgyan pa bzhin du rigs par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365a-10: shar phyogs kyi khor yug gi steng du rgyal mtshan dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365a-11: ba dan btsugs pa'i sham bus nub kyi khor yug gi steng du chags so; ;de bzhin du nub kyi phyogs kyi khor yug gi mtha'i steng du rgyal mtshan dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365a-12: ba dan btsugs pa'i sham bus shar gyi khor yug gi steng du chags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365a-13: byang gi phyogs kyi khor yug gi steng du rgyal mtshan dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365a-14: ba dan btsugs pa'i sham bus lho'i khor yug gi steng du chags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365a-15: lho'i phyogs kyi khor yug gi steng du rgyal mtshan dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-0: ba @365b dan btsugs pa'i sham bus byang gi khor yug gi steng du chags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-1: sa gzhi las langs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-2: ba dan tshangs pa'i gnas su chags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-3: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi gnas su bcings pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-4: ba dan sa gzhi'i steng du chags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-5: stong phrag bcu'i khor yug la me tog gi shing la me tog kha bye'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-6: 'bras bu'i shing la 'bras bu mang por gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-7: sdong po rnams la sdong po'i padma'i me tog kha bye'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-8: yal ga rnams la yal ga'i padma'i me tog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-9: 'khri shing rnam la 'khri shing gi padma'i me tog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-10: nam mkha' nas thur du padma'i me tog 'chang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-12: rdo'i steng brtol nas steng nas steng du bdun bdun du gyur te rgyun chags pa'i padma'i me tog zhes bya ba phyung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-13: stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyad par du 'phags pa'i me tog gi gdan bzhin du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-14: khor yug gi bar dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad kyi 'jig rten gyi bar gyi dmyal ba nyi ma bdun gyi 'od kyis kyang snang bar byed pa med pas na dkon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-15: de dang mtshungs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar gyi dmyal ba pa de ma thag tu snang bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-16: dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong tsam gyis zab pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i chu dang por gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-17: chu klung rnams ni 'gro ba gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:365b-18: dmus long rnams kyi mig gis gzugs mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-2: gong po rnams kyis 'gro shes par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-3: bcings pa'i sems can rnams ni rjes su bcings pa las grol bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-4: 'di ltar tshad med pa'i dpal du gyur nas mchod pa dang ya mtshan pa'i chos rab tu skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-5: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so sor rig go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bshad pa ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-7: skye bo'i 'khor ba ma lus pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-8: dug med rnam par dug med tshol //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-9: khyim med pa ni tshol ba na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-10: skye ba'i sdug bsngal yang yang dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-11: khyim med pa ni mthong bar gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-12: slar yang khyim ni byed pa med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-13: de yi sdug bsngal thams cad bcom //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-14: dug gi ming can khyim gyis phung //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-15: sems ni 'du byed pa las grol //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-16: sred pa zad nas med par gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-17: ces pa 'di ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang du gnas pa nas bzung ste ji srid byang chub snying po 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa de rnams kyi gnas ni gleng gzhi bar ma zhes bya ba yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-20: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i gnas su bzhugs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-21: yangs pa can gyi nags tshal chen po khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas su bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366a-22: de ltar de dang de'i gnas rnams su bzhugs shing de dang de'i gnas nyid thob ces brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366b-0: gang @366b ci yang 'di ltar brjod pa de nas yang de dang po nas bzung nas 'di ltar rig par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366b-1: bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas ched du brjod cing ched du brjod pa de lta bu'i sems skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366b-2: bdag gis bskal pa grangs med pa bzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366b-3: 'bum phrag gcig lhag pa nas skyil krung bcas pa 'di'i ched du dus 'di rnams la bdag gi mgo rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i mgrin pa nas bregs te sbyin par btang ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366b-4: spyan bzang po btang ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366b-5: snying gi sha bregs nas btang ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366b-6: gzhon nu dra ba 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i bu sbyin par btang ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366b-7: krishna dzi na'i gzhon nu ma dang mtshungs pa'i bu mo sbyin par btang ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366b-8: lha mo ma tri dang mtshungs pa'i chung ma rnams gzhan gyi bran gyi phyir sbyin par btang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366b-9: 'di ni bdag gi 'dug stangs yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366b-12: 'di la bdag bzhugs nas bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366b-13: re zhig stan 'di las bdag mi ldang ngo snyam du bsams nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366b-14: bye ba 'bum phrag du ma la snyoms par zhugs nas mnyam par gnas te zhag bdun du de nyid du bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366b-15: de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do; ;de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bdun du 'dug stangs gcig gis bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:366b-17: bde ba so sor rig cing bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367a-1: gang zhig da dung yang nges par don grub la bya ba yod dam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367a-2: 'dug stangs 'di la zhen pa ma spangs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367a-3: rnam par rtog pa yongs su bskyed do zhes bsams nas ston pas lha rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa mkhyen nas de rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367a-4: steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug nas so sor cho 'phrul bstan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367a-5: byang chub kyi snying por mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367a-6: nye du dang 'dus pa'i dus su mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367a-7: klog pa'i mdo dang 'dus par mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad aa smra srun pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367a-8: aa mra'i shing gi drung du mdzad pa'i so so'i cho 'phrul dang mtshungs par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367a-9: 'di ltar ston pas 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul mdzad nas lha rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa nye bar zhi bar mdzad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367a-10: 'dug stangs kyis byang shar gyi char 'khod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367a-11: 'di'i 'dug stangs kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so sor rtog par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367a-12: bskal pa grangs med pa bzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367a-13: 'bum phrag gcig gis pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu lhag par rdzogs pa'i 'dug stangs kyis mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing zhag bdun du 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367a-14: de'i gnas su mig mi 'dzum pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba byung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367b-0: de nas 'dug stangs la 'khod pa'i gnas kyi bar du 'chag par byas @367b nas shar dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367b-1: nub tu rin po che la 'chag cing 'chag pas zhag bdun du 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367b-2: gnas der rin po che la 'chag pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba byung ngo /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367b-4: zhag bdun pa bzhi pa la byang chub shing gi byang shar gyi char lha rnams kyis rin po che'i khang pa sprul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367b-5: der 'dug stangs kyis bzhugs nas chos mngon pa'i sde snod ma lus par 'di rnams mtha' yas pa'i tshul gyis kun gnas par sems shing zhag bdun bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367b-6: chos mngon pa pa slar yang 'di skad smra'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367b-7: rin po che'i khang pa zhes bya ba rin po che las byung ba'i khang pa yin no zhes zer ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367b-8: sdud par byed pa po rnams slar yang 'di skad gsung ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367b-9: rab tu byed pa bdun gyi chos mngon par rjes su dran par byed pa'i rin po che'i khang pa yin zhes gsung ngo; ;gang gi phyir slar yang 'dir tshig gnyis ka yang 'thad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367b-10: de'i phyir 'di gnyis ka'ang gzung bar bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367b-11: de nas slar yang gnas de rin po che'i khang pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba byung ngo; ;'di ltar byang chub shing dang nye ba nyid du zhag bdun pa bzhi pa song nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367b-12: zhag bdun pa lnga pa la byang chub shing gi drung nas ra lug skyong ba'i shing n+ya gro dha dang nye bar gshegs nas der yang chos la rnam par sems pa nyid kyis rnam par grol ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:367b-13: bde bas so sor rig par mdzad nas bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368a-0: de'i tshe lha'i bu'i bdud dus 'di rnams kyi phyi ma @368a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368a-1: la grib ma bzhin du phyogs gang du'ang ma spangs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368a-2: byang chub sems dpa' la skyon cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368a-3: da ni nga'i dbang du bya ba las 'das pas yid mi bde ba thob par gyur cing lam chen por gnas nas rnam pa bcu drug gi rgyu mtshan la sems shing sa la ri mo bcu drug 'bri'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368a-4: bdag gis 'di bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma rdzogs pa de'i phyir bdag 'di dang 'dra bar ma gyur te zhes ri mo gcig bris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368a-5: de bzhin du bdag 'di dang mtshungs par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368a-6: nges 'byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368a-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368a-8: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368a-9: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368a-10: bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368a-11: lhag par gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368a-12: byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368a-13: btang snyoms gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ma rdzogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368a-14: de'i phyir bdag 'di dang mtshungs par ma gyur to snyam nas ri mo bcu bris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368a-15: bdag 'di dang mtshungs pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i dbang po mchog gi gong ma'i ye shes so sor rig pa nye bar gnas par gyur pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ma rdzogs pa de'i phyir bdag 'di dang mtshungs par ma gyur to snyam nas ri mo bcu drug bris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368a-16: de bzhin du bdag 'di dang mtshungs pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i bsams pa'i bag la nyal dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368b-0: ye shes kyi @368b thugs rje chen po dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368b-1: snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368b-2: so sor cho 'phrul gyi ye shes dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368b-3: sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so sor gnas pa nye bar gnas par gyur pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ma rdzogs pa de'i phyir bdag 'di dang mtshungs par ma gyur to snyam nas ri mo bcu drug bris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368b-5: 'di ltar 'di'i rgyu mtshan sems shing lam chen por ri mo bcu drug bris nas gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368b-8: dga' ma ste gsum po ni bdud kyi bu mo bdag cag gi pha ni ma mthong bar gyur pas de ma thag par ga na yod dam zhes blta zhing rgyu ba na de yid mi bde ba thob par gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368b-9: sa la ri mo byed pa mthong nas pa dang nye bar song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368b-10: pha gang gi phyir sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar byed ces dris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368b-12: dge sbyong chen po 'di bdag gi dbang du byed pa las 'das so zhes 'di rnams kyi dus su bltas pas skyon cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368b-13: de'i phyir bdag sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368b-14: 'di ltar gyur na de ltar mi sems shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368b-15: bdag cag gsum gyi de dbang du byas nas khrid la 'ong bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368b-18: sus kyang dbang du bya bar mi nus bas skyes bu 'di ni mi g-yo ba'i dad pa la gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:368b-21: bdag cag bud med yin pas da lta nyid du de la 'dod chags kyi zhags pas bcings te khrid la 'ong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369a-1: bud med de rnams bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar song ste dge sbyong khyed kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur bdag cag gis bgyi'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369a-3: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis de rnams kyi tshig la thugs ma gtad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369a-4: spyan rnam par grol ba yang ma gzigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369a-5: ji ltar de bla na med pa'i nye bar skye ba zad pa rnam par grol ba'i bsam pas dben ba'i bde ba nyid la nyams su myong bar mdzad cing bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369a-7: bdud kyi bus mo bsam pa mang zhing skyes bu dang mtshungs pa'i sems so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369a-9: gang gzhon nu la dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369a-11: gang zhig na tshod dang por gyur pa la dga' ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369a-13: gang zhig na tshod bar ma gyur pa la dga' ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369a-15: gang zhig na tshod phyi mar gyur pa la dga' ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369a-16: bdag gis de lta bu'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'od la chags par bgyi'o zhes smras nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369a-17: bu mo re res gzhon nu'i ma'i gzugs la sogs pa'i brgya phrag brgya phrag gis bdag nyid kyi lus sprul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369a-21: bu mo lan gcig skyes pa'i gzugs dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369a-22: bar ma'i bud med kyi gzugs dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369a-23: lus rags mor gyur nas lan drug tu bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar song nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-0: dge sbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bdag cag gis bsnyen bkur @369b bgyi'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi tshig la yang thugs ma gtad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-3: ji ltar de bla na med pa'i nye bar skye ba rnam par grol lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-5: slob dpon gang zhig 'di skad smra'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-6: de rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas bud med 'ongs pa la lta zhing bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i gzugs kyis 'di rnams so byi ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-7: skra dkar por gyur bar byin gyis brlabs so zhes zer ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-8: de'i tshig gzung bar mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-9: ston pas 'di lta bu gzugs su byin gyis brlabs par ma mdzad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-12: 'di lta bu'i 'bad pa byed pa da song zhig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-13: 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis 'dod chags dang ma bral ba la sogs pa'i mdun du bya bar rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-14: de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang 'dod chags spangs shing nyes pa spangs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-15: gti mug spangs pas rang gi 'dod chags spangs pa'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-16: gang zhig rgyal ba de la rgyal mi nus //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-17: gang zhig 'jig rten 'dir ni rgyal mi 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-18: mtha' yas sangs rgyas spyod yul de mi gnas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-19: rkang med kyis ni rkang yod la mi nus //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-20: gang gi sred pa'i dra ba bton gyur nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-21: de la sred pa rnams ni cung zad med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-22: mtha' yas sangs rgyas spyod yul de nyid la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:369b-23: rkang med de yis rkang yod la mi nus //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370a-0: 'dir ni sangs rgyas kyi chos mchog gi sde las tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs nas @370a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370a-2: bu mo rnams la pha zer ba yang bden pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370a-3: dgra bcom pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten na mi'i mchog yin no zhes smras nas lha dang nye bar song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'dir zhag bdun bzhugs nas btang zung gi gnas su gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370a-5: der zhag bdun du sku la yul ngan dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370a-6: grang ba zhi bar bya ba'i phyir klu'i rgyal po btang zung zhes bya bas lus kyi lan bdun du dkris nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370a-8: dri'i gtsang khang shin tu yangs par bzhugs pa bzhin rnam par grol ba dang bde ba so sor rig par byed cing zhag bdun du bzhugs nas shing r'a dza ya ta na dang nye bar gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370a-9: der yang rnam par grol ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370a-10: bde ba so sor rig par byed pa nyid kyis bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370a-11: de rnams kyis re zhig zhag bdun phrag bdun yongs su rdzogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370a-12: de rnams kyi bar du zhal shol ba med bar dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370a-13: sku la byi dor byed pa med pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370a-14: zhal zas gsol pa med par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370a-15: bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370a-17: 'bras bu'i bde ba nyid kyis nyin mtshan 'da'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370a-18: de nas de'i bdun phrag bdun gyi mthar gcig gis dman pa'i lnga bcu'i mtha'i nyi ma la der bzhugs nas zhal shol ba'i thugs skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370a-19: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis aa ru ra mchog blangs nas phul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370b-0: ston pas de @370b gsol bas sku dvangs par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370b-1: de nas brgya byin nyid kyis so rtsi'i so shing nyid kyi so shing dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370b-2: zhal shol ba'i chu phul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370b-3: ston pas so shing blangs nas so brud de mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i chus zhal bshal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370b-4: de nyid du shing r'a dza ya ta na'i drung du bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370b-6: bzang po zhes bya ba'i tshong dpon gnyis shing rta lnga brgya dang bcas pa lho phyogs kyi ljongs nas yul dbus su 'gro ba na rang nyid kyi sngar gyi gnyen /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370b-7: lhar gyur pas shing rta thams cad bying nas 'gro bar mi nus par byin gyis brlabs pas ston pa la kha zas ster ba'i phyir spro ba skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370b-8: sbrang bsrubs pa'i 'khor ba'i gong bu blangs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370b-10: bza' ba 'di thugs rje chen po skyed la so sor bzhes par zhu zhes ston pa'i drung du nye bar 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370b-11: bcom ldan 'das 'o thug bzhes pa'i nyin mo nyid lhung bzed mi snang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang phyag gis len nam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370b-12: 'on kyang lhung bzed kyi blang zhes bsams so; ;de nas sems kyis shes nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370b-13: phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis nor bu aindra n'i la'i lhung bzed blangs pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370b-15: slar yang sran ma mungga'i kha dog can gyi rdo las byung ba'i lhung bzed bzhi phul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:370b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi lha'i bu bzhi po rnams la rjes su brtse bas lhung bzed bzhi po bzhes /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371a-0: @371a *// te steng nas steng du brtsegs nas bzhag ste gcig tu 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371a-1: bzhi po yang lta ba'i phyir du kha la ri mo bzhir gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371a-2: lhung bzed 'bring po'i tshad cig tu gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371a-3: bcom ldan 'das la de'i so sor phul ba rin thang med pa'i rdo las byung ba'i lhung bzed du bza' ba'i phyir du bzhes nas yongs su longs spyad nas rjes su yi rang bar mdzad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371a-4: tshong dpon spun gnyis sangs rgyas dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371a-5: chos la skyabs su 'gro zhing tshigs gnyis pa'i dge bsnyen du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371a-8: mchod par bya bar rigs pa'i dngos po gcig bslang zhes zhus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371a-9: de nas phyag g-yas pa rang gi mgo la byugs nas skra'i gdung gnang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371a-10: de dag gis rang gi grong khyer du khyer song nas mchod rten bzhengs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371a-11: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang de nas bzhengs nas slar yang ra lug skyong ba'i shing n+ya gro dha nyid du gshegs nas shing n+ya gro dha'i drung du bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371a-12: de nas de nyid du bzhugs tsam nyid na rang gis lhag par rtogs pa'i zab mo'i chos so sor bsam zhing sangs rgyas rnams kyis lhag par rtogs pa 'di ni chos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371a-13: gzhan gyis chos ston par mi nus par bsams nas rab tu 'jug pa'i rnam pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371b-0: de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'jig rten nyams @371b par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bsams nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371b-1: stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi brgya byin dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371b-6: tshangs pa chen po rnams khrid nas ston pa'i drung du phyin nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371b-9: dang po'i tshul gyis chos bstan du gsol zhes zhus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371b-10: ston pas de rnams la gnang ba byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371b-11: gang zhig la bdag gis dang por chos bstan par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371b-12: zhes dgongs shing mkhas pa kun len de'i chos 'di myur du shes par 'gyur ba'i thugs skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371b-14: de dus las 'das nas zhag bdun lon par rtogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371b-15: 'char byed la brtags pa de yang dus las 'das par mkhyen no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371b-16: dge slong lnga sdes bdag la bsnyen bkur mang po byas pas lnga sde'i ched du bsams nas de rnams gang na gnas pa yin zhes brtags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371b-17: grong khyer w'a ra n'a si'i ri dvags rgyu ba'i nags tshal na yod par mkhyen no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:371b-18: der gshegs nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro zhes dgongs nas zhag 'ga' zhig tu byang chub kyi snying po kun tu nye ba nyid du bsod snyoms mdzad cing bzhugs nas dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya la grong khyer w'a ra n'a sir gshegs par dgongs nas tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan gyi mthar nam la ngas pa na shin tu snga ba nyid du lhung bzed dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372a-0: snam sbyar bsnams nas dpag tshad bco brgyad yod @372a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372a-2: lam gyi bar du nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'tsho byed gcig gzigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372a-3: de la rang gi sangs rgyas su gyur pa bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372a-4: nyi ma de nyid la srod kyi dus su drang srong lhung ba'i gnas su gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372a-5: gnas brtan lnga sdes de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa ring po nyid nas mthong ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372a-6: dge sbyong goo ta ma 'di bza' ba mang po'i phyir lus yongs su rdzogs par gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372a-7: dbang po yongs su rdzogs par gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372a-8: gser gyi kha dog tu gyur nas 'ong gi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372a-9: 'di la phyag la sogs pa mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372a-10: 'di rigs chen por skyes pa tsam yin pas gdan shom pa tsam 'os so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372a-11: de'i phyir gdan tsam rigs so zhes gtam byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372a-12: bcom ldan 'das la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyi sems dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372a-13: spyod pa shes par nus pa'i ye shes yod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372a-14: de yang 'di rnams ji ltar sems pa yin zhes bsams nas sems shes pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372a-16: mi thams cad la mthong ba med? pa'i dbang gis thams cad du khyad par nus pa'i byams pa'i sems yang dag par bsdus nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372a-17: ma mthong ba'i dbang gis byams pa'i sems kyis khyab par bcom ldan 'das kyis bsgoms nas de bzhin gshegs pa nye bar gshegs shing gshegs pa na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372b-0: sngar gyi bca' khrims rnams gnas par mi nus pas phyag phul zhing bsu @372b ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372b-1: bsnyen bkur thams cad byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372b-3: dge slong de rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grub pa mi shes pa'i phyir ming brjod pa na tshe dang ldan pa zhes smra ba tha mal ba'i tshig gis brjod par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ming dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372b-8: tshe dang ldan pa zhes tha mal ba'i tshig brjod par mi rung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372b-10: nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bdag nyid sangs rgyas grub par byed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372b-11: gdan bshams pa mchog la sangs rgyas bzhugs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372b-12: rgyu skar bre mchog gsum 'dzom pa la bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi tshangs pa'i 'khor gyis bskor nas gnas brtan lnga sde bos te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i mdo'i mthar bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372b-13: de rnams la gnas brtan kun shes koo ndi n+ya bshad pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas ye shes thob pa mdo'i mthar bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi tshangs pa rnams kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372b-14: ston pas de nyid du dbyar bzhugs so /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372b-15: slar yang nyi ma gnyis pa la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372b-16: gnas brtan brlangs pa la chos sbyin no zhes gtsug lag khang du bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372b-17: lhag ma bzhi po bsod snyoms la song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:372b-18: gnas brtan brlangs pas nyi ma byed kyi nang du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373a-0: @373a *// 'di lta bu'i thabs nyid kyis slar yang nyi ma phyi ma la gnas brtan bzang ldan dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373a-1: slar yang nyi ma phyi ma la gnas brtan ming can dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373a-2: slar yang nyi ma phyi ma la gnas brtan rta thul rnams de thams cad kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byas nas tshes nyi shu la dge slong lnga po 'dus pa la bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mdo sde bshad do; ;bshad pa'i mthar gnas brtan lnga sdes dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373a-3: de nas ston pas rigs kyi bu grags pa nye bar mi rten par gzigs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373a-4: de'i mtshan mo'i char sdug bsngal ba'i sems kyis khyim spangs nas 'thon pa la grags pa 'dir shog ces bos nas mtshan mo de nyid kyi cha la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373a-5: slar yang nyi ma gnyis pa la dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu grub par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373a-7: slar yang grogs po lnga bcu rtsa bzhis rab tu byung zhing dge slong du gyur nas dgra bcom par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373a-8: 'di ltar 'jig rten du dgra bcom pa drug cu rtsa gcig tu gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373a-9: ston pas dbyar bzhugs nas dgag dbye byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373a-10: dge slong drug cu po rnams phyogs phyogs su gtang nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373a-11: rang nyid lteng rgyas su gshegs pa'i bar gyi lam na ras bal can gyi tshal ni dpag tshad bcu pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373a-12: gzhon nu bzang sde brtul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373b-0: de rnams las thams cad kyi mtha'i phyi ma rgyun du @373b zhugs par gyur pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373b-1: thog ma ni phyir mi 'ong du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373b-2: de rnams kyang dge slong gi gzugs kyis rab tu byung ba bgyis nas phyogs phyogs su btang ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373b-4: stong phrag phyed dang gsum gyi cho 'phrul lta zhing lteng rgyas 'od srung la sogs pa'i spun gsum po dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373b-5: ral pa can stong phrag gcig brtul ba dge slong gi gzugs kyis rab tu byung bar byas nas ri po ga ya'i rtse mo na sdod pa rnams la nyi ma'i rnam grangs kyi mdo sde bstan nas dgra bcom par byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373b-6: des dgra bcom pa stong phrag rnams 'khor du byas nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la khas blangs byin ba dgrol bar bya ba'i dgongs pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dang nye ba'i shing dngar gyi tshal du byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373b-7: skyed mos tshal skyong ba rnams kyis ston pa byon no zhes rgyal po la smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373b-9: khri khrag bcu gnyis kyi bram ze dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373b-10: khyim bdag 'khor du byas nas ston pa dang nye bar song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373b-11: 'khor lo sna tshogs pa'i steng du gser gyi bla res dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer phyogs phyogs su 'phro zhing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag legs par byas nas 'khor dang bcas pa phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373b-12: de nas yang bram ze rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:373b-13: khyim bdag la sogs pa 'di lta bu'i sems su gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374a-0: 'on kyang dge sbyong chen pos lteng rgyas 'od srung gi rjes su @374a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374a-1: tshangs pa spyod pa spyad dam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374a-2: yang na lteng rgyas 'od srung gis dge sbyong chen po'i rjes su tshangs par spyod pa spyad ces bsam mo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas gnas brtan la tshigs su bcad pa gsungs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374a-4: lteng rgyas gnas su gnas nas ci zhig mthong //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374a-5: sbyin sreg 'dor ba'i rgyu mtshan ci zhig smra //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374a-6: 'od srung 'di yi don ni dri bar bya //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374a-7: khyod kyis ji ltar sbyin sreg spong ba yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374a-8: gnas brtan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs ba shes nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374a-9: gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin ro dang dri //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374a-10: bud med 'dod pa yang ni mchod sbyin spyod //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374a-11: 'di rnams dri ma legs bar rtogs byas nas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374a-12: de phyir me yi sbyin sreg 'di spangs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374a-13: tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod nas rang nyid nyan thos kyi 'dod pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi bol du mgo bos reg nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374a-14: bdag ston par btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yin no zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374a-18: ji srid du shing t'a la bdun gyi tshad tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas babs te de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374a-19: de'i cho 'phrul blta zhing mi mang po rnams kyis /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374b-0: sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen pos @374b 'di lta bu'i blta ba bstan pas dgra bcom po zhes bya ba la sems shing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374b-1: lteng rgyas 'od rung gi blta ba'i dra ba bcad de bzhin gshegs pas brtul nas ston pa'i yon tan nyid brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bos kyang 'di da lta kho nam yin par lteng rgyas 'od srung brtul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374b-3: 'das pa nyid du'ang 'di bnga brtul lo zhes brjod nas don 'di 'das pa na mi sbyin chen po 'od srung gi skyes rabs su bshad pa'i bden pa bzhi po gsal bar bstan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374b-4: de'i mod la yul ma ga dha'i rgyal po 'khor khri phrag bcu gcig dang bcas pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo; ;khri phrag gcig dge bsnyen du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374b-5: rgyal po ston pa dang nye ba nyid du 'dug ste bslab pa'i gzhi lnga so sor rab tu thos nas skyabs su song ste sang gi gdugs tshod la mgron du gnyer nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374b-6: stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas nas song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374b-7: slar yang sang gi snga dro nyid bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang ma mthong ba rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa rnams kyis bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi grangs kyi mi rnams de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar 'dod pas snga dro nyid rgyal po'i khab nas shing dngar gyi tshal du song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:374b-8: rgyang grags bcu gnyis su mi shong bar shing dngar gyi tshal thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-0: mi thams cad kyis stobs bcu ba'i gzugs mchog thob par 'dod pa bdag nyid kyi sku la blta @375a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-1: bas tshim par ma nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-2: 'di lta bu'i sa gzhi'i kha dog yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-3: 'di lta bu'i gzugs kyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po la sogs pa'i rab tu byed pa thams cad kyang gzugs kyi sku dpal gyi bsngags par bya bar 'os so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-4: 'di ltar gzugs mchog thob pa'i stobs bcu pa'i sku lta ba'i phyir mi mang po rgyun mi 'chad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-6: lam du dge slong gcig gis kyang phyi ru 'thon pa'i skyabs med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-7: nyi ma de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi gdugs tshod yol ba lta bur gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-8: de ma thag par brgya byin sdod pa'i stan dro ba'i rnam par mthong ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-10: de'i rgyu mtshan shes nas bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su mngon par sprul te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-13: dge 'dun so so la ji ltar rigs pa'i bstod pa rjod par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-14: stobs bcu pa'i sdun du chas nas lha'i mthu yis lam thob par byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-16: bram ze rnam grol ral ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-17: seng ge'i gzugs kyis 'thon nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-18: bcom ldan rgyal po'i khab nang byon //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-19: grol zhing grol ba'i grogs sngon bcas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-20: bram ze rnam grol ral pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-21: seng ge'i gzugs kyis 'thon nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375a-22: bcom ldan rgyal po'i khab nang byon //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-0: brgal zhing brgal @375b ba'i grogs sngon bcas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-1: bram ze rnam grol ral pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-2: seng ge'i gzugs kyis 'thon nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-3: rgyal po'i khab nang bcom ldan byon //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-4: bcu bo gsung ba'i stobs bcu pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-5: chos bcu la mkhas bcu la gnas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-6: stong phrag bcu yi 'khor dang ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-7: bcom ldan rgyal po'i khab nang byon //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-8: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ni ston pa la bsngags pas bstod cing sdun du 'gro ba'i mi rnams kyis bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs kyi dpal mthong nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di shin tu gzugs bzang ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-9: slar yang sngar mthong ba med do zhes bsams nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di gang na gnas pa yin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-10: gang zhig gi yin zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-11: de thos nas bram ze'i khye'us smras pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-12: gang zhig bstan pa thams cad 'dul //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-13: gang zag zla med sangs rgyas te //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-14: dgra bcom bde gshegs 'jig rten du //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-15: de ni bdag gi nye par gnas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-16: tshigs su bcad pa brjod de ston pas brgya byin gyis skabs phye ba'i lam du dge slong stong phrag gcig 'khor du byas nas rgyal po'i khab kyi nang du gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-17: rgyal pos sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge 'dun la sbyin pa chen po phul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-19: bdag dkon mchog gsum spangs nas sdod par mi nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-21: dus ma min par bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar 'ong bar 'dod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:375b-22: shing dngar can gyi skyed mos tshal shin tu thag ring ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376a-1: gi 'od ma'i tshal zhes bya ba 'di shin tu nye bas gshegs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376a-2: 'ong ba shin tu nye bas sangs rgyas la 'os pa'i gnas lags pas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376a-4: der gser gyi ril ba spyi blugs la me tog gi dris bsgos te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376a-5: nor bu'i kha dog can gyi chu blangs nas 'od ma'i tshal yongs su gtong zhing stobs bcu pa'i phyag tu chu bsgrengs nas der kun dga' ra pa bzhes nas sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i gzhi zhes brjod cing sa gzhi chen po g-yos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376a-6: 'dzam bu gling gi nang nas 'od ma'i tshal spangs pa'i sa gzhi g-yos pa 'di bzhes te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376a-8: sing gha gling gi gtsug lag khang chen po spangs nas sa gzhi g-yos pa 'di bzhes te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376a-10: ston pas 'od ma'i tshal gyi kun dga' ra ba bzhes nas rgyal po la rjes su yi rang bar mdzad cing stan la bzhengs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376a-11: dge slong gi dge 'dun 'khor du byas nas 'od ma'i tshal du byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376a-12: de'i tshe de'i dus na sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376a-13: moo dgal gyi bu kun tu rgyu gnyis po rgyal po'i khab la brten nas gnas shing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376a-14: bdud rtsi tshol bar sems so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376a-15: de'i nang nas sh'a ri'i bus gnas brtan rta thul bsod snyoms la zhugs pa mthong bas sems rab tu dvangs par gyur te bza' ba byin nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376a-16: chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376b-0: zhes pa'i tshigs bcad @376b thos pas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376b-1: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376b-2: rang gi grogs po kun tu rgyu moo dgal la yang tshigs su bcad pa de nyid smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376b-3: des kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo; ;de gnyis kyis kyang rang nyid rgyal ba la bltas nas rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa ston pa'i drung du rab tu byung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376b-4: de rnams las moo dgal gyi bu chen po zhag bdun nas dgra bcom pa thob bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376b-5: gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus zla ba phyed nas dgra bcom pa thob ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376b-6: de gnyis po yang ston pa'i nyan thos kyi mchog tu gnas par bzung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376b-7: gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus dgra bcom pa thob pa'i nyin mo nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi 'dus pa dang por byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376b-8: slar yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'od ma'i tshal de nyid du bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376b-9: de'i tshe rgyal po chen po zas gtsang gis bdag gi sras lo drug tu dka' ba spyad nas mchog gi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376b-10: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal du bzhugs so zhes pa thos nas blon po phan tshun rnams bos te 'dir shog cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376b-11: skyes bu stong phrag gcig gi 'khor khrid de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:376b-12: de rgyal po'i khab du song la nga'i tshig gis khyed kyi yab rgyal po chen po zas gtsang khyed blta bar 'dod ces brjod pas bdag gi sras khrid la shog ces smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377a-0: lha; de bzhin bgyi'o zhes rgyal po'i @377a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377a-2: skyes bu stong phrag gcig gi 'khor de khrid de myur ba nyid du dpag tshad drug cu'i lam du song nas stobs bcu pa 'khor bzhi'i nang du bzhugs nas chos ston pa'i dus su gtsug lag khang du bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377a-3: de rgyal pos btang ba'i don re zhig bzhag nas 'khor thams cad kyi mthar 'khod de ston pa'i chos bstan pa thos nas ji ltar 'khod pa nyid bzhin du skyes bu stong phrag gcig dang lhan cig tu dgra bcom pa thob nas rab tu 'byung bar zhus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun par? rnams 'dir shog ces phyag brkyang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377a-5: thams cad de nyid du rdzu 'phrul las byung ba'i lhung bzed dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377a-7: lo brgya lon ba'i gnas brtan lta bur gyur to; ;dgra bcom pa thob pa'i dus nas bzung ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377a-8: slar yang 'phags pa zhes bya ba re zhig par mar gnas par gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377a-9: rgyal pos btang ba'i spring yig stobs bcu pa lam brjod do; ;rgyal pos btang ba'i mi rnams las gcig kyang ma byung zhing spring yig kyang ma thos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377a-10: 'dir shog la khyed song cig dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377a-11: de lta bu'i nges pas blon po gzhan gcig btang ngo; ;des song nas yang sngar bzhin du 'khor dang bcas pa dgra bcom pa thob nas cang mi gsung bar gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-0: rgyal pos de lta bur nges pas skyes bu stong phrag re re'i 'khor @377b dang bcas pa'i blon po dgu btang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-1: thams cad rang gi don rdzogs par byas nas cang mi smra bar gyur te de nyid du gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-2: rgyal pos spring yig tsam gyi lo rgyus kyang ma thob bo zhes bsams nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-3: mi 'di rnams nga la mi dga' ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis spring yig tsam gyi lo rgyus kyang mi brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-4: su zhig nga'i tshig bzhin byed par sems /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-5: rgyal pos mi thams cad la brtags pas nag po 'char ka mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-6: de yang rgyal po'i don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i blon po yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-8: shin tu thugs ches pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig la nyin gcig tu skyes pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-10: de dang lhan cig tu rtse ba'i grogs po yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-11: de nas blon po rgyal pos pos te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-13: bdag gi sras blta bar 'dod pas skyes bu stong phrag dgu btang ste mi gcig kyang ma 'ongs nas spring yig tsam gyi lo rgyus ci yang ma byung /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-14: slar yang thams cad nad kyis thebs pa yin nam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-15: tshe'i bar chad du gyur pa yin nam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-16: bdag 'tsho ba nyid kyi bar du sras po blta bar 'dod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-17: bdag gi bu blta bar nus sam zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-20: gal te rab tu phyung yang blta bar nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-21: bu khyod rab tu byung ba'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-23: nga sras po blta'o zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:377b-25: zhes rgyal po'i gsung blangs nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-0: ston pa chos ston pa'i dus su 'khor rnams kyi @378a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-2: chos thos nas 'khor dang bcas pa dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te dge slong gi dngos por so sor gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-3: ston pa sangs rgyas su gyur nas dang po'i lo la drang srong lhung ba'i gnas su dbyar bzhugs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-4: dgag dbye byas nas lteng rgyas su gshegs shing der zla ba gsum bzhugs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-5: ral pa can spun rnams brtul nas dge slong stong phrag gcig gi 'khor dang bcas pa dgun bla 'bring po'i nya la rgyal po'i khab du gshegs nas zla ba gnyis bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-6: de rnams ni grong khyer w'a ra n'a si nas 'ongs pa'i bar te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-7: zla ba lnga song zhing dgun gyi dus thams cad 'das so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-8: gnas brtan 'char ka 'ongs nas zhag bdun dang brgyad song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-9: des dbyid zlar ba'i nya la bsams pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-10: dgun gyi dus 'das nas dpyid ka'i dus su sleb pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-11: mi rnams kyis 'bru rnams blangs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-12: phyogs phyogs nas ldam? du byung bas rtsva rnams ljang gur gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-14: nags tshal gyi shing la sogs pa me tog shin tu mang ba kha bye ba ni lam du 'gro ba'i dus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-15: stobs bcu ba'i nye du dang phrad par byed pa'i lam du 'gro ba'i dus yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du nye bar song nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-17: btsun pa ljon shing de ni ljang gur gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-18: shing gi lo mas la dud pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378a-19: de rnams bar nas 'od zer 'gyed pa yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378b-0: dpa' bo chen po @378b gnyen gnas gshegs pa'i dus //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378b-1: ha cang mi dro mi brang? zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378b-2: mu ge dang ni bkres pa med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378b-3: sa steng shing rnams ljang gur gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378b-4: thub ba chen po dus 'dir gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378b-5: tshigs su bcad pa drug cu tsam gyis stobs bcu pa la rigs kyi grong khyer du gshegs pa'i phyir bsngags par 'os ba'i bsngags pa brjod pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378b-6: de nas ston pa la 'char kas dbyings snyan pos gshegs pa'i bsngags par 'os pa'i bsngags pa gsungs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378b-8: khyod kyi yab rgyal po chen po zas gtsang blta bar 'dod pas nye du rnams rjes su 'dzin par zhu /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378b-11: nye du rnams rjes su gzung bar bgyi'o zhes dge slong gi dge 'dun la smros cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378b-12: gshegs pa'i gnas thams cad la byi dor gyis shig ces smros shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378b-14: legs so zhes gnas brtan song nas smras //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis yul aa gha dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378b-16: ma ga dha na gnas ba'i rigs kyi bu rnams stong phrag bcu dang bcas pa grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i stong phrag bcu po thams cad zag pa zad pa'i dge slong 'khor du byas nas rgyal po'i khab nas phyi rol tu 'thon te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378b-17: nyi ma re re la dpag tshad re re bgrod cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378b-18: rgyal po'i khab nas dpag tshad drug cu'i grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir zla ba gnyis kyis sleb par dgongs shing bu nye? ba yang ma yin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:378b-19: myur ba yang ma yin par 'bring por gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379a-2: rgyal po'i drung du smra'o zhes bsams nas nam mkha' la song ste rgyal po'i gnas su sleb par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379a-3: rgyal por gnas brtan gzigs nas thugs tshim par gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379a-4: gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su bcug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379a-5: rang la byed pa bzhin bcos nor sna tshogs pa'i bza' bas lhung bzed bkang nas phul lo; ;gnas brtan langs nas 'gro bar bsams ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379a-9: ston pa dang nye bar song ste bza'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379a-13: stong phrag nyi shu'i dge slong 'khor du byas nas rgyal po chen po nyid blta ba'i phyir byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379a-14: rgyal po thugs tshim par gyur nas smras pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379a-15: khyed 'di gsol la bdag gi sras grong khyer 'dir ma byon gyi bar la 'di nyid nas lhung bzed du bza' ba khyer la song zhig ces smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379a-16: gnas brtan gyi rgyal po'i gsung mnyan te rgyal pos gnas brtan gyis bza' ba gsol zin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379a-18: dri bzang po'i phye mas byugs te bza' ba mchog gis gang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul cig zhes smras nas gnas brtan gyi lag par byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379a-19: gnas brtan mi thams cad kyis mthong ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379b-0: lhung bzed nam mkha' @379b la 'phags so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379b-1: rang nyid kyang nam mkha' la gshegs nas bza' ba'i lhung bzed bzung ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379b-2: ston pa'i phyag tu phul nas ston pas kyang der bza' ba la longs spyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379b-3: gnas brtan thabs 'dis nyi ma re re bzhin du bza' ba phul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379b-4: ston bas kyang lam gyi bar du rgyal po nyid kyis gdugs tshod la longs spyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379b-5: gnas brtan gyis kyang gdugs tshod la longs spyod pa'i mthar nyi ma re re bzhin du de ring 'di tsam nas bcom ldan 'das byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379b-6: de ring 'di tsam du bcom ldan 'das byon zhes pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379b-7: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag par ldan pa nyid brjod cing rgyal rigs thams cad ston pa ma mthong ba nyid kyis ston pa'i drung du rang nyid kyi sems dvangs par mdzad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379b-8: de'i rgyu mtshan gyis gnas brtan la bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag bdag gi nyan thos kyi nang nas rigs dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog gang yin /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379b-10: 'di mchog tu bzung bas sh'akya pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das rjes su byon pa'i sdun la bdag cag gi nye du'i gtso bo blta'o zhes 'dus nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379b-11: bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i gnas rtog cing sh'akya n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba? yid du 'ong ba sta gon byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379b-12: der thams cad nyer bsdogs byas nas spos dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:379b-13: me tog so so lag tu thogs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-1: ba byed cing rgyan thams cad kyis so sor brgyan nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-5: bu mo sngar dang por btang ba rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-6: de nas rgyal po'i gzhon nu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-7: gzhon nu ma dag de rnams kyi bar rang rang gis spos dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-9: phye ma la sogs pas mchod ba byed cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes nas n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' rab nyid du byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-11: der bcom ldan 'das kyis stong phrag nyi shu'i zag ba zad ba'i dge slong 'khor du byas nas gdan bshams pa mchog la sangs rgyas bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-12: sh'akya'i rigs ni nga rgyal dang ldan pa yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-13: sems rtsub pa yin pas 'di ni don grub gzhon nu /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-14: nged dang lhan cig gzhon nu yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-15: nged ni phu bo yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-16: 'di ni sring mo'i bu yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-17: 'di ni tsha bo yin zhes bsams nas khye'u dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-18: rgyal po'i gzhon nu zhes smras te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-19: khyed kyi phyag gis bdag khyod kyi rgyab tu sdod do zhes bsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-20: de rnams de bzhin du gnas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa gzigs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-22: gnyen rnams bdag la phyag mi byed bar 'dod kyang da lta phyag byed du gzhug dgos te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380a-23: mngon par shes pa'i gzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380b-0: bsam gtan dang ldan par 'jug @380b pa bskyed dgos snyam ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380b-1: bzhengs nas nam mkha' la gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380b-2: de rnams kyi mgo la zhabs kyi rdul lhung ba bzhin du aa mra bsrung ba'i aa mra'i shing gi drung du so so'i cho 'phrul dang mtshungs par cho 'phrul mdzad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380b-3: rgyal pos de ya mtshan che ba mthong ngo zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380b-4: bcom ldan 'das khyed 'khrungs pa'i nyin mo dka' thub pa nag po lha len gyis phyag byed cing nye bar gnas pas khyed kyis zhabs bskyod pa bram ze'i spyi bo la nye bar gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380b-5: de mthong nas bdag gis kyang khyed la phyag byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380b-6: 'di ni bdag gi phyag dang po yin no; ;bkra shis pa'i 'bru 'debs pa'i nyin mo dzam bu'i shing gi grib ma'i dpal gyi mal stan la khyed bzhugs pa na shing dzambu'i grib mas ma btang bar mthong ba'i tshe yang zhabs la phyag byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380b-7: 'di ni bdag gis phyag gnyis pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380b-8: da lta ni bdag gis sngar ma mthong ba'i cho 'phrul yang mthong bas khyed kyi zhabs la phyag bgyid do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380b-9: 'di ni bdag gi phyag gsum ba yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380b-10: slar yang rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la phyag byed cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380b-11: phyag byed bar mi nus pa'i sh'akya'i rigs gcig kyang med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380b-12: thams cad kyis kyang phyag byed pa nyid do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:380b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das la nye du rnams kyis phyag byed cing nam mkha' las babs nas gdan bshams pa'i mchog gi gung la bzhugs so /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381a-0: @381a *// bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas nye du rnams dang 'dus par gyur pa thams cad sems gcig tu gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381a-1: de nas sprin chen po las padma'i 'dab ma la chu mi 'chags pa lta bu'i char 'bebs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381a-2: chu zangs gyi mdog can sa la sgra sgrogs shing 'bab bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381a-4: 'bang bar mi 'dod pa rnams mi 'bang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381a-5: thigs pa tsam yang mi ltung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381a-6: de mthong nas thams cad du ya mtshan pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381a-7: rmad du byung ba skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381a-11: rmad du byung ngo zhes rjod par byed do //
