K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381a-12: ston pas 'di kho na ma yin gyi bdag gi nye du dang phrad pa na padma'i 'dab ma la chu mi 'chags pa lta bu'i char 'bebs shing 'das pa'i dus su'ang ngas phab po //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381a-13: 'di'i don byung ba ni thams cad sgrol gyi skye rabs su bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381a-14: chos ston pa thos nas thams cad langs te phyag byas nas song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381a-15: gcig gis kyang rgyal po dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381a-17: blon po rnams sang bdag gi gnas su bsod snyoms khyer 'ong ngo zhes smra ba de rnams las gcig kyang ma byung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381a-18: ston pas slar nyi ma gnyis pa la stong phrag nyi shu'i dge slong 'khor du byas nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir bsod snyoms la bzhud do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381a-19: gang zhig mgron du gnyer ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381b-0: gang zhig mgron @381b du gnyer ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381b-1: lhung bzed khyer ba su yang med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381b-2: bcom ldan 'das sgo drung du 'khod de rnam par brtags pas ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi rigs kyi grong khyer du byon nas bsod snyoms mdzad pa bzhin du gang ji ltar rigs par mi chen po'i khyim du 'gro zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381b-3: yang na go rim bzhin du bsod snyoms spyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381b-4: de nas sangs rgyas gcig gis kyang ji ltar rigs par gshegs bam mthong bas bdag gis kyang da ni 'di'i rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381b-5: 'di sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs bzhin du bdag gis kyang rigs par gzung bar bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381b-6: bdag gi nyan thos kyang bdag nyid bzhin rjes su slob cing bsod snyoms la rdzogs par byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381b-7: 'khod pa'i khyim nas bzung nas go rim bzhin du bsod snyoms la spyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381b-8: 'phags pa gzhon nu don grub bsod snyoms la gshegs so zhes brjod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381b-10: sum thog la sogs pa'i khang bzang rnams su steng gi sgo chung phye nas mi thams cad blta bar gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381b-11: lha mo sgra gcan 'dzin gyi yum yang 'phags pa'i bu /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381b-12: grong khyer 'di nyid du rgyal po chen po'i mthus gser gyi do li la sogs pa la zhon te de ring nas skra dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381b-13: kha spu bregs shing dur smrig gi gos byon nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:381b-15: bsod snyoms la 'gro ba mdzes sam mi mdzes zhes steng gi sgo chung phye nas blta'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-1: dang bral ba yang dag par 'bar zhing sku lus kyi 'od kyi grong khyer gyi steng thams cad snang bar mdzad de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-2: 'dom gang pa'i 'od kun nas bskor zhing rab tu gsal ba dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-3: skyes bu chen bo'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-4: sangs rgyas kyi dpal dpe med par rnam par gsal ba mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-5: gtsug tor nas bzung nas zhabs kyi mthil gyi bar de srid do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-6: dbu skra g-yas 'khyil 'jam nag snum pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-7: dpral ba dri med nyi ma'i mthil bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-8: sku dang 'tshams pa'i shangs ni mtho ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-9: mi yi seng ge 'od zer gsal bar mdzad //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-10: 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i mi'i seng ge la tshigs su bcad bas mngon par bstod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-11: khyed kyi sras ngo bsod snyoms la spyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-12: zhes rgyal po la smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-13: rgyal po'i sems sdug bsngal bas gos nas bzung ste myur zhing myur bar phyir 'thon ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'khod nas smras pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-16: bdag cag ngo tsha bas ci'i don du bsod snyoms mdzad /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-17: dge slong 'di rnams kyi bza' ba bdag gis ster bar mi shes bsam pa yin nam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-19: rgyal po chen po'i rigs kyi spyod pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382a-21: bdag cag sh'akya'i rigs zhes bya ba'i rigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382b-0: de la rgyal rigs gcig kyang @382b bsod snyoms byed pa'i ming tsam yang med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382b-1: rgyal po chen po'i rigs zhas bya ba ni khyod kyi rigs 'di yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382b-4: mi dgyes pa ma mdzad cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382b-5: slar yang bdag cag gis mar me mdzad dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382b-7: 'od srung zhes bya ba 'di sangs rgyas kyi rigs yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382b-9: gzhan sangs rgyas stong phrag du mas kyang bsod snyoms spyod cing 'tsho bar mdzad la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382b-10: srang gi dbus su 'khod pa nyid do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382b-11: bag med lhag mar byed pa med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382b-12: chos la spyod cing legs par spyod //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382b-13: chos la spyad na bde ba 'byung //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382b-15: chos kyi rkang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di bstan cing bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382b-16: tshigs su bcad pa'i mthar rgyal pos rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo; ;chos spyod pa ni legs par spyod //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382b-17: nyes par spyod pa mi bya zhing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382b-18: chos spyad pa yis bde ba 'byung //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382b-20: slar yang chos kyi rkang pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos nas lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382b-21: chos skyong ba'i skyes rabs thos nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:382b-22: 'chi ba'i dus su gdugs dkar po'i 'og tu dpal gyi mal stan gyi steng du gzims pa nyid na dgra bcom pa thob par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383a-0: dgon par gnas nas dka' thub spyod pa @383a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383a-1: rgyal po la dgos pa med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383a-2: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383a-3: slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed bzung ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383a-4: 'khor dang bcas ba khang bzang chen bo'i steng du sbyan drangs nas gya nom ba'i bza' ba dang bcas ba rnams drangs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383a-5: gdugs tshod zin pa'i mthar sgra gcan 'dzin gyi ma ma gtogs ba'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas ba thams cad 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383a-7: des 'khor gyi mi rnams la 'phags pa'i bu la phyag gyis zhes brjod nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383a-8: gal te kho mo la yon tan yod na 'phags ba'i bu rang nyid kyi gnas su 'byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383a-9: byon ba nyid na de la phyag byed do zhes brjod nas ma 'ongs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383a-10: rgyal pos lhung bzed bzung nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos mchog gnyis dang bcas pa rgyal po'i bu mo'i khang bzang du gshegs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383a-11: rgyal bo'i bu mo rang nyid ji ltar mos pa'i phyag byed cing gzhan dang 'gal ba cung zad kyang ma byed ces nas gdan bshams ba mchog gi gung la bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383a-12: de myur du 'ongs nas byin pa bzung ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383a-13: zhabs kyi steng du mgo bo bzhag nas ji ltar 'dod ba'i phyag byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383a-15: rgyal po'i bu mos bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba mang bos yon tan la sogs pas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-0: yon tan dang @383b ldan par brjod nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-2: bdag gi bu mos nyid kyis gos ngur smrig gyon pa thos nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-3: de nas bzung ste deng gi bar du gos dur smrig gyon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-4: nyid kyis gdugs tshod lan gcig gsol ba thos nas bu mos kyang bza' ba lan gcig zos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-5: nyid gyis mal stan chen po spangs pa thos nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-6: nyal khri chung ba la nyal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-7: nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-8: spos la sogs pa la sred pa med pa thos nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-9: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-10: spos la sogs pa la chags ba med ba skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-11: rang gi nye du rnams bdag gis gso'o zhes 'phrin bskur nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-12: gnyen gcig la yang lta ba mi 'dug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-14: 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa ni bdag gi bu mo yin no zhes gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-17: 'di da lta khyed srung bar byed pa'i rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes yongs su smin par rang gis bsrung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-18: sngar bsrung ba med cing ri la sogs pa la 'gro ba na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-19: ye shes yongs su ma rdzogs par rang gis bsrungs so zhes gsungs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-20: mi'am ci zla ba'i skyes rabs gsungs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:383b-21: gdan las bzhengs nas gshegs so; ;nyi ma gnyis pa la rgyal bu gzhon nu dga' bo rgyal por dbang bskur ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-0: khang pa gsar ba'i nang du zhugs te bkra shis pa'i bag ma blangs nas nye bar gnas @384a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-3: lhung bzed gzung zhig ces rab tu dbyung bar dgongs nas bkra shis brjod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-4: gdan la bzhengs nas gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-5: ljongs kyi dge ba'i bu mos 'gro ba mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-6: 'phags pa'i bu myur du shog ces brjod nas blta'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-7: des kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed de bzung bar ma nus nas gtsug lag khang nyid du gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-8: bcom ldan 'das de la 'dod pa med pa nyid kyang rab tu 'byung ba byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-9: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das grong khyer ser skyar gshegs shing nyi ma gsum pa la dga' bo rab tu byung bar byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-10: nyi ma bdun ba la sgra gcan 'dzin gyi mas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-11: gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du btang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-13: bu; stong phrag nyi shu'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa 'di rnams ltos /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-14: gser gyi kha dog can gyi tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi mdog can /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-15: dge sbyong 'di ni khyed kyi yab bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-16: 'di la gter chen po yod cing de 'thon pa nas bzung nas gter mthong ba med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-18: bdag khyed kyi bu gzhon nu yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-19: rgyal por dbang bskur ba thob nas 'khor los bsgyur ba la dbang byed par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384a-20: bdag la nor gyi don du nor stsal du gsol //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384b-1: zhes gsol cig ces smras pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384b-2: gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384b-3: yab kyi drung du dga' bskyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384b-5: dge sbyong de khyed kyi grib ma ni de'o zhes brjod nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384b-7: rang gi rigs pas brjod cing 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384b-8: bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod kyi mthar rjes su yi rang ba mdzad nas gdan la bzhengs te gshegs so; ;gzhon nus bdag la dge slong nor stsal du gsol /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384b-9: bdag la dge slong nor stsal du gsol /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su 'brang nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu phyir log la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384b-12: nga'i rjes su ma 'gro zhes pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384b-13: rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das dang 'grogs nas byon te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384b-15: gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig kun dga' rab nyid du phyin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsams pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384b-17: 'di yab kyi nor 'dod cing 'jig rten pa'i nor ni 'tshe ba dang bcas pa yin da ni gzhon nu la byang chub snying po des thob pa'i 'phags pa'i nor rnam pa bdun byin na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor gyi bdag po byed par 'gyur bar dgongs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384b-18: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu pos te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:384b-19: de'i phyir na sh'a ri'i bu khyod kyis gzhon nu sgra gcan 'dzin rab tu phyung zhes brjod nas rab tu byung ba byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385a-0: slar yang rgyal po gzhon nu'i @385a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385a-1: sdug bsngal cher skyes te bsran par ma nus nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas su phyin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385a-5: pha yis rjes su ma gnang ba'i bu rab tu 'byung bar byed pa ma legs so zhes dam pa bslangs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dam pa byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385a-7: slar yang nyi ma gnyis pa la rgyal po'i gnas su gdugs tshod gsol nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385a-8: rgyal pos btsun pa nyid dka' ba spyod pa'i dus su lha gcig bdag gi drung du nye bar 'ongs nas khyed kyi bu dus las 'das so; ;zhes smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385a-9: de'i tshig la yid ches pa med cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385a-10: bdag gi sras byang chub ma thob bar du dus las 'da' bar mi byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385a-11: de'i tshig bdag gis bkag go zhes brjod do; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385a-12: de lta ji ltar khyod yid ches par byed /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385a-13: slar rus pa mthong nas khyed kyi bu shi'o zhes zer ba la yid ches par ma byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385a-14: 'di'i don 'byung ba ni chos skyong ba chen po'i skyes rabs su bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385a-15: gtam gyi mthar rgyal pos phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385a-16: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi yab 'bras bu gsum la so sor gnas nas dge slong gi dge 'dun 'khor du byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385a-17: slar yang rgyal po'i khab du gshegs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385a-18: bsil ba'i tshal du bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385b-0: de'i tshe khyim bdag @385b mgon med zas sbyin gyis shing rta lnga brgya'i nor khyer nas rgyal po'i khab du rang nyid dga' ba'i grogs kyi khang par song ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385b-1: de sa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byon no zhes pa thos nas shin tu snga bar lha'i mthus sgo phye ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385b-2: ston ba'i drung du nye bar song nas chos thos te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385b-3: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385b-4: nyi ma gnyis pa la sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge 'dun la sbyin pa chen po phul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385b-5: gnyan yod du gshegs pa'i phyir du ston pa'i drung du dam bca' bslangs nas sar gyi lan dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i gnas su 'bum phrag re re'i nor byin nas dpag tshad re re'i gtsug lag khang byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385b-6: rgyal byed tshal bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi dbyig gis nyos nas las kha gsar pa byed cing dbus su stobs bcu pa'i dri'i gtsang khang byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385b-7: de la bskor ba rnams la gnas brtan chen po brgyad cu'i bzhugs gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385b-11: bsti gnas la sogs pa'i bzhugs gnas dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385b-16: bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi nor spel te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385b-17: yid du 'od pa'i sa phyogs yid la 'thad pa'i gtsug lag khang byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:385b-18: stobs bcu pa byon pa'i phyir du po nya pa btang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386a-1: nya ba'i 'phrin gsan nas dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po 'khor du byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386a-2: rgyal po'i khab nas phyir byon te go rim bzhin du grong khyer mnyan yod du byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386a-3: gtso bo chen po yang gtsug lag khang chen po sta gon byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal byed tshal du byon pa'i nyin mo bu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386a-4: slar yang brgyan pa nyid kyi gzhon nu lnga brgya dang bcas pa btang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386a-5: de 'khor dang bcas ba kha dog lnga'i gos yang dag par 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan brgya thogs nas stobs bcu ba'i mdun du song bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386a-6: de rnams kyi phyi ma la legs bzang chen mo dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386a-7: legs bzang mchung bste bu mo gnyis /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386a-8: gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang bcas pa gser gyis gang ba'i bum pa lag par thogs nas phyir 'thon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386a-9: de'i phyi ma la tshong dpon gyi chung ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas bud med lnga brgya dang bcas pa gser gyis gang ba'i sder ma chen po thogs nas phyir 'thon to;/
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386a-10: thams cad phyin nas tshong dpon rang nyid gos bzang po gyon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386a-11: de bzhin du gos bzang po gyon pa'i tshong dpon lnga brgya dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor dge bsnyen 'di rnams mdun du byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386a-13: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po rnams 'khor du byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-0: rang @386b nyid kyi sku lus kyi 'od kyis gser gyi bcud kyi gong bu lta bu dang mtshungs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-1: nags tshal gyi bar du snang bar mdzad cing mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rol pa sangs rgyas kyi dpal zla med cing mtshungs pa med pa rgyal byed 'tshal gyi nang du byon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-2: de nas mgon med zas byin gyis zhus pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-4: gtsug lag khang 'di ji ltar bu la dbul bar gyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-7: 'gro ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-9: bcom ldan 'das zhes tshong dpon chen pos gser gyi ril ba spyi blugs blangs nas stobs bcu pa'i phyag tu chu bsgrengs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-10: rgyal byed tshal gyi gtsug lag khang 'di'i 'gro ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-11: 'ongs pa'i phyogs bzhi'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge 'dun la sbyin zhes phul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-12: ston pas gtsug lag khang bzhes nas rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-13: grang dang dro bas mi nyams shing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-14: de ltar ri dvags la sogs pa'i //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-15: sdig sbrul dang ni sbrang bu dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-16: ba mo dang ni char pas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-17: de ltar rlung dang shin tu dro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-18: so sor lus la gos pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-19: khang nang gnas nas bde ba skyes //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-20: khang bar bsam gtan lhag mthong rnams //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-22: sangs rgyas mchog gis bsngags par mdzad //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-23: skyes bu mkhas pas de yi phyir //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:386b-24: bdag nyid kyi ni phyir du ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-1: bas gtsug lag khang byed pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-2: mang du thos pa gnas pa yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-3: de rnams kyi ni bza' dang btung //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-4: gos dang mal cha stan dang ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-5: de rnams sems ni drang bos dbul //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-6: rab tu dang ba'i sems gyis so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-7: des ni de la chos bstan to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-8: sdug bsngal thams cad nyer zhi'i phyir //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-9: gang de'i chos ni rtogs pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-10: rten med mya ngan 'das par byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-11: ces bya ba'i gtsug lag khang gi phan yon bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-12: mgon med zas sbyin gyis nyi ma gnyis pa nas bzung nas sbyin pa gtong ba'i mgo brtsams so; ;sa khams byas pa'i khang bzang ni zla ba bzhis grub bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-13: slar yang mgon med zas sbyin gyi gtsug lag khang chen po zla ba dgus grub bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-14: gtsug lag khang chen po la yang bye ba stong phrag bco brgyad nyid song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-15: 'di la gtsug lag khang chen po 'di nyid la bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bzhi'i nor yongs su btang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-16: slar yang 'das pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi dus su tshong dpon kun gyi grogs zhes bya bas gser gyi glang bo'i rkang ba'i rmig rjes lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-17: gnas 'di nyid du dpag tshad gcig gi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rab byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387a-18: bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor can gyi dus su /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387b-0: dpal 'phel zhes bya ba'i tshong dpon gyi bsu gser gyi sder ma rgyun mi 'chad pas nyos @387b ba'i sa gzhi'i gnas de nyid du rgyang grags bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam gyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rab byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387b-1: bcom ldan 'das thams cad skyob kyi dus su tshong dpon bkra shis zhes bya bas gser gyis gzhi gser gyi rkang pa'i rjes lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du dpag tshad phyed kyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rab byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387b-2: bcom ldan 'das log par dad sel gyi dus su tshong dpon 'pho ba med pa zhes bya bas gser gyi pha gu lta bu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags bzhi'i tshad kyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387b-3: bcom ldan 'das gser thub kyi dus su tshong dpon drag po zhes bya bas gser gyi rus sbal rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags gnyis kyi tshad kyi kun dga' ra ba byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387b-4: bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi dus su tshong dpon bkra shis bzang po zhes bya bas gser gyi pha gu rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bus sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags gcig gi tshad kyi kun dga' rab byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:387b-5: slar yang bdag cag gi bcom ldan 'das kyi dus su tshong dpon mgon med zas sbyin gyis bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi dbyig gis gser gyi 'dra men du byas pa rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bus sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags byed kyi kun dga' rab byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:388a-1: rgyas thams cad kyis ma spangs pa'i gnas yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:388a-2: 'di ltar byang chub chen po'i snying po'i drung du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa ji srid pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa de srid du gang dang gang gi gnas su bcom ldan 'das bdag bzhugs pa 'di ni nye ba'i gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:388a-3: de'i lus kyis skyes rabs thams cad du bsngags par mdzad de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:388a-4: skyes ba rabs kyi gleng gzhi'i bshad pa rdzogs so ////
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:388a-5: pandi ta a'a nanda shr'i'i zhal snga nas dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:388a-6: mang du thos pa'i lo tstsha ba sh'a kya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:388a-7: skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-020:388a-8: sa'i steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig /
